name: PIP: Battle for the Arctic
detailed_description:
A cute, fun platformer for all ages. Travel though the arctic,caves and ocean. Eat fish along the way, and make your way to the factory. Play as PIP, or Owl, and take back the arctic from the evil oil drilling company's CEO!!

During your travels, you will meet various characters to help you along the quest; while helping them with tasks along the way!

You may encounter puzzles, obstacles and find new expansive worlds. Dive into water caves and find hidden treasures! You will feel the classic platformer Nostalgia, of an old era!
about_the_game:
A cute, fun platformer for all ages. Travel though the arctic,caves and ocean. Eat fish along the way, and make your way to the factory. Play as PIP, or Owl, and take back the arctic from the evil oil drilling company's CEO!!

You may encounter puzzles, obstacles and find new expansive worlds. Dive into water caves and find hidden treasures! You will feel the classic platformer Nostalgia, of an old era!

name: Deathly Dangerous
detailed_description:
Deathly Dangerous is an action adventure with a top view in which we have to hunt the undead. Bright juicy graphics and atmospheric music will not make you bored.

The world is filled with bloodthirsty monsters, It's time to get rid of them. The main character kills monsters and takes their souls for himself. Kill everyone in a certain area: the number of necessary victims is visible in the upper right corner of the screen. After each successfully completed level, new types of weapons are waiting for you, try to pass as many locations as possible. Be careful: the monsters are merciless and ready to deal with you at any awkward movement.

name: Super Crane Bug
detailed_description:
Match tiles of the same color to score points,
the board will bring more tiles over time,
you lose if the board is filled up!



- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -



Special tool tiles will give you bonus points, but will also change the game you play so watch out.
Each time you match one of these you will play with the next tool in rotation

1. SWAP: Swap two tiles horizontally by pressing O 
2. CRANE: Hold O to grab a tile and push it around 
3. DRILL: Hold O, then press LEFT or RIGHT to rotate a 2x2 space 
4. SHOVEL: Pick a tile and toss it away to a random position
 5. WAGON: Hold O to move a 2x2 space horizontally 
6. HOSE: Swap tiles positions as you move. Can't be turned off.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -



For more specialized work play in Advanced Mode, score is doubled and will give you extra components,
but random debris will spawn constantly. Make chains near them to clear or activate them.

EMPTY - Occupies space, falls in big groups  
DIRTY - Reveals its color when cleared
 BOMB - Tosses a bunch of EMPTY tiles if moved 
FREEZE - Time freezes for a while 
PRISM - Clears up a big space

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

OTHER OPTIONS

Zen Mode: Relax and practice.  
The game won't speed up and score will constantly go down to 0.

Styles: Icons or Blobs.
 You can switch between Colored Blobs or Squared Tiles to play the game with

name: Stellar Insurgency
detailed_description:
Stellar Insurgency is a single-player, 3D, Open World, space game with rts and rpg elements. Explore a galaxy of 300 systems as you control your fleet in a top-down 3D style, navigating through Star-lanes, Warp gates, and Black holes. Customize and upgrade your fleet, complete missions, trade, hire your crew, wage war and determine the fate of the galaxy in this grand sim saga.



Major Features

  • Explore a galaxy of 300 systems controlling your fleet in a 3D top-down style.
  • Three playable Factions plus three additional.
  • Cross the galaxy through Star-lanes, Warp gates and Black holes.
  • Customize and upgrade your fleet consisting from Fighters to Carriers and Battleships.
  • Complete missions that impact your relations with galaxy’s factions.
  • Forge alliances, wage war and determine the fate of the galaxy.
  • Hire crew to improve the stats of your fleet.
  • Be a pirate (if you want to).
  • Make profit through trade.

Minor Features

  • Explore stellar objects through exploration probes.
  • Three levels of defense Stealth, Shields and Armor prior to component and hull damage.
  • Use warp drive to jump locally and through solar systems.
  • Board Enemy vessels through boarding probes or transporters.
  • Several classes of weapons that include, laser-turrets, beams, missiles, flak (anti-fighter).
  • Place or avoid mine fields.

name: Crazy Designer
detailed_description:
A strategy and simulation game about interior design.


There are hundreds different kinds of family which has different request.

Different conditions have to be considered, and you need to make the perfect arrangement to create the happy life for every family.

Real-time updated furniture stream. Do I need to buy it now for future use?

Once a case is accomplished, the player can get the reward cash and goodwill score, and another more challenging case will be waiting for the player.

SPECIALTY


9 topics and more than 1200 items in the game.

Excellent A.I., clients will tell the player their admiration and complaint right away.

name: Sword and Fairy Inn Soundtrack
detailed_description:
李逍遙十五歲那年某日，李大娘突然有事遠行，將客棧交給李逍遙代管，因緣際會下，趙靈兒、林月如、阿奴三人相繼出現，成為客棧的一份子，四人在一年的時間裡共同經營客棧。
當客棧日漸興榮、主角們愛意漸漸滋長……時光倒錯的十字路口，由你來選定方向。但是，真的是輕鬆快樂的完美結局嗎？是真？是幻？

遊戲特色

Ø 新型態遊戲風貌，結合經營、戀愛養成與角色扮演的仙劍系列作

Ø 仙劍原班人馬聯袂主演，劇情曲折迷離與多重豐富結局，體驗不同仙劍面貌
Ø 獨創料理格鬥系統，三位女主角親自掌勺，108道中華名菜重現眼前
Ø 武林英雄輪番豋場，煎炒烹煮，廚藝對決，上演趣味橫生的料理決鬥

name: Koloni
detailed_description:
Koloni is a city-building strategy game that puts you in charge of a group of pioneers who have discovered a new land to colonize. However, you're not alone in your quest to settle on this uncharted territory, as other groups have their sights set on the same land.

Koloni is the brainchild of a single developer who is deeply invested in the project. If you have any thoughts, suggestions, or critiques, please don't hesitate to contact me. Your feedback will be carefully considered and appreciated.

name: Untold Love Stories
detailed_description:
Dive into a multiverse where everything is possible: romance, new meetings, adventures and even mystery. Choose the story you like or go through all, living many lives.

Untold Love Stories is a collection of short visual novels in different genres and art styles. You have to play for the main characters and make choices that will determine their destiny.

Unexpected Meeting (episode 1) is a spicy visual novel in 3D. Lucy works as a waitress at a roadside cafe. She once dreamed of becoming a famous actress, but one day she faced a cruel reality. Can one meeting change her life for the better? This is exactly what you will have to find out!

Jane's Mystery Story (episode 1) is a 2D detective visual novel. Jane lives the life of an ordinary high school student until strange things start to happen to her. Can Jane solve all the secrets, find love and herself? Everything depends only on you!

The Survivor (episode 1) is a story in a post-apocalyptic setting with pixel art style. In the near future, the world has been attacked by an unknown virus and natural disasters. You are one of the few who survived. But are you ready for the twists and turns of fate and new meetings that lie ahead of you?

New stories and episodes release every month!

name: SPRYDITE
detailed_description:
Sprydite is an action-adventure, survival with immersive RPG elements in a large open world. Science fiction set in a post-apocalyptic and cyberpunk backwoods setting with a small touch of surrealism.
The player will be able to immerse himself in the exploration of the world with a non-linear narrative, the ability to make choices and influence the environment, to play one or another role depending on his preferences and views.

World Story:

In the game world, in 2029, a catastrophic event occurred when there was a malfunction of experimental quantum engines on the private space stations "Robinson" and "Rascvet-2". "Robinson" fell from orbit and crashed on the territory of the fictional country of Bieknur. The collision caused a brief space-time distortion due to the activated quantum engine, resulting in a sudden change in the local relief in the area of the crash, which was subsequently named the "Wandering Horizon." The government closed the anomalous zone and contracted with the private corporation NTechS to protect the area. The corporation began to build a wall and the Megallun system that would later isolate the Wandering Horizon from the outside world.
Over the past 9 years, the zone has changed significantly, and it is now inhabited by strange mutated creatures, transformations, and landscape hyper-transformations that even experienced explorers find terrifying. The landscape is now unrecognizable, and in some places, the laws of physics operate on completely different principles. Despite the fact that it is now an inhospitable place with a hostile biosphere, there are still people, communities, and groups on the outskirts of the epicenter who are trying to adapt to the conditions of the Wandering Horizon.

Main Protagonist


Bulat is the protagonist, whose goal is to get to the dangerous zone "Wandering Horizon" and find information about his missing relative. But it is not as easy as it seems at first glance. Before he can begin his dangerous mission, he needs to find a passage in the vicinity of the zone, which is not far from the settlement.

So begins a real adventure that draws Bulat into a plot full of unexpected twists and dangerous trials. The quest leads our hero to new acquaintances, unexpected alliances and treacherous enemies that stand in the way.

And although Bulat is a character ready to go through fire and water for his goal, everything depends on the choice the player makes. Will he follow Bulat's principles and morals, or will he choose to act unconventionally and become an anti-hero? This decision is in the hands of the one who controls this character.

Get ready for a real adventure full of danger and surprises, where everything depends on you!

Features:


  • Open world.
  • Basic plot and various quests.
  • Interesting moments and random events.
  • Caves and underwater exploration.
  • 4 different biomes, forests, abandoned villages and towns.
  • Change of day and night, with changing weather conditions.
  • A system of quests and dialogues.
  • Ability upgrade tree, including rare superpower implants.
  • An extensive selection of weapons, equipment, resources and various items for survival.
  • Character needs for food, water, etc.
  • Friendly factions and marauders.
  • Ability to have robots or human companions.
  • Relationships with Characters
  • Battles with various enemies such as monsters, bandits, and robot guards.
  • Transportation.
  • Inventory system.
  • Crafting and repairing items.
  • Building a base and home.
  • Fishing.
  • Farming and poultry farming.
  • Farming, growing vegetables and plants.
  • Alchemy, making tinctures from plants, vegetables, and mushrooms.
  • Cooking, preparation of various dishes.
  • Building machines or entire factories to process ore, wood, and produce various items.
  • Digging, searching for treasure and mutated worms.
  • An extensive system of trade and entrepreneurship in the game.

Multiplayer:


Multiplayer with dedicated servers, survival with all game mechanics and with the ability to customize characters at the beginning of the game, except for the story of the single-player game.
  • Scheduled only after the release of the main single-player story game as a free update.
about_the_game:
Sprydite is an action-adventure, survival with immersive RPG elements in a large open world. Science fiction set in a post-apocalyptic and cyberpunk backwoods setting with a small touch of surrealism.
The player will be able to immerse himself in the exploration of the world with a non-linear narrative, the ability to make choices and influence the environment, to play one or another role depending on his preferences and views.

World Story:

In the game world, in 2029, a catastrophic event occurred when there was a malfunction of experimental quantum engines on the private space stations "Robinson" and "Rascvet-2". "Robinson" fell from orbit and crashed on the territory of the fictional country of Bieknur. The collision caused a brief space-time distortion due to the activated quantum engine, resulting in a sudden change in the local relief in the area of the crash, which was subsequently named the "Wandering Horizon." The government closed the anomalous zone and contracted with the private corporation NTechS to protect the area. The corporation began to build a wall and the Megallun system that would later isolate the Wandering Horizon from the outside world.
Over the past 9 years, the zone has changed significantly, and it is now inhabited by strange mutated creatures, transformations, and landscape hyper-transformations that even experienced explorers find terrifying. The landscape is now unrecognizable, and in some places, the laws of physics operate on completely different principles. Despite the fact that it is now an inhospitable place with a hostile biosphere, there are still people, communities, and groups on the outskirts of the epicenter who are trying to adapt to the conditions of the Wandering Horizon.

Main Protagonist


Bulat is the protagonist, whose goal is to get to the dangerous zone "Wandering Horizon" and find information about his missing relative. But it is not as easy as it seems at first glance. Before he can begin his dangerous mission, he needs to find a passage in the vicinity of the zone, which is not far from the settlement.

So begins a real adventure that draws Bulat into a plot full of unexpected twists and dangerous trials. The quest leads our hero to new acquaintances, unexpected alliances and treacherous enemies that stand in the way.

And although Bulat is a character ready to go through fire and water for his goal, everything depends on the choice the player makes. Will he follow Bulat's principles and morals, or will he choose to act unconventionally and become an anti-hero? This decision is in the hands of the one who controls this character.

Get ready for a real adventure full of danger and surprises, where everything depends on you!

Features:


  • Open world.
  • Basic plot and various quests.
  • Interesting moments and random events.
  • Caves and underwater exploration.
  • 4 different biomes, forests, abandoned villages and towns.
  • Change of day and night, with changing weather conditions.
  • A system of quests and dialogues.
  • Ability upgrade tree, including rare superpower implants.
  • An extensive selection of weapons, equipment, resources and various items for survival.
  • Character needs for food, water, etc.
  • Friendly factions and marauders.
  • Ability to have robots or human companions.
  • Relationships with Characters
  • Battles with various enemies such as monsters, bandits, and robot guards.
  • Transportation.
  • Inventory system.
  • Crafting and repairing items.
  • Building a base and home.
  • Fishing.
  • Farming and poultry farming.
  • Farming, growing vegetables and plants.
  • Alchemy, making tinctures from plants, vegetables, and mushrooms.
  • Cooking, preparation of various dishes.
  • Building machines or entire factories to process ore, wood, and produce various items.
  • Digging, searching for treasure and mutated worms.
  • An extensive system of trade and entrepreneurship in the game.

Multiplayer:


Multiplayer with dedicated servers, survival with all game mechanics and with the ability to customize characters at the beginning of the game, except for the story of the single-player game.
  • Scheduled only after the release of the main single-player story game as a free update.
short_description: Sprydite is an action-adventure, survival with immersive RPG elements in a large open world. Science fiction set in a post-apocalyptic and cyberpunk backwoods setting with a small touch of surrealism.

name: Rootman Demo
detailed_description:
Find out what happened
On October 26, 2005, a strange call came to the police at night. In the application, the owner of the house said that some dark figure was watching him from the forest, and strange sounds were constantly heard in the house, as if someone or something was crawling along the walls. Police officer Harry Whippet went to this challenge. Nobody saw him again. Only a week later, footage from a police officer's body camera was found.

Learn about Rutman.
This is a monster that lives in the dense dark forests of a small town. Rootman tortures and kills everyone who wanders into his domain. The legend speaks of murders, cursed artifacts, and the supernatural behavior of trees. It is said that its roots go deep into the earth, and Rutman's body consists of twisted gnarled branches and roots. No one knows how old he is and where he came from, but the townspeople are still afraid of him. He has the ability to manipulate surrounding trees and plants, using them to trap his victims. It is said that, once in its grasp, the roots tightly wrap around the body, squeezing the life out of the victim. The town lives in fear of Rootman, never going too far into the forest for fear of encountering the monster. It is said that on quiet, moonless nights, Rootman's whisper can be heard through the trees, reminding the city of his omnipresent presence and of the danger lurking in the forest.

Play with the body camera effect.
Experience realistic camera shake, sound and visual effects. Feel the incredible effect of immersion and presence in the center of events.

Feel the horror.
In the game you will find a tense atmosphere and suspense. And sometimes you have to jump up and down in your chair.

Add the game to your wishlist!
This is a short demo, or rather a prototype, that was created by me and my wife at the Global Game Jam 2023. If you like the demo, we will make a full game out of it.

name: Titan: The Ascension
detailed_description:
Welcome, fellow gamers! Are you ready for the ultimate space adventure? Look no further than Titan: The Ascension!

In this game, you'll take on the role of a fearless colonizer on Titan, one of Saturn's moons. Your mission? To gather resources, trade them strategically, and ultimately achieve independence from Earth. But that's not all - survival is key as you work to establish a self-sufficient colony, all while exploring other moons and planets in our solar system.

Think you have what it takes to conquer the challenges of deep space? With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, Titan: The Ascension will take you on an epic journey like no other. Get ready to explore the final frontier and make your mark in the galaxy. Are you ready to ascend?

name: Feudal Friends
detailed_description:
Add to Wishlist

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2317820/Feudal_Friends/?snr=1_5_1100__1100


About the Game

Join Discord!


Produce your soldiers, upgrade your equipment, and fight to win in a chaotic castle!
Build your team for 1vs1 and 4vs4 Online/Offline mode options!
Determine your strategy🎯 and be the first to destroy the opposing tower. As the commander, create a strategy for your team, determine soldier production🗿, and provide support on the battlefield! As the blacksmith, create weapons 🔨, as the armor master, create armor, and as the engineer, develop the castle🛠️, and manage your economy 💸

ONLINE/LOCAL MULTIPLAYER MADNESS


To win in online multiplayer mode, you will need to work together.

Sabotage your friends

Infuriate your friend by slapping them during the production phase when tensions are high!!!

Basic Gameplay


  • Quick production within the tower is very important; move with WASD and interact with items using O and P.
  • Pay attention to upgrades, and be stronger than your opponent; you must keep a balance between your resource development and production objects.
  • You can create a different strategy in each game; runes determine your game strategy, move as a team and steer your game strategy with your runes.

  • As the Commander, you determine the production. Analyze the enemies coming from the opposing tower and determine your production order well!
  • Are the opponents too close? Attack them with the defense weapons on the tower!
  • Does your army need support? Go to the battlefield and give them power!


  • As an Engineer, you determine upgrades. Speeding up production and improving the raw materials will help you produce soldiers faster and make them stronger!
  • Don't forget to support the production within the tower. Train horses for the cavalry, produce shields for the infantry!
    • Siege weapons are under your control. Don't forget to research the trebuchet to capture the enemy tower!


    • In the Blacksmith role, you will produce weapons for your soldiers. Swords for infantry, crossbows for archers!
    • Melt the raw materials, pour it into a sword mold, cool it down and sharpen it with an anvil. The weapons are ready for battle!
    • In order to get your soldiers out of the tower faster, you should coordinate with the armor master and quickly complete the production.


    • In the role of armorer, you will produce armor for your soldiers. All soldiers want armor!!!
    • Melt the raw materials, pour it into an armor mold, cool it down and strengthen it with an anvil. Your soldiers are ready to go!
    • In order to get your soldiers out of the tower faster, you should coordinate with the blacksmith and complete the production quickly.

    Send your wrongly produced or dressed soldier into the void!


    https://store.steampowered.com/app/2317820/Feudal_Friends/?snr=1_5_1100__1100

name: WorldWide Warfare League of Cities
detailed_description:
Join the fray and take part of the final battle.

Play the game as a singleplayer with bots or play it in multiplayer mode with your friends.

Create a server and invite your friends in a private world or create an open world and play with other players online.

Choose between three maps unique maps, Harmagadon, Alaqsa(Dome of the Rock) and Aalborg(Vesterbro).

Two of the maps are inspired from real world locations both from the fare ancient to the modern world as we know it today.

Add friends to your list. Create a clan and invite others to your team.

Customize weapons to your needs by choosing different camo skins or by adding or removing attachments.

Customize your profile with emblems and callingcards with real world flags and symbols.

Achieve higher levels and unlock more wapons, emplems and callingcards.

name: Hat'venture
detailed_description:
Would you throw yourself into a well if asked? No, of course not. Unless someone stole your hair. Travel through the underground world dodging obstacles and eliminating monsters that block your way. But beware, you're not the only one chasing your hair.


Travel deeper and deeper
You will travel through a randomly generated world in this roguelike shoot 'em up. Avoid all obstacles to go faster and faster through the depths. But be careful, depth means danger.

Hats
Retrieve hats during your trip. Now that you are bald, they will give you power. You want more ? Upgrade each hats while you have money !

Simple but challenging
You can jump, dodge or shoot. Simple ? Don't be fooled, it's not as easy as it looks.

name: Easy Red 2: Normandy
detailed_description:
Easy Red 2: Normandy is an expansion that brings an impressive amount of fresh content to the base game. Among the highlights are the inclusion of the Normandy campaign, complete with all the iconic beaches such as Omaha, Utah, Pointe du Hoc, Sword, Juno, and Gold. Additionally, players can expect to explore the Normandy inland area, with its sprawling cities like Caen, Carentan, and Saint Lo, along with a vast surrounding campaign area that promises countless hours of engaging gameplay.

To further enrich the gaming experience, Easy Red 2: Normandy introduces 15 new missions, each with its unique challenges and objectives. You can also expect to find over 100 new props, buildings, and bunkers from the campaign available in the Map and Mission Editor, most of which come with destructibility features, making your battles even more realistic.

The expansion also adds an impressive roster of new vehicles to the game, such as the LCAs, Sherman DD, German coastal guns, Sturm panzer 43, Jagdpanzer IV, Hetzer, Marder I, Sdkfz250, Schwimmwagen, M4A2E8 Sherman, Churchill MK VII, Comet, Valentine, M10 Achilles, Bren Carrier, WC51 Dodge, and other tank and civilian vehicles.

Moreover, Easy Red 2: Normandy includes a range of new features such as throwable hooks, which enable players to scale the formidable cliffs of Pointe du Hoc with ease. The game also offers new uniforms, including the US Airborne and US Rangers uniforms, allowing players to further immerse themselves in the Normandy campaign.

The DLC will be subject to updates and improvements, which may bring additional content like new weapons, vehicles, uniforms, and missions in the future. So, be prepared for more exciting additions to the game!

short_description: With Easy Red 2: Normandy you will experience the historic battles of the D-Day landings and beyond in immersive detail. Fight as Allied or Axis forces on faithfully recreated missions, using vehicles, and tactics to turn the tide of war.

name: Samurai Survivors
detailed_description:
Samurai Survivors is a rogue-like, hack-and-slash, Vampire Survivors-like game. Slay evil spirits as you age and learn techniques to become the most powerful samurai.




You've betrayed your clan and been cursed to battle evil spirits as long as you breathe. You will continue to age until you pay your price while improving your swordsmanship more and more


Features

  • Hours of intense slicing & slashing survival!
  • 21 unique attacks with incredible synergies!
  • Interesting enemies with unique mechanics. They don't just increase in health!
  • Different maps with map-specific enemies and mechanics!
  • Unlockable weapons & attack techniques!
  • Future updates! New content like techniques, maps, and enemies will be added!
  • Continue playing the game after you beat the time with increasing Ascension Levels!
  • Custom-made Japanese medieval musics!
  • Lots and lots of juicy gameplay!




Samurai Illustration by Javardry

name: Fantasy Grounds - Book of Lost Spells
detailed_description:
"

Book of Lost Spells

Ask any wizard. There's no such thing as too many spells. This massive compendium of magical mayhem ought to satisfy even the most discerning necromancers and thaumaturgists, and they aren't easy to please (especially the necromancers). Weighing in with a total of 708 spells, the Book of Lost Spells is a vital resources for anyone wanting to add a bit more mystery to the magic of Pathfinder! Get even more for your game! Frog God Games makes adventures and supplements for Fifth Edition, Swords & Wizardry, Pathfinder and more! "

name: Yondu's Journey
detailed_description:
Welcome to Yondu's Journey, an interactive movie where every decision you make can lead to life or death. Take on the role of Yondu The Fearless and face the challenges that await you in this exciting game.

As you play through the game, you will be presented with a series of difficult decisions that will test your courage and quick thinking. Do you want to fight or flee? The choice is yours, but be prepared to act fast - you only have a few seconds to make each decision.

Each decision you make will impact the outcome of the game, so choose wisely. Will you be the hero that saves the day, or will you succumb to the dangers that await you? The fate of Yondu The Fearless is in your hands.

With stunning graphics and intense action, Yondu's Journey is a game that you won't want to miss. So gather your courage and get ready for an adventure that will test your skills and leave you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to face the challenges of Yondu's Journey? The choice is yours.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Interface Zero 3.0: The Game Master's Guide to 2095
detailed_description:
"

Interface Zero 3.0: The Game Master's Guide to 2095

The job of the game master can be daunting. You have a story to tell, and to do so, you must wear many hats. You're a storyteller, a world builder, a referee and more. While certainly a challenge, your job can be incredibly rewarding. There's nothing like looking across the game table at a group of players on the edge of their seats waiting to see what happens next; nothing like listening to them chat excitedly about a plan, wonder aloud what might happen next. On the other hand, there's nothing so nerve-wracking as like the "Dead Air" that comes when you have to constantly look up a particular rule or break the flow of the game to whip up some story element or NPC that is missing from your game. This book is written to help you avoid those types of situations.

CONTENT OVERVIEW
In this book you'll find an array of elements designed to help you create memorable games in the Interface Zero setting.
CHAPTER ONE: BUILDING YOUR CITY
This chapter is all about ways you can create a city. Much of this is accomplished by using trappings to quickly define an area of a city, like suburbs, corporate enclaves, or slums. Similarly, we also look at organizations such as gangs, major corporations, and organized crime rings and give them trappings you can use to define their scope and influence in 2095.
CHAPTER TWO: TOOLKITS
Chapter two gives a variety of components you can use to enhance your campaign. You'll find rules for engaging in corporate warfare, extreme weather, lifestyles and more.
CHAPTER THREE: PLOT POINT CAMPAIGNS
Chapter three takes a deeper look at the three core campaign themes found in Interface Zero 3.0: The Player's Guide to 2095 and gives you some advice for creating your own. Here, we also introduce our plot point campaigns. Plot point campaigns are a great way to introduce players to the campaign world you have built. Most official Savage Worlds settings have them, and for the first time, Interface Zero 3.0 introduces three plot point campaigns you can play through.
CHAPTER FOUR: SAVAGE TALES
Chapter four expands on the plot point campaigns, providing you with a glut of savage tales you can run over the course of a campaign. Adventure generators for each Plot Point Campaign are also provided.
CHAPTER FIVE: THREATS
As a GM, you need non-player characters, mooks and other interesting creatures and challenges for your players. Chapter five gives you a bunch of npcs and biohorrors and gives you a biohorror generator and a npc generator you can use to make your own creatures and characters.
CHAPTER 6: THE TENDRIL ACCESS PLAGUE
In this chapter, we go into detail on the Tendril Access Plague and its effects on the world. You'll find information about the plague, the Cyber Information Security Section (CISS), IDentification APPlication Software (IDAPPS), as well as rules for dealing with infection, removing the plague from your TAP, and more.
CHAPTER SEVEN: 2095 REVISITED

Chapter six takes a deeper look at the world. The Player's Guide to 2095 provided a wealth of information about the world and the greater solar system. In the GM's Guide to 2095, we take another look at the setting, this time with an eye for elements and plot hooks you can use to create adventures for your players.


"

Most official Savage Worlds settings have them, and for the first time, Interface Zero 3.0 introduces three plot point campaigns you can play through.
CHAPTER FOUR: SAVAGE TALES
Chapter four expands on the plot point campaigns, providing you with a glut of savage tales you can run over the course of a campaign. Adventure generators for each Plot Point Campaign are also provided.
CHAPTER FIVE: THREATS
As a GM, you need non-player characters, mooks and other interesting creatures and challenges for your players. Chapter five gives you a bunch of npcs and biohorrors and gives you a biohorror generator and a npc generator you can use to make your own creatures and characters.
CHAPTER 6: THE TENDRIL ACCESS PLAGUE
In this chapter, we go into detail on the Tendril Access Plague and its effects on the world. You'll find information about the plague, the Cyber Information Security Section (CISS), IDentification APPlication Software (IDAPPS), as well as rules for dealing with infection, removing the plague from your TAP, and more.
CHAPTER SEVEN: 2095 REVISITED

Chapter six takes a deeper look at the world. The Player's Guide to 2095 provided a wealth of information about the world and the greater solar system. In the GM's Guide to 2095, we take another look at the setting, this time with an eye for elements and plot hooks you can use to create adventures for your players.


"
short_description: " Interface Zero 3.0: The Game Master's Guide to 2095 The job of the game master can be daunting. You have a story to tell, and to do so, you must wear many hats. You're a storyteller, a world builder, a referee and more. While certainly a challenge, your job can be incredibly rewarding.

name: In Ukrainian Soil
detailed_description:
In memory of those, whose lives were taken by the Russian invaders, erasing peaceful Ukrainian cities from the face of the earth and committing other acts of genocide and crimes against humanity.

Today in Ukraine, we are all in a close relationship with death. So we decided to look behind her and share this journey with you.

An innocent soul is trapped in the depths of the ruins of a home shattered by a rocket.

She turns into a small seed from which a flower grows and reaches out with its roots to other bodies trapped among the rubble to help restless souls find their way to heaven...

Soar through the transcendental realm and guide lost souls to heaven's gates in this rhythm-fueled psychodelic racing game.

Game features

  • Otherwordly visuals
  • Dark psytrance soundtracks from well-known producers
  • Dynamic transcendental flight gameplay
  • Infinite procedurally generated environments
  • The narrative twists and turns around the odyssey of the ethereal essence, beyond the veil of mortality

name: Monado Hand Tracking
detailed_description:
Monado's "Mercury" hand tracking


The optical hand tracking software that this driver uses was developed by Collabora as part of the Monado open-source project.

We noticed that there was a huge segment of people with Valve Indices on Windows but no hand tracking, so we decided to publish this SteamVR driver so that people with Valve Index can use optical hand tracking without extra hardware!

Features


  • Full-fidelity optical hand tracking on just the Index front cameras. Curl, splay and 6dof hand pose are available.
  • Gesture-toggleable far ray interaction for easy interaction with menus
  • Gesture control for A, B, trigger and some thumbstick axes. VRChat is playable but not quite nice as-is.

Some basic tips

  • Get lots of light in your room, or mount a light on the front of your Index!
  • Very unfortunately, the Index front cameras don't have the widest field of view and don't point far down enough. This means that there's a limited tracking range in front of you where hand tracking will work. Hands too far down, too far to the side, or too close to the cameras won't be trackable, so be mindful of where your hands are!

This is free and open source software!


Code contributions, ideas and suggestions are very welcome! You can find links to our Discord server, GitHub page and issues page on the sidebar.

short_description: This SteamVR driver runs real-time optical hand tracking algorithms on your Valve Index front camera streams so that you can pinch, poke, grab and gesture to your heart's content in VR without ever being shackled by controllers on your hands!

name: Project Astra Dominium Demo
detailed_description:
Project Astra Dominium is a Tower Defense game with Basebuilding and Automation elements.



Explore different planets and defend against a mysterious alien race, that seem to reproduce endlessly and eat up whole planets.



Make use of the latest Nanite technology to process and refine all resources you find into useful materials for earth or new equipment for your towers.



As an AI you learn from everything you do and become stronger and better.
  • Gain combat experience and skillpoints that you can use to improve your towers. Each tower has it's own skilltree with up to 250 points to spend!
  • Learn recipes to craft various materials, items and also equipment for your towers.
  • Improve your crafting abilities and effiency to use less resources while having
    more/better/faster output.
  • Discover more about the aliens and learn to craft special beacons, that attract much stronger species that may also yield much better rewards!
  • Expand and improve your base to become a reliable resource hub for earth.


It's the year 2249, most resources on earth are nearly depleted and have lead to many conflicts in the past.
Despite those crises, humanity made huge progress in the fields of AI, which in turn allowed for enormous advances in space travel.
Scientists were even able to create a new kind of engine, which made it possible to travel faster than light. But on the downside humans were not able to survive this way of transportation.
In a last desperate attempt and in search for new resources, the EIRO (European Interstellar Resource Organization) built a brand new ship which was only controlled by an AI named "Athena".
Hoping that the AI can survive the jump and begin autonomous exploration and exploitation of resources, the ship is launched into an unknown future...

DISCLAIMER

Project Astra Dominium Ist Still In Early Access.


While most of the gameplay elements are already implemented, the visuals and UX are still work in progress and not finished yet.
We will update all screenshots/videos accordingly, whenever there is progress made in those areas!

name: I REMEMBER
detailed_description:
With a focus on psychological horror, 'I REMEMBER' will leave you on edge as you experience the gut-wrenching tension and horrifying story. Expect to see distorted environments, eerie sound design, and MIND bending puzzles that will test your psychological stability. The game's FOCUS on implicit horror means that the fear is not solely based on jump scares, but on a deep-seated dread that will STAY WITH you long after you've finished playing.



Step into the shoes of a Father and Son as they navigate the challenges of taking care of one another. Things take a turn for the worse when moving your fathers belonging from his old apartment to your own. Immerse yourself in a first-person experience filled with subtle, implicit terror and elements of survival horror. Traverse through a decaying environment, as you fight and hide from the terror that consumes us all.

As you play, pay close attention to the details within the dialogue and environments, as they will help you piece the story together.

Do you have what it takes to confront the fears that lurk in the shadows and uncover the truth behind 'I REMEMBER'? Find out in this gripping interpretation of an already popular concept.



ME, Laud - the coolest guy of all time.

Huge thanks to Unrested / Inksmith for creating the Art of 'Mother' used in this game. You can check him out on YouTube @Unrested or at @Inksmith or DON'T.

Huge thanks to Monk for making awesome music as well as taking my terrible MIDI music and producing it into something useful and awesome.

Huge thanks to MXXN for taking commissions on super short notice and creating awesome music for me to use!

Can't FORGET DaveFace, the genius behind Unreal Retro Shader.

name: retro life
detailed_description:
create the life of your dreams, in this classic real time life simulation/rpg game.

will you become the success story to make your parents proud? or a hopeless loser? the choice is yours!

features
  • climb the corporate ladder in 8 different career tracks (including a criminal career track).
  • become an entrepreneur and start 1 of 3 different businesses.
  • earn 1 of 4 different degrees at the retro university college.
  • improve 6 different stats.
  • move out of your parents place and move up in the world.
  • pay rent and manage finances.
  • risk your life savings in the stock market, or at the casino. Or play it safe and earn interest in a savings account.
  • get married, and start a family. with 5 bachelorettes to woo. each with there own unique story.
  • befriend the 4 other bachelorettes male counterparts to progress a new unique story between them.

name: Battle Cry of Freedom - Supporter Pack: Brass Bands
detailed_description:
The Battle Cry of Freedom Supporter Pack is your chance to elevate your gaming experience and show your support for the game. This optional DLC grants you access to a wealth of new historical music instruments, including the Saxhorn, Tuba, Bass Drum, Trombone, and Cornet. All songs were recorded by professional musicians using real instruments, ensuring authenticity and high-quality audio.



As a bonus, you'll also be able to play as the Drum Major and lead your troops into battle wielding the Tambour Major Baton. You'll have access to the US Marine Corps Band, the Virginia Military Institute Band, and the US Cavalry Brass Band, giving you a wide range of options to choose from.

Features:
• Access to the US Marine Corps Band
• Access to the Virginia Military Institute Band
• Access to the US Cavalry Brass Band
• Play the Tuba, Saxhorn, Cornet, Bass Drum, or Trombone
• Use the Tambour Major Baton and lead your band
• Experience historically accurate, professionally recorded music.

Show your support for the game and enhance your gaming experience with the Supporter Pack DLC. By purchasing the Supporter Pack, you'll be directly contributing to the development of new features for Battle Cry of Freedom.

name: Project: 2.D.A.A.S.
detailed_description:
Overview

Project 2.D.A.A.S is a experimental 3D action-adventure brawler with a unique limb-based combat system. In this game you explore the EZON complex a mass production and distribution facility secretly gone rogue in the shoes of 2 fools.

Smash, Bash, and Mash your enemies

Project 2.D.A.A.S. utilises a unique physics based limb system where you can disable, dismantle and destroy your enemies, the limb system allows for dynamic flinch and ragdoll to allow for the satisfying feeling of weight and impact to every hit.

Explore the rogue EZON facility

Explore the facility after a secret robot revolution and discover the madness and shenanigans of the facility formed from laziness and incompetency.

name: Access Denied: Escape
detailed_description:
In the future, people no longer trust computer networks and prefer to use physical devices to store important information. You are a professional hacker of such contraptions. However, your latest job didn't go according to plan, and you're now locked in a scientist's laboratory. In order to escape, you need to not only complete the work, but also uncover the secret of this place.

Access Denied: Escape is a 3D device-hacking puzzle game. Unlock the information stores, examine the devices around you, and use the notes to learn about events that took place here. Use your wits and powers of observation to discover the secret hidden within the walls of this laboratory. After all, it's the only way you can get out of here alive!


  • Explore the lab in first-person view;
  • More than 25 information stores that you must hack;
  • Various devices and mechanisms that you can interact with;
  • Explore the surroundings and the notes left behind to uncover the mystery of this place.

name: Orb Devils
detailed_description:
Deck Building Roguelike with a twist!


A somewhat standard Deckbuilding card battler! Attack enemies, Gain Block, Get Cards/Relics, Remove Cards, and kill enemies! However, you can use your cards on more then yourself and enemies:

Use Cards on Status effects!
Damage your Bleed to remove it or at least soften the blow! Heal your own Might to deal even more damage! Heal enemy Bleed to make them die faster!



Use Cards on Enemy intentions!
Destroy enemies attacks, Offense is the best Defense!



Use Cards on Relics!
A relic that lets you use 1 card on all enemies? Great for a deck around building up one super strike! A relic that lets you save a card for next turn? Could help with all sorts of combos. Find all sorts of "Active" relics!



But most importantly...

Combine Card Orbs via Keywords!


Use Cards on Cards! Cards will have all sorts of keywords that change how they work.

Potent cards will double all Healing and status effects on a card! Useful for stacking all sorts of effects!
Cheap cards will cost 2 less then they would otherwise!
Unstable cards double all their effects, but can only be used once.

These effects are great on their own, but even more powerful when put on another card! Plan your deck around powerful combinations.

Original Card

After some Combining!

Stages and Progression

Progress through the many stages with multiple characters to see and use.
Each stage will contain it's own story beat and challenges.

Real Talk

This game is made by 1 solo developer who just really likes card games who truely hopes you have a bit of fun playing this silly little game!

name: Trance, Trauma
detailed_description:
Who Are You?

A woman who killed herself.

Where Are You?

In 3 surreal hexagon rooms.

What Are In These Rooms?

Secret messages to decode, hidden clues to jot down, Morse code to translate, equations to solve ... and around 2 - 3 hours of unique, hand-crafted puzzles that will put your problem-solving skills to the test.

Why Are You Here?

To uncover a tragic incident and the events that led to my death.

What Else?

  • A parrot to feed
  • A piano to play
  • A plantable seed
  • A picture to take
  • An ear to listen
  • A heart to give
  • A chair on the floor
  • And many more
  • (No cats)

name: Rabbi-T
detailed_description:
You are Rabbi-T, the latest Rabbit Robot developed by Wilson Company, the leading toy company of the time.
Your mission is to subdue the giant robot 'ACTO' that is going on a rampage in an underground incinerator.
Get to the top of his head in a blink of an eye using your specialty, running. And hit his weakness, the red button.

Incinerator will be full of obstacles, and ACTO will create a number of creative disruptions.
Fortunately, you have a powerful punch that can blow them up.
Keep an eye on the obstacles as they approach and punch them out.
Destruction of the obstacle will give you higher speed.
The faster you run, the faster ACTO falls.
The number of electronic carrots you will receive will increase as well.

name: ToyLand
detailed_description:
Help Hana, who has fallen into the world of abandoned toys, 'Toyland', return to the real world!!

If you defend at the right timing of the enemy's attack, you can parry, and you can create a command attack by combining weak and heavy mouse attacks.

Combine the attacks to defeat the toys and the boss King Crown that attack one, and listen to the story behind them!!

Toyland is a 3D back view hack and slash game where you advance while defeating the waves of enemies. Feel the cool action feeling in Toy Land!

Do you remember playing with your eldest son when you were little?
If you remember playing with toys, where are the older boys now?

Here is Toyland, a world of toys forgotten and abandoned by their owners!

- This game supports operation through a gamepad.

name: Lovelorn sanatorium Ⅲ-Patch
detailed_description:
This is a spoof plot puzzle game. Click the dialogue to advance the plot. There are many puzzle-solving levels in the game. You can find props by exploring and solve puzzles according to the game prompts.
The game continues the game setting and gameplay of Sufferer Rescue Center 1.
The story of the new game tells that the protagonist Zhang Ji went bankrupt after another failed mission. In order to pay the rent to make ends meet, he had to go to a convenience store to work. But when I went there, I found that only I was on duty at night in the convenience store. It turns out that the guests who come at night can be said to be strange and even haunted, and the new stories in the game are staged among these guests.
The game adopts dynamic comic performances, with rich pictures and simple gameplay, combined with mini-games to solve puzzles, the overall story plot is humorous and contains many popular hot spots. If you are familiar with Internet culture, you will like this series of works more.
Loading the secondary DLC can unlock more side missions, and playing the game normally can unlock other character exposure resources

name: Golden Legend -Harald Quest-
detailed_description:
* Story
The northeastern part of the Elstra continent, it is a legendary land called "Adventure World".
Adventurers who pursue dreams and wealth gather to create a new legend.
This is where the story of mercenary-turned female warrior blonde Harald begins.

* Content
Sandbox SRPG

* Control
Left Click: Confirm
Right Click: Cancel, Move in Combat/on Main Map
Directional keys: Move on Main Map
ESC: Menu


·Adventure
Experience the life of a mercenary with a high degree of freedom, create your own mercenary group, and explore the continent.
Dungeon, business, quests, crime, prostitution... how you live is up to the player.
The game has a loop system. When the heroine dies or visits a special NPC, a new loop starts.
NPCs that die once cannot be revived in the current round, but all events are reset again in the new loop.

・Mercenaries
The heroine meets various NPCs on her journey and creates a mercenary group.
Different events will occur depending on the type of NPC in the mercenary group.
(*Even you could sell your companion to a slave trader. Yeah, you can do that!)

·Battle System
Combat takes place in real time.
The player gives orders as the leader of the mercenary group.
Mercenaries, including the heroine, will automatically fight based on their orders.
Whether or not it goes well depends on training and the combination of mercenaries.
One of the charms of this game is seeing how the slightly clumsy NPCs fight with different tactics.

・H Scenes
Defeat H, Prostitution, Rape, etc.
In addition to the heroine, multiple female characters will appear.

name: Beast Vs Legends
detailed_description:
"Embark on a grand adventure in a dark fantasy world filled with mythical beasts and legendary heroes. Assemble your army of powerful beings and rise up against the fearsome creatures that threaten the land in "Beast vs Legends" by RC UNITECH.

Choose from five unique characters, each possessing their own set of magical powers that can be unlocked and upgraded through challenging battles and quests. With each upgrade, your characters will become stronger and gain access to new and more devastating abilities that can turn the tide of any battle.



Your mission is to gather the scattered legends across the vast open world and bring them back to safety before the beasts can harm them. Explore the immersive and atmospheric environment, filled with hidden treasures, daunting obstacles, and epic battles that will test your skills and strategy.



In the ultimate showdown between good and evil, unleash your magical powers to defeat the beasts and protect the legends. Create your own epic battles by selecting the number of beasts and legends and watch as they engage in intense and exhilarating combat. Will you be able to lead your team to victory and emerge as the ultimate champion?

Experience the power of magic and nature in "Beast vs Legends," the ultimate RPG adventure for players of all levels. With stunning graphics, fast-paced action, and immersive gameplay, this game will transport you to a world where the fate of the land rests in your hands."

name: Revenant
detailed_description:
Revenant is a 2D pixel-art style shooting game set in the near future.
Enjoy the fun of the main character Beta sweeping away his enemies to get freedom!

Different than typical 2D shooting games, We have a unique system called "Precise Aim"
The hit detection only occurs when the cursor is aiming enemy's hitbox.

With this unique system, you can enjoy our energetic battle!
Thanks!


This is chungkang college of cultural industries graduation project.
Sorry for a lot of bugs :(


Contact us
Team Leader - Hwanjin You
meiroo2@naver.com


-Special Thanks-
KOR->JPN - Masa Kei

name: Ocean Man
detailed_description:
This is a role-playing turn-based game. In the game, you will play a captain and lead your team to explore the ocean and find the treasure! You need to sail in the ocean, explore different islands, sometimes encounter sea monsters. You will find new partners, expand your team and adventure with them.

Feature:

  • Beautiful Ocean

The real and fantasy sea, your ship sails on the sea,
Different weather and day and night systems make you immersive.




  • Ocean Adventure

There are many different marine life in the sea,
Including dolphins, turtles, sharks and more than 20 kinds of creatures,
Some sea creatures will frighten and run away when they see you,
There are also some sea creatures that will actively attack you,
You can even capture them as partners,
Make sea adventure more exciting and fun.




  • Many Game Modes

A variety of different game modes, such as island exploration,
ocean battle, sea monster challenges, and more.




  • Pet Systems

The pet system is very special, each pet has different characteristics,
Some are born geniuses, some are late bloomers, with Superman cards,
It can be said that there are many ways to play, and there are many different genres.




  • Global PVP

The game contains the function of global PVP,
Players can duel with players from all over the world,
Further deepen the interaction between players.

name: Words of Wisdom
detailed_description:
The game tells the story of a poet who must be released from prison.To get the hang of this game players will have to equally use their wits and fingers — in order to survive the questions of deadly jester, disappearing platforms and hidden deadly spikes.

2D pixelart adventures of our witty hero will require everything you have to survive different kinds of puzzles and challenges. This game grows on you with every completed room and quest — and there are plenty of those too! If you’re looking for the nostalgic feeling of old-time goodies, search no more. Words of Wisdom will help you to experience both sides of any good puzzle: physical and philosophical. Are you ready to get challenged by our game?

The main feature of Words of Wisdom is stylish, pixel graphics, a lot of rooms for the passage of which you need to solve problems invented by a witty buffoon.

name: Cat Engineer: Electricity Adventure
detailed_description:
In the game, you'll play as a cat engineer and travel to different countries such as Hong Kong, Taiwan, Egypt, and more, each with its unique house styles and layouts.

Each country in the game is comprised of multiple houses that need to be connected with power lines to provide electricity. Each house can be connected with up to 8 power lines, and can only be connected to houses that are directly adjacent to it, either vertically or horizontally, without diagonal connections. Additionally, each side of a house can only have a maximum of 2 power lines connected to it, so you'll need to carefully consider your connections.

There are also special tools in the game, such as tools that can change the direction of power lines, which can help you adjust the path of the lines to connect the houses; and tools that can increase or decrease the amount of electricity each power line can provide to the houses, ensuring that each house has enough power supply. You'll need to cleverly use these tools to strategically plan your power line connections and ensure that every house has enough electricity.

The goal of the game is to connect all the houses together and ensure that each house has sufficient electricity. When you successfully connect all the houses and make sure they all light up, the game will end, and you'll be treated to the visual effect of the power lines lighting up, giving you a sense of accomplishment as a cat engineer.

"Cat Engineer: Electricity Adventure" is not just a puzzle game, it combines house layout, power line connections, and electricity supply strategy, providing a challenging and engaging gaming experience for players who enjoy puzzle and strategy games.

CONNECT CABLE TO LIGHT THE WORLD UP

Place and remove connection to make every house light up. But, be careful and don't overload the electricity, each building would have different maximum supply.

120+ PUZZLE TO COMPLETE

The main levels will take you through around the world, you can feel relax and enjoy the scenery during the puzzle. The puzzle will burn you brain even you smart like the catgineer.

SPECIAL MECHANICS

Use mutiplier can mutiply the eletricity to the building. You can transmission the power by tunnel. Redirect the electricity by using redirector, and tons of feature and spacial mechnics in the puzzle. Bring the light to everyone!!

WHOLESOME VIBES IN FULL OF GAME

The puzzles are difficult but the vibe is wholesome, we have the collection comic book after finish each world.

SPECIAL MECHANICS

Use mutiplier can mutiply the eletricity to the building. You can transmission the power by tunnel. Redirect the electricity by using redirector, and tons of feature and spacial mechnics in the puzzle. Bring the light to everyone!!

WHOLESOME VIBES IN FULL OF GAME

The puzzles are difficult but the vibe is wholesome, we have the collection comic book after finish each world.

name: The Last Castle
detailed_description:
"The Last Castle" is a lightweight tower defense Roguelite game, the game has a unique rotating castle mechanism, rich weapons and equipment systems, resist monsters, and reach the Holy Land of Eden!

Unique rotating castle mechanism, using defensive towers and skills to resist monsters

Rotate the castle, turn the defense tower to the most suitable position, and use the wall to resist incoming monsters. Release skills at the right time to reverse the situation!

Diverse defensive towers and skill equipment

Different defense towers, core skills and castle modules can be obtained in the game, and different equipment combinations can bring completely different combat experiences. According to their characteristics and your fighting style, find your own castle configuration!

Map Exploration and Reward Upgrade

Each continent has different route nodes, plan and explore reasonably, get rewards and upgrade your castle and equipment. No route is perfect, and reasonable choices and planning are the key to moving forward!

Featured

· The unique rotating castle mechanism brings a unique combat experience!
· A variety of defensive towers, core skills, castle modules, completely different combination constructions.
· Different types of enemies, interesting map agencies, and rich combat strategies.
· Each round is random data, and each game is a new start.

name: RAIDS Inc.
detailed_description:
CLIMB!

At the very beginning, you are an unknown, weak&poor vagabond on a mission to raid some bizarre towers.

FIGHT!

Houston, we got a problem :) There are residents - dangerous, but fascinating monsters! The game's combat system is a fast-paced combination of Hack'n'Slash, JRPG, and HoMM mechanics.


As you ascend higher and higher... plundering the towers one by one... you will encounter more formidable and more cunning creatures.
Each new creature challenges your way of managing the battle.

TAKE REWARD!

Defeated monsters hide in the shadows... here are all the benefits - gold, experience, LOOT!

GET STRONGER!

Level up. Improve attributes. Upgrade skills. Customize inventory.

HALL OF FAME!


All the towers are plundered? Was Ego Draco defeated? Congrats! Welcome to the "Best Raiders" ranking table! Can you plunder all the towers in fewer days next time?

name: Cursed Halls
detailed_description: Cursed Halls is a heart-pounding horror game where you find yourself trapped in an abandoned school, stalked by an unknown creature. Each playthrough is unique, as essential items required to unlock exits and escape are randomized throughout the dark, maze-like corridors and classrooms. But be warned: death is permanent, and any misstep could lead to a gruesome demise. With a tense and eerie atmosphere, randomized object placement, and permadeath gameplay, Cursed Halls will push you to the brink of your fears. Do you have the courage and cunning to escape this schoolhouse hell?

name: Rootman: Bodycam Horror Footage
detailed_description:
Find out what happened
On October 26, 2005, a strange call came to the police at night. In the application, the owner of the house said that some dark figure was watching him from the forest, and strange sounds were constantly heard in the house, as if someone or something was crawling along the walls. Police officer Harry Whippet went to this challenge. Nobody saw him again. Only a week later, footage from a police officer's body camera was found.

Learn about Rutman.
This is a monster that lives in the dense dark forests of a small town. Rootman tortures and kills everyone who wanders into his domain. The legend speaks of murders, cursed artifacts, and the supernatural behavior of trees. It is said that its roots go deep into the earth, and Rutman's body consists of twisted gnarled branches and roots. No one knows how old he is and where he came from, but the townspeople are still afraid of him. He has the ability to manipulate surrounding trees and plants, using them to trap his victims. It is said that, once in its grasp, the roots tightly wrap around the body, squeezing the life out of the victim. The town lives in fear of Rootman, never going too far into the forest for fear of encountering the monster. It is said that on quiet, moonless nights, Rootman's whisper can be heard through the trees, reminding the city of his omnipresent presence and of the danger lurking in the forest.

Play with the body camera effect.
Experience realistic camera shake, sound and visual effects. Feel the incredible effect of immersion and presence in the center of events.

Feel the horror.
In the game you will find a tense atmosphere and suspense. And sometimes you have to jump up and down in your chair.

Try demo and add to wishlist!
For now, you can play a short demo, or rather a prototype, that was created by me and my wife at Global Game Jam 2023. If you like the demo, we will make a full game out of it.

name: FUZZ
detailed_description:
The last seed of a decayed forest journeys to breathe life into the stolen paradise. In FUZZ you'll fly through a land of whimsical nature and lost technology, engage in fluid aerial combat, and use the world around you to unlock new areas and conquer challenges.
* Gather the forces of nature, technology, and spirit by flying through the environment and pulling items and elements into your Gale.
* Use the Tether to tie objects together or pull things apart.
* Travel to 5 unique environments, each full of new challenges, new weapons and tools, new ecosystems, and old mysteries.

name: CardShark
detailed_description:
CardShark is a roguelike card-battler game in which you take the role of a young daring shark, seeking adventure. Battle your way through each floor of a dangerous dungeon in an endeavour to reach the bottom...

Gameplay & Features

  • Turn-Based Combat requiring strategy and wit to outplay your opponents
  • Many different enemies and bosses to fight your way past to further your conquest
  • Randomly generated dungeons, for a different experience every playthrough
  • A vast array of different abilities to forge various interesting combinations with

CardShark takes the idea of drawing from an ordinary deck of playing cards, and depending on the card suit/number value, they can be used to activate various different abilities. These abilities you will find more and more of along the way while battling your way through the dungeon floors, allowing you to experiment with different combinations and builds in an attempt to yield better results while venturing through the depths, wiping out anything that may stand in your way.

name: Fabulous Field Trip
detailed_description:
Fabulous Field Trip is an island excursion game full of learning and fun suitable for children aged 9-12 and adults of all ages.

Upon your arrival on the island, you visit the clothing store, where you can change your appearance and choose your outfit from a selection of 100’s of beautiful and unique combinations. You can return as often as you like and even save up to 9 of your favorite outfits on an intuitive wardrobe ring enabling you to switch instantaneously. When you leave the clothing store, your next destination is a visit to the exciting museum of history and art. Marvel at the beauty of 88 fantastic paintings you will appreciate and learn to recognize; pass through the dinosaur room to see the fossils of 13 amazing dinosaurs and enjoy the more than 40 fantasy artifacts in the animal artifact room. Next comes a visit to the museum café for some refreshments and extra energy with a free coffee or cappuccino. And while you’re there, enjoy the challenging puzzles and games at each table!

At your leisure, you may visit the aquarium filled with over 69 different types of fish and marine life wonderfully animated in glorious detail before you visit the adjoining insectarium with 50 various insects you can learn to identify. Then, enjoy an afternoon in the blissful botanical gardens filled with 64 different types of beautiful flowers. And no excursion would be complete without a visit to the disco with its fun arcade games, delicious ice cream cones, and fantastic board game room.

The island is filled with 42 fun games, challenging puzzles, and extra activities that will keep you coming back for more:

  • There are 3 different word games to help expand your English vocabulary: Word Search Cube, Flower Power, and Morse Code Master. The latter also teaches how to send and receive Morse code.
  • There are 8 different memory games, such as Touch Tones, Disco Dance Battle, Match'Em Up Flowers, Match'Em Up Dinosaurs, Match'Em Up Marine Life, Match'Em Up Insects, Match'Em Up Paintings I, and Match'Em Up Paintings II. These games are ideal for helping improve short-term memory, visual attention, spatial memory skills, and naming skills.
  • There are 3 different math games, Kakuro, Mathdoku, and Mahjong Math. These games help development using clues, problem-solving, reasoning, and mathematical intelligence.
  • There are 5 different types of logic puzzles to solve, including Nonograms, Japanese Number Game, Tic-Tac-NO, Islands in the Sea, and Stempelspel. These games help you think critically, develop logical reasoning and analytical skills, quick-thinking skills, and improve concentration. In addition, they offer a great way to make problem-solving development fun.
  • There are 9 different puzzle games, including Jigsaw Puzzles, Marble Solitaire, Warehouse Worker, Knights Tour, Circuit Schematics, Chemical Compounds, Connect the Dots, Magic Color Cube, and Where’s My What. These types of games help improve reasoning, planning, and visualization skills.
  • You may also challenge Skyla Skunk to any of the 6 board games in the board game room, including 4 In A Row, Checkers, Chess, Backgammon, Gomoku, and Moor of Venice. Each game has self-adjusting artificial intelligence as you win or lose, and all can be played locally with a friend. These games help develop abstract reasoning and strategic thinking skills by encouraging you to recognize patterns on the gameboard and develop strategies based on those patterns.
  • There are also 4 casual just-for-fun activities like Painting for Fun, Groovy 8 Ball, Bubble Wrap Popper, and Chattering Teeth. Having better imagination skills and using the imagination effectively and deliberately can be the key to having a successful and happy life.
  • Are you seeking a little more thrill and action? Try out the collection of 4 arcade games, including HOPPER, Block Blowout, Falling Tetrominoes, and MOP: Operation Cleanup. These games help improve visual attention, sustained attention, reaction times, and focusing skills.

You are never too old for a field trip. Besides being great for children, the dozens of games in Fabulous Field Trip and the different difficulty levels for each game make them suitable for players of all ages. They can readily be enjoyed by senior adults who wish to challenge their minds. Playing mental games and exercises may not stop Dementia or Alzheimer’s when diagnosed: still, studies have shown that brain exercise throughout life can help to build a healthy reserve of brain cells and connections. This can minimize the risk of Dementia, and they are also the key to slowing down the negative impact of Alzheimer’s. Mental puzzles can also help to calm the mind and keep stress and anxiety at bay.

We hope you enjoy your Fabulous Field Trip!
about_the_game:
Fabulous Field Trip is an island excursion game full of learning and fun suitable for children aged 9-12 and adults of all ages.

Upon your arrival on the island, you visit the clothing store, where you can change your appearance and choose your outfit from a selection of 100’s of beautiful and unique combinations. You can return as often as you like and even save up to 9 of your favorite outfits on an intuitive wardrobe ring enabling you to switch instantaneously. When you leave the clothing store, your next destination is a visit to the exciting museum of history and art. Marvel at the beauty of 88 fantastic paintings you will appreciate and learn to recognize; pass through the dinosaur room to see the fossils of 13 amazing dinosaurs and enjoy the more than 40 fantasy artifacts in the animal artifact room. Next comes a visit to the museum café for some refreshments and extra energy with a free coffee or cappuccino. And while you’re there, enjoy the challenging puzzles and games at each table!

At your leisure, you may visit the aquarium filled with over 69 different types of fish and marine life wonderfully animated in glorious detail before you visit the adjoining insectarium with 50 various insects you can learn to identify. Then, enjoy an afternoon in the blissful botanical gardens filled with 64 different types of beautiful flowers. And no excursion would be complete without a visit to the disco with its fun arcade games, delicious ice cream cones, and fantastic board game room.

The island is filled with 42 fun games, challenging puzzles, and extra activities that will keep you coming back for more:

  • There are 3 different word games to help expand your English vocabulary: Word Search Cube, Flower Power, and Morse Code Master. The latter also teaches how to send and receive Morse code.
  • There are 8 different memory games, such as Touch Tones, Disco Dance Battle, Match'Em Up Flowers, Match'Em Up Dinosaurs, Match'Em Up Marine Life, Match'Em Up Insects, Match'Em Up Paintings I, and Match'Em Up Paintings II. These games are ideal for helping improve short-term memory, visual attention, spatial memory skills, and naming skills.
  • There are 3 different math games, Kakuro, Mathdoku, and Mahjong Math. These games help development using clues, problem-solving, reasoning, and mathematical intelligence.
  • There are 5 different types of logic puzzles to solve, including Nonograms, Japanese Number Game, Tic-Tac-NO, Islands in the Sea, and Stempelspel. These games help you think critically, develop logical reasoning and analytical skills, quick-thinking skills, and improve concentration. In addition, they offer a great way to make problem-solving development fun.
  • There are 9 different puzzle games, including Jigsaw Puzzles, Marble Solitaire, Warehouse Worker, Knights Tour, Circuit Schematics, Chemical Compounds, Connect the Dots, Magic Color Cube, and Where’s My What. These types of games help improve reasoning, planning, and visualization skills.
  • You may also challenge Skyla Skunk to any of the 6 board games in the board game room, including 4 In A Row, Checkers, Chess, Backgammon, Gomoku, and Moor of Venice. Each game has self-adjusting artificial intelligence as you win or lose, and all can be played locally with a friend. These games help develop abstract reasoning and strategic thinking skills by encouraging you to recognize patterns on the gameboard and develop strategies based on those patterns.
  • There are also 4 casual just-for-fun activities like Painting for Fun, Groovy 8 Ball, Bubble Wrap Popper, and Chattering Teeth. Having better imagination skills and using the imagination effectively and deliberately can be the key to having a successful and happy life.
  • Are you seeking a little more thrill and action? Try out the collection of 4 arcade games, including HOPPER, Block Blowout, Falling Tetrominoes, and MOP: Operation Cleanup. These games help improve visual attention, sustained attention, reaction times, and focusing skills.

You are never too old for a field trip. Besides being great for children, the dozens of games in Fabulous Field Trip and the different difficulty levels for each game make them suitable for players of all ages. They can readily be enjoyed by senior adults who wish to challenge their minds. Playing mental games and exercises may not stop Dementia or Alzheimer’s when diagnosed: still, studies have shown that brain exercise throughout life can help to build a healthy reserve of brain cells and connections. This can minimize the risk of Dementia, and they are also the key to slowing down the negative impact of Alzheimer’s. Mental puzzles can also help to calm the mind and keep stress and anxiety at bay.

We hope you enjoy your Fabulous Field Trip!
short_description: Fabulous Field Trip is an island excursion game full of learning and fun suitable for children aged 9-12 and adults of all ages.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America

name: Metavaxx
detailed_description:
Develop the ultimate vaccine in Metavaxx, the world's first minesweeper shooter!

Train your own new vaccine in body samples, either by shooting down the virus agents hidden in infected cells, or by isolating those cells, only clearing the healthy cells around them. You win when there are only healthy cells OR only infected cells remaining. Your vaccine's progress depends on how many remaining cells of either type you managed to preserve.

This game features:

  • 🔫 tight shooter action
  • 🧩 classic minesweeper thinking
  • 🤔 strategic decision making
  • 👩‍🔬 roguelike gameplay elements
  • 💪 25 different body samples to cure
  • 🧬 20 unique upgrades to choose after each level
  • 🥼 6 laboratories giving you a unique boost for your playthrough
  • 🎲 randomized gameplay for considerable replayability
  • 🎶 chiptune music by the amazing Pentadrangle
  • 📝 name your own vaccine (and the game)

reviews:
“Metavaxx is a great game, serving as both a decent mishmash between minesweeper and shooter games, and a great introduction to PUNKCAKE Délicieux’s quirky yet bite-sized takes on games”
Indie Hive

“ot only is Metavaxx a combination of two classic styles of gameplay, its roguelike elements give it almost infinite replayability”
Big Boss Battle

“Metavaxx takes a hot minute to get the hang of, but it's incredibly moreish once you do. Despite the fact that I am a terrible, terrible vaccine pilot, I am itching to boot it up again right now”
Rock Paper Shotgun

name: Beat the Humans
detailed_description:
Beat the Humans is a turn-based tactical RPG where you lead a squad of aliens against human invaders. It depends on your choice, tactical and combat skills, whether the free races of the galaxy will be able to withstand the superior force of the human army. Will to take command and try to lead them to victory?

On the map, you have to choose the highest priority targets and balance between the progress of the squad and attempts to weaken the enemy. Rob spaceships, free prisoners or destroy monsters on abandoned asteroids. When you enter combat, you take control of your squad directly. Use abilities, grenades, teleportation, melee and ranged weapons in turn-based combat to destroy the enemy with the least losses and get a reward.



  • Build and upgrade your own squad from a custom set of generated heroes.
  • Fight in complex turn-based battles by combining the skills of your heroes.
  • Control the galactic system by using the enemy's vulnerabilities in time.
  • Collect artifacts that give you an advantage in battle.
  • Choose your own tasks based on your current needs and the state of affairs on the map.

name: Monster Battle
detailed_description:
"Monster Battle" is a fun and charming roguelike deckbuilder game featuring a colorful cast of cute monsters. Players will journey through a randomly generated world, using their deckbuilding skills to collect and train an army of monsters to defeat dangerous foes and reach their ultimate goal. With fast-paced, turn-based battles and a constantly changing world, "Monster Battle" offers a fun and challenging experience for players of all skill levels. The cute and playful art style, combined with the deep and engaging gameplay, make this game a joy to play for fans of roguelike deckbuilding games.
  • Resource Management: Manage your resources carefully to acquire new cards and abilities, and improve your chances of survival against the enemies of the night.
  • Customizable Decks: Build your own custom deck of cards by selecting from a range of powerful abilities, equipment, and allies, and tailor it to your preferred playstyle.
  • Unique Enemies: Battle against a variety of enemies that pose different threats, including undead creatures, hunters, and other supernatural beings.
  • Evolving Gameplay: Over time, new cards and abilities become available, making the gameplay richer and more complex as you progress through the game.
  • Multiple Paths to Victory: Discover different strategies to defeat your enemies and emerge victorious, whether through combat, diplomacy, or stealth.
  • Beautiful Artwork: Enjoy stunning artwork that captures the dark and brooding atmosphere of the vampire world, from haunting landscapes to terrifying creatures.
  • Replayability: With a wide range of cards, enemies, and game modes, the game offers high replayability, providing hours of entertainment for both casual and hardcore players.
  • Easy to Learn, Hard to Master: The game is easy to learn, but hard to master, making it accessible to players of all skill levels, while still providing a satisfying challenge for experienced players.
