name: Periculum
detailed_description:
Periculum is a casual (turn-based and real-time) strategy game in which you conquer hexagonal tiles and build your empire on them. Gather resources (such as Gold, Wood, Stone, and Fish), construct buildings, and erect walls to strengthen your empire. Choose from different game modes and engage in epic battles against bots or challenge your friends to see who comes out on top. With an extensive range of options (similar to a sandbox), the possibilities are endless. Take your strategy to the next level by creating your own maps in the in-game level editor. The game is easy to learn, but with customizable settings, it can also offer a challenging experience. Playable with a mouse & keyboard on one screen or with motion controllers through virtual reality.

8 Players (multiplayer)
You can play with up to 7 other online (or local) players or bots.
Choose one of 8 colors and maybe even team up with some friends or bots.
You and your friends can also play on your own custom levels/maps.

More than 7 Game Modes to choose from:

  • Default: Whoever is the last player who owns a hexagonal tile wins the game.
  • Capture the Flag: Capture enemy flags but don't lose your own flag or you will lose the game.
  • King of the Hill: Hold the hexagonal tile in the middle the longest to win.
  • Economy: Be the first player to collect a chosen amount of resources (decide between Gold, Wood, Stone, or Fish).
  • Conquer: The first player to conquer a defined amount of hexagonal tiles wins.
  • Regicide: Every player starts with a king, which he can move around but if the king is lost, the game will be lost too. The last player with a king left will win.
  • Battle Royale: With or without loot scattered around the map which can be collected by a player. The map shrinks over time until only 1 hexagonal tile remains. Whoever owns the last hexagonal tile wins the game.

Customization and Level-Editor

Build your own custom level/map with the Level Editor and share it with your friends.
Customize your gameplay with numerous options available to suit your preferences. Adjust resource lifespan, troop limits, and map visibility (whether the entire map is visible or must be discovered first) to tailor the game to your liking.

Buildings

  • University: unlock exciting upgrades for your army such as more damage or armor.
  • Marketplace: trade your collected resources with other players.
  • House: accommodates 5 residents, allowing you to train 5 more troops.
  • Wooden walls: can be used to defend one of your hexagonal tiles.
  • Stone walls: twice as strong as a wooden wall.

Soldier types:

  • Infantry: Standard
  • Cavalry: double price, double damage, double health, and can reach 2 hexagonal tiles.
  • Archer: can attack from 1 hexagonal tile away, deals standard damage but has double health. Only reaches 1 hexagonal tile per turn but can be upgraded to Cavalry Archer through University.
  • Cannon: does a lot of damage to buildings or other troops. Can hit a target 2 hexagonal tiles away. Can reach 1 hexagon per turn.
  • (Ships planned In the future)

name: MASKA
detailed_description:
What to do in the virtual world MASKA?


What to do in your free time? Whatever you want! Dance, meet new people or joke with friends. Hot parties every day and you don’t need an excuse to show your moves on the dance floor! Getting bored from all the fun? Start a business, earn game currency and become successful. What’s your ideal world like? Explore Maska! Bonuses, promos, gifts, and, of course, positive emotions!

Your persona

Male or female, brunette or blond. Express your taste and creativity! Come up with your unique look and personality with the help of our advanced editor. Simple but powerful, it allows a quick-and-easy creation or detailed, elaborate appearance, that can impress even experienced lovers or life sims.

Time to party!

You don’t need an excuse to show your skills on the dance floor! Hot parties, cool music and a great mood are waiting for you every day. Learn new moves and impress the crowd!

Relationships

Find a special someone. What will your first date be like? In a club, out for a walk, or maybe at work? How will your story develop? Everything depends on you! Fall in love or even create a family.

Transportation

The virtual word has transportation to support your virtual freedom. Regular cars? Boring! Show your style: gather a full collection from a spacecraft to a magical unicorn!

Interactive objects

Get immersed the help of interactive objects. Unique effects and animations are waiting at the store and around countless virtual environments. Discover them all and have fun on a new level!

Adventures

Every day - new things to do. Finish quests and earn game currency. More adventures - more money earned to check out all the awesome things at the store.

Express emotions

Are you angry, happy or maybe amused? MASKA is a world where everyone can freely express their feelings. With the use of actions and avatar’s facial expressions, of course :) A full spectrum of human emotions is available to choose from.

Real estate

Set up your dream home, whether it’s an apartment or a house. Our intuitive editor has everything you need for building and decor. Unleash your creativity and invite friends to check it out!

Work

Have you always wanted to start a business? Practice in the virtual world! Just decide on the idea and get started. Would it be a furniture store, clothing boutique or a real estate company? Earn game currency, develop your brand and build a loyal customer base.

Shopping

Earned enough - have fun with your money. Explore stores and get what your heart desires: transport, effects, decor and much much more! You can create and sell things too, by the way!

Earned enough - have fun with your money. Explore stores and get what your heart desires: transport, effects, decor and much much more! You can create and sell things too, by the way!
short_description: Welcome to the new virtual reality! Metaverse Maska is a home to interesting people, fun parties, exploration and fulfilling relationships! You create your own world, from your unique persona to their exciting adventures.

name: Saving Mei
detailed_description:
This is a survival game
You will save our hero Mei
At the weekend, Mei and some friends came to an island
The sun is shining and they all have fun
However, when they were having fun, they were attacked by some undead
Can Mei survive the enemy's encirclement and suppression?
In the process of fighting with the enemy, you should not only survive yourself, but also save your best friend
Can you protect your best friend?

Fishing: all kinds of fish

Collection: logging, mining, etc

name: 溯光行 Demo
detailed_description:
◆ World view ◆

For two hundred years, the AI YUAN has been working scrupulously to fulfill duties that she was designed to cover, from submitting to human’s will to providing necessary resources and HashRate. Under the rules made by her, there is no hunger, crimes or wars within the YUAN world. Neither is there any free wills.
The ever-updating and -iterating Yuan has been more perfect than the very original one. Now she is behaving like a god, laying her eyes on humans without being perceived any of her real thoughts. Someone doubts that the Yuan has long since transformed from our servant to supreme God of all things. Finally, the suspicion comes to be confirmed. Then the core of computing has to be shut down forcefully and the world is split into two parts—the outer world and inner world.

◆ Space jump and time control ◆


Yuan seems to be anywhere or nowhere.
- It is able to jump into the space you just briefly visit through “gap of light” .
- Retreat to the back of the monsters you go in hot pursuit and starts a sneak raid, or shuttle in highly sophisticated mechanism, solving problems with clever ideas.

◆ The tow worlds ◆


- Making exploration in the vast area of Yuan and roaming unscrupulously in the world constituted of HashRate.
- Step into the desolated wildness area of Inside world, being addicted to the mysterious past inscribed on a broken stone tablet or wonder around the well-organized streets in the orderly outside world, getting a glimpse into the power of Yuan.

◆ Match enhancement module ◆

- Equip the area under your rule with booster/buff module, which will bring you special combating effectiveness.
- Make your choice from 30 plus powerful modules to form your own unique fighting style.

◆ Stylized scene ◆


- Bored by non-stop fighting? Then welcome to the adventure for new map.
- For this part, players will be put into stylized scenes softly and lightly rendered. The beautiful scenery throughout the journey and the treasures hiding under the stones covered with lush vegetation will make more fun for your exploration.

◆ New skill ◆


- Gain novel abilities such as Momentum Transformation and Backward Slicing in each zone, and master them to take on deadly enemies and solve challenging puzzles.
- Not only limited to combat and decryption, but also allows you to reach areas that were previously inaccessible.

name: Cartel Tycoon - Lieutenants Pack - La Familia
detailed_description:
From what started as a tiendita on a street corner in northern San Rafaela, Raúl, or “Papá Plomo”, and his wife Gloria built an empire dealing in blood, bullets, and, still, the occasional banderilla.

The "Lieutenants Pack - La Familia" DLC unlocks access to a set of 5 Lieutenants and their unique abilities that will aid you in your conquest.


Raúl Reyes - “Papá Plomo” himself, an expert in the manufacture, sale, and use of all kinds of weaponry second, and a family man first.

Family Hammer
This lieutenant’s Power is temporarily increased by 4 while he is fighting alongside his Family.

The Family Business
Make an agreement with this lieutenant for various benefits. (Only accessible if the cartel has all 5 members of the Reyes Family.)


Gloria Reyes - A mother and a manager who will have your business producing, packaging, and delivering more goods for more profit.

The Family Shield
This lieutenant can interrupt an attack by Police, Federals and DEA if there are any other Reyes Family members in the battle.


Katy Reyes - The youngest in the Reyes clan will increase the price of your weaponry at selling points, as well as emboldening her family members on the battlefield.

Heart of the Family
This lieutenant increases the power of all other Reyes Family members in combat.

Weapon dealer
Affects the selling price of weapons at the border where the lieutenant is located, increasing it by 5%

Scaredy Cat
This lieutenant might run away from the battlefield if their endurance falls too low. (Ability doesn't activate if Marco Reyes is in the same combat.)


Marco Reyes - The eldest son and heir to the Reyes dynasty, Marco was born with a point to prove, and he fights like it.

Big Brother Instinct
Disables "Scaredy Cat" ability for Katy Reyes if they're in combat together.


Gaspar Reyes - Gaspar is an expert in driving shipments to wherever they need to be, as well as driving his brother to his wits end... to the benefit of the family, of course.

Enfant Terrible
If Gaspar and Marco Reyes are in combat together, Marco can use "Suppressive Fire" without a cooldown.

detailed_description:
Crusader's March is a casual top-down roguelite with rock, paper, scissors based combat where you have to make sure the correct units are on the front lines lest they be thrown into the proverbial meat grinder. March from castle to castle defeating their owners and taking what's theirs. Grow your army from a handful of units to almost one-hundred soldiers. Upgrade their combat effectiveness with upgrades ranging from armor and damage multipliers to shoot speed and better shields.

Command

Upgrade

Complete Challenges

name: Utopia No.8
detailed_description:
Join the Revolution of Social Gaming - Support Our Game Now!

"Utopia No.8" is a brand new social MMO crafted just for you! We need your support to make this dream a reality! On Kickstarter, you can purchase unique pre-order packages like limited edition in-game items, the one-of-a-kind PIYA pet, and even a chance to join the development team!

Most importantly, your support can help us bring this amazing new world to even more players!

Join this social revolution by backing us on Kickstarter!


About the Game

Utopia No.8 is a planet where your dream comes to life ٩(◦`꒳´◦)۶
Feel free to get connected with global Utokers via the audio or video chat!
You can customize your house and garden with a splash of imagination! If you have a business-master dream, be bold to build the stores, amusement parks or--whatever comes to your mind!
Utilize the collected resources to create clothes, furniture and cuisines. Your brainchildren can be sold at stores, exchanged with others or sent as gifts to your friends!
There is a stage and mic in the bar for you to make yourself heard! If a party is what you go for, let's create a thematic boardgame room now ❤
Say you are not a social person but yearns close pals, keep a PIYA then. This cute partner also backs your creativity-- it collects and produces vital Elemental Energies!
In your leisure time, step into the wild on the outskirts of the City Center and enjoy an exciting day of logging, fishing and resource-collecting!

Unlock a new lifestyle in Utopia No.8!

Unique systems


Customize your designer-toy-like self!

Thousands of look options plus various dyes equal to unlimited possibilities!

There are tons of costumes and accessories from head to toe for you. You can create your own ones if you get the design script!



Thematic audio & video chatrooms

Distance is never the hindrance for friendship in UTO8!

Hop in your interested thematic audio room!

Turn on the mic whenever and wherever you wish to.

Turn on the camera to show your OOTD.

Register an online concert for 100+ viewers since your singing deserves the stage.

If you are not a talky person, it's fantastic to meet and befriend others in mini-game rooms!


Decorate your dream house

Select a piece of land and build your adorable home.

The beautiful and detailed collections of furniture make your dream home come to life!

They are not simply decorations--their functions await your exploration!

Don't forget the garden is calling you! The flower-blooming garden is the perfect place for friends to enjoy a tea party!



PIYA-raising: your intimate pal

PIYA is the chummy companion and the reliable resource-collecting helper.

Grow your intimacy by taking care of your pal, teasing it with toys or sending it to venture out in the wild!

If you PIYA has a warrior spirit--let's go to the PIYA Arena in the City Center to have a friendly match with others!


Be Creative with The Item-crafting System

Get the scripts and materials ready! World Tree sets no limit on your crafting potentials in UTO8!

You can sprinkle your passion on the script and make your unique ideas come to life!

Special effects on items are additional blessings from World Tree—for those who utilize their talents.


Farm, Ranch, Orchard and Greenhouse

The planet welcomes pioneers to explore the undeveloped agricultural and husbandry areas!

Relax, relax, relax in the immersive pastoral atmosphere…

You can share your produce of seasons with friends and neighbors!

Utopia No.8 is a planet where your dream comes to life ٩(◦`꒳´◦)۶
Feel free to get connected with global Utokers via the audio or video chat!
You can customize your house and garden with a splash of imagination! If you have a business-master dream, be bold to build the stores, amusement parks or--whatever comes to your mind!
Utilize the collected resources to create clothes, furniture and cuisines. Your brainchildren can be sold at stores, exchanged with others or sent as gifts to your friends!
There is a stage and mic in the bar for you to make yourself heard! If a party is what you go for, let's create a thematic boardgame room now ❤
Say you are not a social person but yearns close pals, keep a PIYA then. This cute partner also backs your creativity-- it collects and produces vital Elemental Energies!
In your leisure time, step into the wild on the outskirts of the City Center and enjoy an exciting day of logging, fishing and resource-collecting!

Unlock a new lifestyle in Utopia No.8!

Unique systems


Customize your designer-toy-like self!

Thousands of look options plus various dyes equal to unlimited possibilities!

There are tons of costumes and accessories from head to toe for you. You can create your own ones if you get the design script!



Thematic audio & video chatrooms

Distance is never the hindrance for friendship in UTO8!

Hop in your interested thematic audio room!

Turn on the mic whenever and wherever you wish to.

Turn on the camera to show your OOTD.

Register an online concert for 100+ viewers since your singing deserves the stage.

If you are not a talky person, it's fantastic to meet and befriend others in mini-game rooms!


Decorate your dream house

Select a piece of land and build your adorable home.

The beautiful and detailed collections of furniture make your dream home come to life!

They are not simply decorations--their functions await your exploration!

Don't forget the garden is calling you! The flower-blooming garden is the perfect place for friends to enjoy a tea party!



PIYA-raising: your intimate pal

PIYA is the chummy companion and the reliable resource-collecting helper.

Grow your intimacy by taking care of your pal, teasing it with toys or sending it to venture out in the wild!

If you PIYA has a warrior spirit--let's go to the PIYA Arena in the City Center to have a friendly match with others!


Be Creative with The Item-crafting System

Get the scripts and materials ready! World Tree sets no limit on your crafting potentials in UTO8!

You can sprinkle your passion on the script and make your unique ideas come to life!

Special effects on items are additional blessings from World Tree—for those who utilize their talents.


Farm, Ranch, Orchard and Greenhouse

The planet welcomes pioneers to explore the undeveloped agricultural and husbandry areas!

Relax, relax, relax in the immersive pastoral atmosphere…

You can share your produce of seasons with friends and neighbors!
short_description: "Utopia No.8" is a MMORPG with a sci-fi, cute style. Players build social circles, gather materials, raise pet PIYA, build houses or open shops, and unleash creativity to construct buildings.

name: Ugmania
detailed_description:
Ugmania is an open world sandbox survival game with a whole universe full of colourful and quirky planets to explore! Fly between procedurally generated worlds, land on them, mine resources, fight deadly enemies and bosses, spelunk through caves deep underground, uncover ancient mysteries, and discover the truth about your race! With many weapons, armours, and everything in between to choose from, you can play however you want! With lore that doesn't intrude on gameplay, action packed combat, satisfying resource management, and a unique home spaceship system, Ugmania is a new take on the classic survival genre.

Fight!

To get the resources you will need, you have to fight! Every planet presents its own dangers! From hazardous radiation and lava, to deadly slimes and snowmen wielding guns and dumb looking lizardmen! Every now and then, you might be confronted with a more dangerous adversary who will stop at nothing to break your bones and leave you dead!

Gather!

With different tools such as dynamite, pickaxes or capitalism, you can collect the resources that you need to craft better and better gear! Mine rocks, dive into caves to get better rocks, chop trees to get leaves and wood, collect gases from planets, or try to buy your way to victory with the local capitalist villagers!

Explore!

With a whole universe available to you, theres a lot to explore! 7 different planet types with different flora and fauna are out there, waiting to be explored! Every world is procedurally generated, no two are the same! And deep below, you might find something... something strange.

name: Red Knight - Light RPG -
detailed_description:
A short, funny RPG work created with the Unreal Engine!

Story
In a country that seems to be invaded by a demon king, a knight captain is appointed to defeat the demon king.
He needs the Holy Sword to defeat the Demon King.
Get the holy sword and defeat the Demon King!

About game
This is an orthodox command-type RPG.
You are assigned a mission by the king to exterminate the Demon King.
On the way, a wizard girl and a unicorn with healing powers will join you.
It is a short story where you leave the castle, get the holy sword, and defeat the Demon King at the Demon King's castle.
We hope you enjoy this casual, light RPG!

name: LEMURIA - Fantasy Chapter
detailed_description:
This is a stand-alone chapter of the main game, "Sansara Networks". It is set in an Illusory Reality, which the people trapped there, under the influence of a special catalyst, perceive as the real world. This technology is used by the secret services to gently and discreetly obtain information from unsuspecting captives.

In this chapter, Kanta and her companion must traverse a dangerous magical jungle to a teleport located on the roof of an ancient, abandoned temple. Along the way they will encounter aggressive savages, magical traps, crowds of the living dead led by the Necromancer, and several incarnations of the Defeated Dragon controlled by the Necromancer. In addition, a few safe havens await them, where travelers can rest, discuss their relationships, and Kanta can also take care of his spy assignment.

If you like elves, dragons, spells and sly fun summons, then this DLC is for you.

To use this DLC you need a version of the main game at least 1.6.
If this DLC is connected, the chapter "Sansara Networks" will be automatically loaded when the chapter "Half-Life of Gold" is finished. You can also use the "Half-Life of Gold" chapter save and go from there to the start of the "Sansara Networks" chapter.

name: experiment: one
detailed_description:
If you wanted to tell a story, where would you start?

Average game completion time: 90 minutes

All stories start differently. This story is about a girl named Evelyn who works at a helpline.
One ordinary day, her boss calls her and asks her to stay on the night shift.
Not falling asleep at night in the office after a hard day's work is another test. But it is much more difficult in this situation to save lives.

Warning!


Epileptic seizures associated with increased sensitivity to light are possible. Some people may experience seizures when exposed to flashes of light and flashing images that appear in video games. People who have not previously experienced such seizures may not be aware of their illness. A reasonable restriction of the gaming audience is recommended.

Features of the game:
- "Walking Simulator"
- "First person" Psychological horror .
- Expanded system of dialogues, on which the end of the game depends.
- An atmosphere of quiet horror or the calm before the storm.

name: Free Kick Football: 3D Soccer
detailed_description:
Among football games, freekick soccer is very common. You have to shoot and score goals while the Football player builds a barrage. Thus, players can display their skills to stand out in the football challenge. When you freekick, you must spin the ball and shoot your shot. It would help if you made good moves while shooting free kicks against your tough opponents in Football tournament mode. You must be the best soccer star by collecting points when the tournament is over. You have to put up a good fight against tough soccer champs.

Soccer games contain many features while playing. In particular, the football player offers different components to the users among the games played. There are three different football game modes in the game. Among these modes, there is also the freekick game mode. It would help if you took your place among these soccer champs.

You can shoot and train without limits in this football challenge 1vs1 mode. While the football game tournaments are held, the levels are skipped quickly in the freekick sections. Another feature is the change pos feature. The soccer player can adjust the shooting position and score better goals with this feature. The game flows quickly and allows you to spend time in a more fun soccer game.

Football freekick is designed for the user to have a pleasant time in their spare time at desired intervals without time limitation. Scoring a freekick goal will take work after completing the beginner levels. Every time a soccer ball is drawn into the plan, the game level becomes more complex, and the football player builds closer barrages. You have to think well and know your opponent while playing football 3d. You can lose the game if your opponent shoots more goal than you.

Scores are immediately entered after the goals are scored. As a result of the studies and games, freekick game offers you excellent graphics. Since the levels will increase rapidly, football 3d can be easily passed to different stages. Freekick football mode is for you if you like to play football games. You have to take your best shots and be the soccer star of this game.

Users complete the odds after scoring a freekick goal and level up immediately. Thus, it offers a very successful football game without staying at the same level for a long time. In 1VS1 mode, you can make sequential freekick football shots with a friend to make the game more fun. Put on a good fight against your friend and be the soccer star in this football game.

The matches that are desired to take place in this freekick football game are usually decided by the soccer game mod. When the team feels ready for freekick challenge-style rounds by doing their training, they can start the match and enjoy the football game.

name: DCS: F/A-18C Inherent Resolve Campaign by Looking Glass
detailed_description:
Welcome to Inherent Resolve - an exciting and immersive player friendly campaign for the F/A-18C Hornet in Syria.
Join the multinational coalition and fight against ISIS in 13 epic missions, suitable for flyers at all skill levels. With emphasis on experience and gameplay Inherent Resolve puts you front seat inside the world's most powerful military force. Whether flying as part of a strike package or leading your own wing, each unique mission brings a diverse range of challenges and scenarios.

You are Stryker - a likeable and handsome rookie deployed to Incirlik Airbase, Turkey with your wingman “Jazzman”.

This progressive campaign utilises a range of target locations and airfields meaning that you will be bombing some of the best parts of the map!
Aircraft are hot-starts. Mission briefs are quick and easy and come supplied with kneeboards, mission PDFS and associated imagery.

The action piles up fast as you navigate your way through a series of dramatic and exciting mission sets that you will enjoy playing again and again

- Welcome to Inherent Resolve

Key features:
  • Realistic, highly detailed scenarios
  • Immersive and exciting gameplay
  • Simple mission briefs
  • Hot-start aircraft
  • Weapons & waypoints loaded
  • Kneeboard and PDF for all missions
  • Push & Command other units
  • 1,000s of detailed custom voice lines
  • Cinematic soundtrack
  • Fly reconnaissance sorties on the Syrian border
  • Attack enemy airfields as part of a strike package
  • Battle for the Euphrates Dam
  • Destroy critical key oil infrastructure
  • Hunt high value targets with task force zeus
  • Defend against vehicle-borne improvised explosive devices
  • Lead and PUSH flights onto target as you progress
  • Drop bridges with precision using laser guided bombs

Required modules:
  • DCS: F/A-18C Hornet
  • DCS: Syria (map)

Localization:
  • Voiceovers: English
  • Briefings/Subtitles: English

Welcome to“Cut the head off the snake”, where you will incarnate 5 typical characters, explore the unknown world, in the different styles of the world for thrilling adventure.
Game features:
1. Tension.
You have to beat the boss in the allotted time, but in your actions, time is running out, and in many cases, you are just one second away from success. So you have to use your time wisely.
2. Simple UI,
simple operation we didn't set up many complex or meaningless functions
3. A sense of discovery.
We have many maps, you will see many beautiful scenery.

name: Wholesome Monster Girl Academia
detailed_description:
When you get in a fight at your old school defending a monster person from being bullied your school's "no tolerance" policy comes into play. Your parents decide to send you to a private Catholic high school, but it seems things are different in the private schools.

Monster people are still not very accepted in the public very well, but they seem to fit right in within niche communities like St. Thomas Aquinas High School.

Begin a new school year and make friends (and even more) with the local monster girls including:

  • Sera the preppy harpy cheerleader
  • Wren the tomboyish dragon girl
  • Clover the lazy and nerdy slime girl
  • Eva the bratty but religious succubus
  • Aria the punk rockin' half-vampire day walker

Along with a cast of other students and faculty members, you're sure to have a unique experience with this Catholic Christian perspective on monster people and their relation to the world at large.

name: Risk your life to get your dinner back -Nyanzou action game-
detailed_description:
Nyanzou is hungry after playing a lot today.
I came home to eat dinner.
However, dinner was robbed by the ""Dinner Stealers"" who are planning to conquer the world.

Go Nyanzou! Stop the ambitions of the ""Dinner Stealers"" and eat dinner!

"Risk your life to get your dinner back" is a simple jump action consisting of 3 stages.
Overcome enemies and traps by jumping and defeat bosses.
However, Nyanzou will continue to accelerate while pressing the movement button.
There is no speed limit and speeds can reach hundreds of kilometers per hour.

name: Little Bo Reap
detailed_description:
Little Bo Peep has lost her sheep, and now she's out for revenge! Play as Bo Peep in a single-player 3D action-RPG where she's overwhelmed with grief and goes on an adventure through Pastoria. Command a variety of sheep flocks for you to fight your way through hordes of fairy-tale creatures on a brutal revenge quest for the sake of all sheep and animals. Use your necromancy powers taught to you by your old mentor, Baba Yaga - It must be because of all of her evil ways that all of your sheep were killed! Battle, train and learn new abilities to gain an advantage on the big trolls, spitting flowers or kamikaze frogs! Earn their souls to upgrade your abilities and unlock new ways of fighting to fit your own playstyle, such as riding your sheep into battle! You must discover the unique aspects of the land, including solving puzzles, platforming or discovering the long lost skulls. Find Baba Yaga and let her know how much those sheep meant to you, though she might be more prepared than you think!

Construct your sheep into various shapes to help you on your quest.


Lift yourself to the sky by stacking sheep on top of one another.


Crash through walls with your Rams to solve puzzles and unlock cool secrets.


Cast a breeze of Fluffy Sheep into a vortex to overwhelm your enemies.


Launch your sheep at your enemies from a distance.


Collect Souls from your enemies to spend on upgrades for your abilities, or even unlock new ones!

name: SHARKS
detailed_description:
Eat your friends in 'SHARKS' a cross-platform (PC and VR) multiplayer hunting game. Hunt with groups of up to 10 people online. Eat whatever you can to survive and avoid the zombie sharks: last player standing wins. It's like Gorilla Tag with sharks.

The VR controls are super responsive (it feels like a human-shark mind meld): simply look where you want the shark to swim. Pull the trigger to move forward, press the grip button to chomp/eat things. You can also play on a flat-screen using mouse/keyboard or gamepad.

name: 孵化之地 wild eclosion
detailed_description:
You are transported to an unknown land to create a new civilization. You start out weak and grow stronger as you fight.

Random map: Each new campaign will randomly generate birth points and challenge routes to stop enemies before they can raid birth points.

Build as you please: You can use resources to build as needed to enhance yourself, gain some new abilities, or travel to other areas.

Monster fighting upgrade: random terrain, your own building may generate some monsters every day, defeat them to get equipment, resources, make yourself stronger.

Outboard growth: Upgrade yourself with the world points converted from resources you earn per round.

You have proved your ability: you have defeated all incoming enemies and you have been able to lead your own civilization on this continent.

name: Alpaca Sprint
detailed_description:
Alpaca Sprint is an adorable infinite runner featuring one of the greatest animals to ever exist. Inspired by the T-Rex Runner game in Google Chrome, you will guide your alpaca through a series of levels, but beware: many obstacles stand in the way of being able to let the wind soar through your wool!

Featuring simplistic gameplay, a beautiful NES-inspired soundtrack, and wonderful spritework, Alpaca Sprint is a nod to simpler times when the biggest achievement was beating your friends for the best score. Don't worry though: actual achievements still exist, too. Alpaca Sprint also includes local and online leaderboards (online leaderboards may only be available on mobile devices). If retro arcade style gaming is your thing, you'll feel right at home with Alpaca Sprint.

name: Path-Reverse 轨迹逆转
detailed_description:
Brief introduction:

In this game, you'll solve puzzles using the ability to reverse the trajectory of objects in order to reach the end.
In this game, you can also build your own puzzle map.
Players can solve puzzles by reversing the movement of objects through obstacles.

How to Play it:

Play Mode:
WASD move
Space jump
E Grab
Click R reverse the object/exit reversal
Long press R reverse the player
Press and hold the left mouse button reverse the trajectory backwards
Right-mouse button press and hold reverse the trajectory forward

Construction mode:
WASD move
F Switch fly mod
Space fly up
Ctrl fly down
Left mouse button click to destroy the square
Right-click Build Blocks
Mouse wheel to switch squares

Note:

1. As you build your map, PointLight blocks have solids and collision volumes, but only lights are preserved during play, and no collisions and visual solids.
2. Balls, blocks, and players can trigger the pedal switch, but both entities are triggered at the same time and one of the entities will close when leaving.
3. The ‘Platform’ ‘platform’ block is placed without collision volume, and if you want to destroy it, activate it with pedal and receiver and destroy it.
4. Photosensitive epilepsy warning, if you feel unwell, stop playing immediately and seek medical attention urgently.
5. The End Point must existed so the lab can be generated

One more thing:

The game I learned and made in my spare time, although the game is simple to make, the quality is average, the playability is average, starting from how to connect to the programming software, really nothing know to the game engine, engaged in most of the year, if you really don't like it, please refund and delete the game, polite comment!

name: Morte Accendere
detailed_description:
You are one of the special operations team member sent to investigate three quarantine zones. These locations are swarmed with the infected and strange biological creations. The only way in or out is by air and you can request air drops as necessary. Assist operatives already present in the zone and help survivors by solving quests and missions to gather information about what happened. You can gather resources to craft weapons, supplies and build structures for safe hiding. Ability to lay traps to protect against the infected and other threats. Use your special abilities to parkour, defend, and attack either hand to hand combat or the weapons at your disposal.

Features:
  • Parkour Mantling, maneuver through the game world anyway you can.
  • Craft items and weapons to assist in your objectives.
  • Non Linear Quests and story, progress through the game as you like.
  • Single Player or CO-OP with Four other players.
  • Build base locations and protect them with traps.
  • Transportation, move around in a vehicle, bicycle, or a horse to reach your goals.

name: 人妻学園　～営み指導で調教ッ！？ハメ堕ちする清純妻～
detailed_description:
■あらすじ

里中日菜は夫の勝馬を心から愛する主婦。
勝馬と将来生まれてくる子供のため、苦手な料理の克服のため料理教室に通う事を考えていたところ、
「人妻学園」といういかがわしいネーミングの専門学校の存在を知る。
良い妻の育成を掲げた、その学園の面接を受けてみると、とても良心的で通うことを決意する。
しかし、家事だけではなく営みの講習が始まる。講師たちに肢体を貪られる日菜・・・
勝馬しか知らない女の体は、勝馬の妻からひとりの女へと調教されるのであった。

  • 良心的だったのは束の間、狂わせる快楽の講習
  • 勝馬しか知らない肢体が初めて知る他の牡の味
  • 旦那では味わえない快楽は中毒・・・拒めず求めてしまう
  • 怖気づく事実・・・それは快楽の楽園

■オープニング／概要


ヒロイン・里中日菜は、愛する夫・勝馬と幸せな夫婦生活を送っていた。
ただし、人には得意不得意があるもの。
日菜は、苦手な料理を克服したい、と悩みを抱えていた。
・・・美味しくて愛情たっぷりの手料理を食べさせてあげたい。
その望みから料理教室に通うことを考えていた。
ある日、ネットで料理教室を探していたところ「人妻学園」という主婦を対象にした専門学校の存在を知る。
そこは少子化で経営が立ち行かなくなり廃校となった私立学校の校舎を買い取り、再利用している学園らしい・・・
月謝が数万円もする高額な他の料理教室に比べ、２千円と安価な価格設定に惹かれて面接を受けてみることに。
面接を受け説明を聞いてみると、非常に好感が持てる学園であった。
通い始めてしばらく・・・突如追加された「営み」講習。
それを皮切りに、勝馬しか知らなかった女体は他の牡の味を仕込まれてしまう。
一途な清純妻は、淫乱妻へと塗り替えられ・・・快楽の世界へと堕ちていく。

■ 製品仕様

  • ボイス：女性主人公のみフルボイス
  • CG鑑賞モード
  • イベント回想モード
  • メッセージスキップ
about_the_game:
■あらすじ

里中日菜は夫の勝馬を心から愛する主婦。
勝馬と将来生まれてくる子供のため、苦手な料理の克服のため料理教室に通う事を考えていたところ、
「人妻学園」といういかがわしいネーミングの専門学校の存在を知る。
良い妻の育成を掲げた、その学園の面接を受けてみると、とても良心的で通うことを決意する。
しかし、家事だけではなく営みの講習が始まる。講師たちに肢体を貪られる日菜・・・
勝馬しか知らない女の体は、勝馬の妻からひとりの女へと調教されるのであった。

  • 良心的だったのは束の間、狂わせる快楽の講習
  • 勝馬しか知らない肢体が初めて知る他の牡の味
  • 旦那では味わえない快楽は中毒・・・拒めず求めてしまう
  • 怖気づく事実・・・それは快楽の楽園

■オープニング／概要


ヒロイン・里中日菜は、愛する夫・勝馬と幸せな夫婦生活を送っていた。
ただし、人には得意不得意があるもの。
日菜は、苦手な料理を克服したい、と悩みを抱えていた。
・・・美味しくて愛情たっぷりの手料理を食べさせてあげたい。
その望みから料理教室に通うことを考えていた。
ある日、ネットで料理教室を探していたところ「人妻学園」という主婦を対象にした専門学校の存在を知る。
そこは少子化で経営が立ち行かなくなり廃校となった私立学校の校舎を買い取り、再利用している学園らしい・・・
月謝が数万円もする高額な他の料理教室に比べ、２千円と安価な価格設定に惹かれて面接を受けてみることに。
面接を受け説明を聞いてみると、非常に好感が持てる学園であった。
通い始めてしばらく・・・突如追加された「営み」講習。
それを皮切りに、勝馬しか知らなかった女体は他の牡の味を仕込まれてしまう。
一途な清純妻は、淫乱妻へと塗り替えられ・・・快楽の世界へと堕ちていく。

■ 製品仕様

  • ボイス：女性主人公のみフルボイス
  • CG鑑賞モード
  • イベント回想モード
  • メッセージスキップ

name: Purple War - Extra Mission Pack 1: Prelude of War
detailed_description:
Purple War, a supernova that will impact the RTG scene.
The epic of three factions continues with a new DLC ‘Purple War - Extra Mission Pack 1: Prelude of War’. Experience the new campaigns of the Purple War.

Veiled stories of two factions Elf and Orc, their stories will finally be revealed.

Story of the forest
A quiet and noble Elven forest is covered by noise shouted by uninvited guest. Intruders ravaged forest and even invaded the sacred temple of the Elves. Punish the intruders who invade the Elvan realm and defile the forest relentlessly.

Story of the land
Annuindur, a vast grassland where the free-spirited Orcs roamed is now vanished. The land is dried, and the Orcs who lived there are now divided. Unite the chaotic Annuindur in one, defend the land against the enemy who attempts to trample it.

Challenge the exciting new campaigns of Purple War, the beginning of the great war that will decide the fate of the land.

* This DLC contains 5 missions of Elf and 5 missions of Orc.

name: 沦陷
detailed_description:
关于我们

Hello everyone!
This is Magic Studio! We can also be regarded as an independent team at present if you wish :)
We want to create an X-COM Tactical RPG game. In most players' opinion, it may be called a Turn-Based Tactics game.
Such an idea is the singularity of the birth of our very first game FALL OF EARTH. Since the members of our team are players of the X-COM series more or less, we can be sure that the core gameplay of X-COM is extremely interesting — though the somatosensory of the game can be a little bit hardcore.
However, this type of hardcore experience will generally increase the difficulty for players to join us. Based on the intention of hoping we can enjoy the fun of X-COM together with all of you, we made some simplifications and innovations in the early gameplay design of FALL OF EARTH while retaining the key parts of the X-COM game as much as possible.
We are mainly working on [free exploration] and [turn-based combat] in our current version though. In the future, we will release the latest content, gameplay and character design as much as possible while ensuring the progress of game development.
For this game, as well as our first work, we have our own pursuits in all aspects, such as character creation, plot, art style, music and sound effects. Please stay tuned for FALL OF EARTH in this summer.
Deeply grateful for your generous support!

Fall of Earth Team


About the Game

Fall Of Earth Is A Turn-based Tactics Game.


  • X-COM wargame with Tactical RPG
  • Scenario Combat & Elemental Reaction
  • Free Exploration & Camp Building
  • Find the truth and adventure together

In the Fall of Earth, you will play a guerrilla fighter and lead your team to overcome various difficulties.
As the protagonist in the game, you should collect resources, build weapons and equipment, and improve the strength of your team in constant expeditions.
At the same time, you have to pay attention to the jumped enemies and be vigilant at all times in order to survive on the dangerous earth.

name: Dungeon Manager
detailed_description:
Dungeon Manager is a 2D Management / Action game.

In this game, you play as a poor character who has to manage and protect Sparky's dungeon.
To do this, you must manage your monsters and obviously protect the heart of the dungeon.

Dungeon Manager offers the following:
  • 8 appearances for your character!
  • 8 appearances for the enemies!
  • 1 appearance for your allies!
  • 10 weapons, 7 for melee and 3 for ranged!
  • 1 piece of furniture for the dungeon!

name: Krakout (C64/CPC/Spectrum)
detailed_description:
Originally released in 1987 for home microcomputers, this simple twist on an arcade classic genre from British developers Gremlin Graphics saw players take on the challenge of 100 fiendish levels. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version.

Contains the Amstrad CPC, Commodore 64 and ZX Spectrum versions of the game.

Gameplay

Bounce the ball off your paddle to break bricks. Watch out for enemies, which can do anything from freezing your paddle to eating the ball! Pick up useful powerups. There are 100 levels to play through.


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Support for most modern game controllers
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options

name: Elysium Restaurant
detailed_description:
游戏介绍：

你苏醒后，身处餐馆之中。你忘记了自己的身份，记不清往事，这段时间照顾你的人，只有极乐餐馆的店长。然而，你的眼睛似乎出了一些问题，你看不见任何存在过生命气息的东西，包括人、动物、血液、食物。店长似乎有意隐瞒什么，这座餐馆的秘密，餐馆里杀手的存在，还有那九位顾客。你根据每个人不同的特性和身份，分别给他们起了好记的名字：渣男、小女孩、白领、等等。
店长所说的报纸，为什么我需要去拯救这些顾客，通过与顾客的对话渐渐明白了那些道理，明白了这个世界原本的样子。
你在餐馆中需要与顾客对话，并且在对话的选择和谜题的破解中将顾客拯救，以免被杀手杀害。顺利度过第三天，那么游戏将迎来最终结局，你的意识也会被颠覆，你讲明白拯救和“被救赎”的意义。
游戏采用最新引擎UE5研发，画质顶级真实，并且要求配置更低。

开玩提醒：

刚开始进入游戏是谜题模式，如果智商不够的话需要在餐馆的电脑上切换成无谜题模式
该游戏采用类似原神的可选择对话系统，对话的选择会影响到客人对你的亲密度，于是在一天天的日子里，如何讨好客人让他们活下来，破解报纸上的谜题得到杀手刺杀的地点，便是一门十分的学问。

交流和联系方式：

QQ群：754725430

人物一览：

1.渣男:(有点虚，爱学习，爱富婆)
真是本好书，每天看一遍都能学到不少知识

真诚和勇敢永远都是爱情的必杀技

冬天有个保温杯，泡枸杞就是方便

2.哲学家:(暗恋的人死了，从此心也死在这里了)
只可惜故人，何时能再相见

彩袖殷勤捧玉钟。当年拚却醉颜红。舞低杨柳楼心月，歌尽桃花扇底风。
从别后，忆相逢。几回魂梦与君同。今宵剩把银釭照，犹恐相逢是梦中。

如果我不好好吃东西，你还会不会责怪我

3.白领(失业，不会讲话，职场针对)
摆烂并非我意，只是这世代，真难让人顺心

要是有点闲钱，我也不会低三下四地讨要工作。要是还未成家，我也照样潇洒

这桌椅，怎么跟我过不去，刚想吃口饭，它就搞我

4.小女孩(父亲喝酒家暴，后来一次喝多致死了。之后和母亲相依为命，但是母亲没有收入，而且寡妇被欺负。后来就去卖，但是被坑了，一去不复返。在极乐餐馆住下了)
妈妈生日那天送了我这个王冠，这是我收到过最棒的礼物了。只是，妈妈你怎么还不回来

妈妈常说，家庭的不幸，害了我。但是每次有妈妈在我身边，我就很安心

那个服务员大哥哥也是好人，妈妈说，遇到对你好的人，以后要好好报答

5.纯情女孩
总是感到孤独与寂寞，想谈一段恋爱。可是我旁边那个哲学家，却说孤独是人生常态，寂寞是精神上的空缺，奉劝我不要因为孤独而去恋爱。

这顶白色帽子真好看，朋友说我戴上之后气质都变了，看起来很可爱，嘿嘿，真想戴着帽子吃饭呢，他一直都在看着

极乐餐馆的这个位置真的好适合约会呀，真想现在就跟他吃烛光晚餐，可是他还得上班，唉

6.酒鬼
极乐餐馆，，，还不如改名极乐酒馆

我要振作起来，我要，“咕噜咕噜”，酒真好喝，啥都忘了，啊哈，啊哈哈哈哈哈

没人陪我喝酒，我自己也能喝个痛快。之前有钱，好酒随便喝。现在呢，假酒喝着，头痛，恶心，吐。

7.骗子老头
妈的，今天碰到一个年轻人，还把警察叫来了，下次得换个学校

现在学生，女生比男生好骗多了，我就跟她要十块钱打车，她直接V我50

天天举着这个微信支付的界面要钱，没人的时候就抛手机，现在抛得有模有样了，说不定以后不用骗钱了，直接去搞杂技吧

8.老师
我以为当个老师就只是专心研究怎么把学生教好。现在一堆的党务团课，还有繁琐的会议是怎么回事

教小学，书本里的内容真不是重点。老师的言行在这个时间段，会影响孩子一生，正确价值观的树立才是最重要的

家访的时候，父母油盐不进，怎么劝都没有用，真的好心疼孩子，这个年纪就要帮父母干活了，希望教育能在农村多点普及和社会的关注吧

9.高考生
3x+y=4x+8y+12z 怎么还有个z在等式里，我都想学数学老师爆粗口了，说不定爆粗口对学数学有帮助

(猛吸气)卧槽我怎么睡了一个多小时了，我的作业，晕了

感觉考试吧，天天刷卷子把我人快刷麻了。考完我要打游戏，我要玩非人哉

01.杀手(精神收到侵染，含糊不清)
锁定目标，杀杀杀

无法思考，不必思考，杀

请尽情吩咐，主人

02.老板
每天也就记录一下报表，餐厅的卫生情况，以及客人的反馈。大部分客人看中的不是这里的美食，而是这里悠闲安逸的环境

你问我为什么叫极乐餐馆，我该怎么回答你呢，嗯，倒不如不回答了吧。

服务客人，最重要的当然是照顾好客人的情绪，还有，生命。和所有人交谈完后记得下班来找我拿工资。

name: Speedrush
detailed_description:
If you are a developer looking for the Modding API, look no further: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/2307570/view/3722827337084873539

Welcome to Speedrush!
Speedrush is an endless challenging platformer which can be played alone, or with other users. It is the perfect game to use to chill out with friends, to challenge yourself, or to practice your platforming skills.

Mechanics
Spike - Instantly kills you when you land on top of one!

Acid block - Instantly kills you when you either land on top of one, or simply touch the acidic top of the block!

Glue Block - Stops your movement while you are grounded!


Controls
Dash - Acquire a small boost of speed for a short period of time, can only be used once while airborne (Grounding will allow you to use it again).

Run - Move across the map at normal speed on the X axis!

Jump - Jump over obstacles and blocks!


FAQ:
How do I join a friend's server?
Your friend must first be hosting a server, which can easily be done by checking the "Host" checkbox when joining in multiplayer mode, if so, ask them for their P u b l i c IP address, as this is a requirement to connect to the server. Ask your friend to port forward their router if they are comfortable doing so, and ask them to send you the port they chose.

If all these steps are completed, you can open up speedrush, select multiplayer after hitting the play button on the title screen, and enter the info you have obtained into the "Server Address" text box in the following format

{Server Address}:{Server port}

Why do the animations look wobbly?
This is intentional, as the animations are frame by framed.

What engine was used to make the game?
Unity.

name: Cargo Truck Simulator 2023
detailed_description:
Cargo 3d truck game is one of the new generation truck simulator games. It can also be called a cargo transport truck simulator. The truck driver game is an pleasant and entertaining game that offers many advantages to the players. The most distinctive feature is the realistic truck game, a driving experience on rough terrain. With the truck simulator experience, you can reach the cities by passing through difficult roads and highways. You can do your truck convoy intercity, pick up and drop off cargo. Truck driving simulator game provides enjoyable driving experiences for players of all ages.

Truck driving is a game developed as a cargo transport truck simulator. It offers its users both easy access and many advantages. In Truck games, you can transport cargo between cities like a master driver. Truck driving simulator is a realistic game that gives you a truck driver experience. As for the advantages of the Truck games experience to its players;

Multiple truck options for cargo transportation experience, Providing Truck driving pleasure by providing cargo transportation experience, Realistic truck car experience in rugged areas close to nature, Multi-level and time-consuming truck game simulator usage, Difficult terrains to improve the driving experience, Truck that gives pleasant driving to the driver, can be listed as non-driving road experiences.

Cargo 3d truck game is a truck simulator that gives you transportation experience. Truck simulator ultimate has top-quality graphics and cars. Truck game simulator ultimate provides cargo transport vehicle driving experiences like in real life. Before thinking about what truck driving is, knowing what a simulator means is necessary. Simulator, or simulation, means the like of anything non-technical. Its technical meaning is to ensure that the system operates similarly, that is, to imitate. name: Benders of Moona Demo
detailed_description:
Discover the power of healing through the pursuit of mastery in the art of waterbending. Learn new skills, explore a living world full of riddles and mysteries that plague the peace between the material and spiritual world. A hand-drawn 2d platformer inspired by digital oil painting.



Create your own style of waterbending and use it to heal the world around you, learning new skills from masters and spirits scattered across Moona Island.



Adapt to situations in an ever-changing world, help local tribes survive a war between benders and spectral beings locked in the material world, make friends, fight benders of all elements and learn all about the spirits.

name: R-Lyke: Reverse
detailed_description:
Side-scrolling, retro 2D shoot'em'up with rogue-lite elements. Upgrade your ship throughout each mission with a random selection of a wide range of weapons and power-ups against constantly tougher enemies. Survivors-style, reverse-bullet-hell game taken back to its roots.

Quick missions across a variety of environments, from deep space to volcanic caves, against a hoard of ever stronger foes. Collect resources from defeated enemies to upgrade your ship temporarily inside the mission and unlock permanent global boosts afterwards.

Each mission will pit you against waves of bosses as well as hordes of weaker cannon fodder. Every boss is composed of several sections, each of them individually targetable and destructible. Do well enough to trigger that mission's unique final boss.

Four different player ships are unlockable through the core missions, each with their own unique and powerful special weapon, but more ships and secret levels can be found via hidden achievements.

Features a unique vector graphics style for a colourful but retro feel, and a professionally-made synthwave soundtrack.

Join our discord to share your ideas for weapons, ships, enemies and levels: https://discord.gg/uZdRTPwVS7

name: Fremdganger - The Cheating Demon
detailed_description:
Burnt out on the dullness of your play sessions, you voyage into the mountains to seek out a legendary Game Master. However, you quickly regret your decision after his game becomes a tad too real and involves you in an unexpected way...

In Fremdganger - The Cheating Demon, you can:

  • Make meaningful decisions to influence the fate of the protagonists
  • Solve reality-breaking puzzles through the RETURN mechanic
  • Explore two layers of existence: The Storyteller's hut in a 3D first-person perspective, and the tabletop world in a top-down 2D perspective

Immerse yourself and forget your surroundings.

name: Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey - Resource Management Simulator
detailed_description:
Take the journey of a lifetime with Thor and the Vikings! Go to Ancient Greece and help Thor, Hercules’ daughter Alexia, and the other warriors save Midgard from Fenrir.

Fenrir, a giant wolf, is ready to destroy Midgard and all its inhabitants in his rage. Follow Fenrir’s story and explore the source of his immense anger as he sets off on a path of destruction. Discover a thrilling story and find out what made Fenrir so angry that he has resolved to destroy Midgard.

Are you ready to join the Vikings on their epic quest to defeat the Minotaur? You’ll have to prove your worth by solving the Gods’ puzzles. Embark on an unforgettable adventure as you join the Vikings in their mission to bring peace back to the world!

Get ready to embark on a journey to the mythical world of Olympus! Go on Zeus’ quest and find a special flower for the goddess Calypso. Along the way, you will explore the mysterious underworld, meet Hades, and uncover secrets about Cerberus.

name: Bedrock High
detailed_description:
Bedrock High is a Beat 'em Up Action-RPG set inside a modern American high-school. Learn the ropes, throw some hands, meet interesting characters and solve the mysteries of Bedrock High. Either play solo or bring a friend along as a helper.


  • Jump or be jumped in both squad-based brawls and 1-on-1 scraps!
  • Choose your skill upgrades to customize your combos!
  • Collect money and power-ups to aid your adventure!
  • Enjoy a variety of minigames when you're not busy busting faces!
  • Talk to plenty of strange and unique characters!
  • Unravel a story full of mystery and intrigue!
  • Gain the respect of the many cliques that patrol the halls!
  • Become the hero that brings peace to Bedrock High!


Your name is Blake Griffin, and you've just been transferred to the worst school in the district. In this place, no one goes to class, no one cares about grades and, most of all, no one cares about anything except your ability to throw down. If you want to survive in this school, you need to know how to stay in your lane.

But that wouldn't be very fun... would it?

Take on the various cliques, bosses and challenges and solve the mysteries that lie beneath this lost school.


Everything in this game was made by James C Gray.

Special thanks to my friends Baldemar and SheWolfVal, as well as my son for playtesting!

Tools Used to Make This Game:
  • Programming MonoGame / C# / Visual Studio
  • Artwork MSPaint / GIMP 2.0
  • Music LMMS
  • Sound Effects SFXR / Samsung Voice Recorder

name: Containment Search
detailed_description:
Story


Ethan Connor a brave young adult who took his life into his own hands and moved things by moving in a garage complex. The others said he couldn't get his own life under control, so he decided to live for himself.

But!
one fatefull evening he decided to drive to the warehouse. No way he could have known, which dark and cruel secrets it had hiding inside....

The horror awaits you

  • Dark psycho horror experience
  • 3 generators to refill
  • Note every step
  • Endless horror mode
  • A new horror experience for old and new players

The monster is waiting for you


A monster from beyond, that seeks fear and terror just to hunt. The first Reports of this specific Enemy randomly appeared in 2005. It seems to have Aggressive properties and is known for hiding in dark lairs. It is described as slim, dark and with a water tank seated on his Head. It is said it escaped from a Laboratory Facility, but thats all we know, the Presidium for Paranormal Activitys, didnt reveal much about him.

Features:

  • Find youre long since forgetten Deposit Box
  • Find out the truth
  • Look in the terrors eyes

Featuring:

  • A long forgetten place
  • A dark and Hostile Envoirment
  • Collectables
  • 5 Important Items to discover

name: Dusk of the Cage Soundtrack
detailed_description:
생존자를 찾아나섭시다. 희망은 좋은거니까요.

더스크 오브 더 케이지는 좀비들만 남은 세계 속에 살고 있는 자매가 기차를 타고 6개의 도시를 순회하며 각 지역의 방송국을 고치는 내용의 짧은 단편 게임입니다. 전투 페이즈에서 만나면 만날수록 강해지는 적들에게 맞서고, 점점 떨어져가는 무기의 내구도는 탐사 페이즈에서 보충해야합니다!

이 게임은 한국에서 정기적으로 개최중인 게임 대회 '1치킨 알만툴 게임잼 2023'에서 제시한 주제 '연결과 단절'이라는 것에 영향을 받아 만든 게임입니다.

시놉시스

좀비 아포칼립스 세계에 단둘이 살아가고 있던 자매는, 어느날 언니의 제의로 세상을 돌며 구호 신호를 뿌리는 계획을 실행하게 됩니다. 동생은 하고 싶지 않았지만 사랑하는 언니의 제의이기에 어쩔 수 없이 따르게 되고, 언니를 따라 세계를 돌며 다양한 일을 겪게 됩니다.

name: SharkKing
detailed_description:
SharkKing is a roguelike game, where you eat fish and grow.
To eat fish you must lower their health by charging into them and sprinting allows you to do critical damage.
After eating a fish it will drop experience and health orbs on death, each fish gives different amounts and it varies depending on the players level how much experience/health is gained per fish.
Every time the player levels up, new fish will spawn and lower level fish will eventually be replaced with higher level fish.
Fish spawn from outside the map.
Hostile fish, radiation barrels and neutral fish will lower the player’s health and on death the player will be reset back to level 1.
The aim is to reach level 10 and defeat the boss without dying.

You control the shark with W A S D
  • W key to sprint and crit
  • A, D key to turn left and right
  • S key to slow down and be more accurate with you attacks

Features

21 different fish

7 unique fish
5 player shark evolutions
12 achievements

name: Sandbox Skyline
detailed_description:
Build impressive skyscrapers Pixel by Pixel, and protect them from the harsh realities of nature. Each pixel is physically simulated to interact with earthquakes, firestorms, blizzards, and tsunamis. Protect your skyline and expand your territory in this relaxing (yet challenging) sandbox builder.

Grow food to keep your city fed.



Use magical falling sand physics to build.



Put out fires when mother nature erupts.




Features

- 30 playable levels and a handful of different themes
- Up to 20 different pixel materials
- Story, Survival, and Sandbox game modes
- Highly customizable settings and controller bindings
- Cloud Save, Achievements and Leaderboards

name: Pi Fu Fighter
detailed_description:
This is a game that operates multiple fighter planes to fight with the enemy. The main operation of the player is to press the left mouse button wildly and enjoy the pleasure of countless bullets flying to the enemy.

The hangar location is in the upper left corner.




Players need to pick up different fighters for synthesis to obtain stronger fighters with their own special effects.

Enemies are usually displayed in the upper right corner of the map.




The game will be redrawn after the enemy is killed, but the intensity will be different and strengthened.

Your stored buff is on the right.




There are only four buff positions. If you pick a new buff without a position, it will be used directly,

Dead enemies will drop fighter planes and buffs.




Dead enemies are good enemies. After the enemy dies, some fighter planes and buffs will be brushed. Players can choose to save the same fighter planes to synthesize higher fighter planes, or save buffs until a certain number of them are used. The more buffs used at one time, the better the effect



Go and lead your fighters to fight.

name: Lodestar Tower Idle Rpg Survivor
detailed_description:
Play as one of the adventurers who come to the mysterious tower, with the desire to uncover the truth about this place and win the famous treasure. The adventure that awaits you will not be easy. You have to climb to the top of a skyscraper tower, each floor of which is filled with fierce monsters.
Above all, you must face the mysterious and unwelcoming master of the tower.
Try to survive the waves of monsters. Summon them into your party. Build the best squad and get ready for the tough battles that lie ahead. Collect rare treasures. Rescue the beautiful female prisoners being held captive in the tower.

Key Features

- Collecting Creatures.

- Managing party and battle tactics.
- Idle Combat.

name: Modo Defence
detailed_description:
Modo Defense is a strategy tower defense game.
You can obtain various resources by spinning yut, which is similar to a dice, and use them to summon towers, strengthen towers, or use items that give additional abilities.
As a new mountain god, the player must learn how to use the jangseung and treasures and defend the village from ghosts.
Players can freely combine the treasures of Jangseung.
You can build towers that are single-hit or multi-attack.
Depending on how you combine the treasures, the difficulty can be made easier or harder.
You can make the game easier by clearing the map and enhancing your attributes with the stars you get.
Challenge yourself to see how many rounds you can last and which map you can reach!

Spin the yut!



You can get numbers by spinning yut and summon jangseung.
If you're lucky, you might be able to move your piece all the way.


Combine treasures!



Higher tier towers can contain treasure.
Depending on how you combine treasures, it can be additive or multiplicative.
Freely combine treasures!


Various maps!

There are many types of maps.
How far can you beat the maps that get more difficult as you go further?

name: Alien Boom Boom
detailed_description:
Overview:


Welcome to Alien Boom Boom, the face-paced, action-packed FPS that takes old-school gameplay and sensibilities to create a more modern experience. You play as a small-town hero who is suddenly thrust into a world-saving mission when aliens invade your town. Travel the world and even venture into space to take the fight to the extraterrestrial menace. With a wide array of weapons and enemies, no two battles are the same.

Features:


  • Fast-paced FPS gameplay with a classic feel.
  • Fight off hordes of aliens across a variety of locales, from your hometown to space stations.
  • Classic guns with a twist. Use an arsenal of weapons, from shotguns to grenade launchers to sniper rifles and more, to take down the invaders.
  • Dynamic enemy AI ensures that no two battles are the same (listen, all fps single player games ensure no two battles are exactly the same, but it sounds good and it's probably important to have enough bullet points).
  • Exciting boss battle(s) - Only so much one guy can do, but there will be more than one boss battle, unless you think there should be more than two? Let me know.
  • Master your weapons!
  • Skill over Stats. Some guns are inspired by your favorite dusty fps, and others like your favorite rocket jumping, railgun shooting classic. (legal told me not to mention names. I am legal.)
  • Play through a variety of challenging missions and objectives.

Story:


Follow the journey of a small-town hero as they are thrust into a world-saving mission
Discover the truth behind the alien invasion and uncover a sinister plot

name: G-MODEアーカイブス+ 探偵・癸生川凌介事件譚 Vol.1「仮面幻想殺人事件」
detailed_description:
"The Detective Kibukawa Ryosuke Case Tale" Series - Part 1!
Play and Die Online RPG.
Uncover the secret hidden in the game, and its truth.



【Game System】
This is a mystery adventure game in which the player solves a series of difficult cases that occur in a fictional town called Marihama City.
The player controls the main character in the scenario and solves the mystery by selecting commands in the conversation and deduction parts, and by gathering information and evidence that will serve as clues to solve the case.
The story progresses by selecting commands, so even game beginners can easily play the game.

【Story】
This case begins with an investigation into a rumor of an online game that will kill players if play it.
At first it seems like a simple investigation, but one problem after another arises, and the actual case...

Please enjoy the many mysteries woven by complex human characters.

name: G-MODEアーカイブス+ 探偵・癸生川凌介事件譚 Vol.2「海楼館殺人事件」
detailed_description:
The second installment of "The Detective Kibukawa Ryosuke Case Tale" series!
The "Kairoukan" is a strange building surrounded by the sea on all sides.
Inside the building, which is sealed underwater, the curtain rises on a horrifying tragedy.


【game System】
This is a mystery adventure game in which the player solves a series of difficult cases that occur in a fictional town called Marihama City in K Prefecture.
The player controls the main character in the scenario and solves the mystery by selecting commands in the conversation and deduction parts, and by gathering information and evidence that will provide clues to solving the case.
The story progresses by selecting commands, so even beginners can easily play the game.

【Story】
This case is set in "Kairoukan", a strange building in the middle of the sea, which was built by the former chairman of an architectural firm famous for its eccentricities.
The story begins when you are invited to an event to celebrate the inauguration of the building.

name: G-MODEアーカイブス+ 探偵・癸生川凌介事件譚 Vol.3「死者の楽園」
detailed_description:
The third installment of "The Detective Kibukawa Ryosuke Case Tale" series!
Shangri-La, an amusement park named after an ideal world.
In this paradise overflowing with smiles, a banquet in the name of judgment begins.


【Game System】
This is a mystery adventure game in which the player solves a series of difficult cases that occur in a fictional town called Marihama City in K Prefecture.
The player controls the main character in the scenario and solves the mystery by selecting commands in the conversation and deduction parts, and by gathering information and evidence that will serve as clues to solve the case.
The story progresses by selecting commands, so even beginners can easily play the game.

【Story】
This case is a few months after the nightmare of "The Kairoukan Murder Case," the second in the series. The story begins with a visit to his friend, Kibukawa, who is in need of a new story.
At the office after a long absence, a beautiful secretary "Haruna Kikukawa", who works at the popular amusement park "Shangri-La," comes to consult.

The request was for security and investigation into a cult-like threatening letter sent to the amusement park and a spooky prank.
However, Hiroshi Kimijima, the president of the company, wants the matter handled confidentially without informing the police.
Despite their disbelief, Ikuo and Itazura head for Shangri-La.

An invitation from paradise is extended to them by a beautiful secretary. A banquet in the name of judgment begins there.
Are the cries of joy echoing in the amusement park that bears the name of an ideal world, or are they cries of delight? Or is it...?

name: Pasha Planet: Reborn
detailed_description:
“Pasha Planet: Reborn” is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese indie game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters’ daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay.

[Game Overview]

The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins.

Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes!

[Game Features]

  • Created by an indie game development studio in Taiwan.
  • Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay.
  • Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes.
  • Challenging puzzles and stages.

name: G-MODEアーカイブス+ 探偵・癸生川凌介事件譚 Vol.4「白鷺に紅の羽」
detailed_description:
The fourth installment in "The Detective Kibukawa Ryosuke Case Tale" series!
Red leaves dance in the heart of Shirasagi, who was left behind this year.
The story of Sagishima Izuna, the assistant detective, and his unknown past.


【Game System】
This is a mystery adventure game in which the player solves a series of difficult cases that occur in a fictional town called Marihama City in K Prefecture.
The player controls the main character in the scenario and solves the mystery by selecting commands in the conversation and deduction parts, and by gathering information and evidence that will serve as clues to solve the case.
The story progresses by command selection, so even beginners can easily play the game.

【Story】
The case begins with the protagonist, who has lost his memory, waking up in a mountain forest where autumn leaves are flourishing.
She is rescued by a high school girl who calls herself "Taihouin Izuna", and is informed that he is in Momoshiro Village, a small village deep in the mountains of A Prefecture.

Who am I? Why did I come to this remote village? Why did I lose my memory?
As the protagonist unravels her memories together with Izuna, she becomes embroiled in an inheritance problem that swirls around the village....

This is a sad and painful case that leads her to become a detective.

*This work can be enjoyed before and after "Shirasagi ni Kurenai no Hane" (The Egret and the Red Feather).

name: G-MODEアーカイブス+ 探偵・癸生川凌介事件譚 Vol.5「昏い匣の上」
detailed_description:
The fifth installment of "The Detective Kibukawa Ryosuke Case Tale" series!
What's up with this one...?"
An eerie urban legend becomes a nightmare that eats away at reality.


【Game System】
This is a mystery adventure game in which the player solves a series of difficult cases that occur in a fictional town called Marihama City in K Prefecture.
The player controls the main character in the scenario and solves the mystery by selecting commands in the conversation and deduction parts, and by gathering information and evidence that provide clues to solving the case.
The story progresses by command selection, so even beginners can easily play the game.

【Story】
The case is the story of a friend of the game's scenario writer, Masao Ikurumi.
A freelance writer "Renji Mirokuin", who is a writer of occult articles for a living, is assigned to cover an urban legend called "Red Elevator".
The story begins when Renji Mirokuin, a freelance writer who writes occult articles for a living, heads to a condominium where the urban legend "Red Elevator" is said to have originated.

When the elevator is called on the first floor of the haunted apartment building, "BOX" slowly, slowly comes down from the rooftop, which is supposed to be off-limits to visitors.
When the elevator arrives at the first floor, it opens its mouth to reveal a bright red interior...

A strange dwelling full of empty rooms. The residents keep their mouths shut. The "incident eight years ago" is said to be cursed if it is told.
Mirokuin, who pursues the truth hidden in the urban legend, confronts the horror that night.

name: Lovelorn sanatorium Ⅲ
detailed_description:
UPCOMING

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2157680/_/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2331140/_/


About the Game

I am very sorry, because our production capacity is insufficient, and the archive function of the current version of the game is not yet perfect. Multiple file loads may cause a black screen, and restarting the game can solve it.
We are constantly updating and optimizing relevant functions. If you have any other questions, you can add feedback to the group. Thank you for your help!
The current version of the game is not localized in English yet, we are working hard to make an update.
This is a spoof plot puzzle game. Click the dialogue to advance the plot. There are many puzzle-solving levels in the game. You can find props by exploring and solve puzzles according to the game prompts.
The game continues the game setting and gameplay of Sufferer Rescue Center 1.

This work tells part of the story before Zhang Ji established the "Lovelorn sanatorium on the main line. Zhang Ji was originally an ordinary migrant worker, but he suffered a sudden accident, and his only relative died in a factory accident. Afterwards, he was forced to lose his job, blamed for an accident by an unscrupulous boss, and suffered a series of unfair treatment and blows such as telecom fraud, and was arrested and imprisoned. When his life fell into a trough, he met his father's only relic during his lifetime, a talking rabbit, and started the funny work of "Lovelorn sanatorium ".

The game adopts dynamic comic performances, with rich pictures and simple gameplay, combined with mini-games to solve puzzles, the overall story plot is humorous and contains many popular hot spots. If you are familiar with Internet culture, you will like this series of works more.

name: Yukiiro Sign
detailed_description:
A romantic comedy visual novel that occurs one winter in a snowy country town.

FEATURES

  • 20+ hours of story
  • Three branching heroine routes
  • Full Japanese voice acting by seasoned professionals

SUMMARY

This is the story of a single season—

Minamiouse is one of Japan's smallest towns,
located in one of its most frigid regions.

This year's snows are the earliest they've come in decades.
There's change in the air, for better or worse.

With two months left on the calendar, both of them looking wintry,
Munefuyu plans to spend the time with his friends just like always.

There's the taciturn, direct, and somewhat wild Miku,
his childhood companion who's just covering up her kindness.

The shy and eccentric exchange student, Svetlana,
is fresh off the plane from Russia but no stranger to the cold.

Meanwhile, the transfer student Kako Takahagi
has known Munefuyu forever, but he's forgotten her...

Luckily, his best friend and confidante Hironaka has his back.

This winter won't be long, but it won't be forgotten,
and every everyday moment it will look like
a miracle in the rear-view mirror.

It's where we've been and where we're going.

name: Bitfender
detailed_description:
The game takes place in an enigmatic universe where strange things happen... As a small, radiant creature, you are faced with a dire predicament when your companion becomes trapped within a mystical crystal. It falls to you to embark on a perilous quest to rescue them and unravel the secrets of this strange world.

Unique Tower Defense

In Bitfender, you're not just fighting off enemies along a set path like most tower defense games - you have the power to create your own one!



The goal of the game is to protect the crystal by strategically placing units along the created path, and upgrading them to increase their power. Players have access to a variety of units, each with its own strengths and weaknesses. Some shoot deadly arrows, while others wield the power of magic to annihilate their foes.



As players progress through the game, they face increasingly difficult waves of enemies, and must adjust their unit placement and upgrades accordingly. In addition to units, players can also use so called patterns and runes, which can drastically increase the damage output.

Progression

The game features a skill tree system, allowing players to unlock new abilities and enhance existing ones.


Endlessness

Bitfender includes an endless difficulty, where players face an endless stream of enemies and must survive as long as possible. This is perfect for players who want a challenge and enjoy testing their tower defense skills.



The game doesn't end. Players can continue to progress in skill tree to become stronger and compete with other players on the leaderboard!

name: King Clicker League
detailed_description:
Step into the world of classic color-matching with a twist! Introducing our new Steam game, where you can enjoy casual gameplay in short bursts while challenging your puzzle-solving skills. With a central leader board, the competition is fierce and the stakes are high. Simple to play, yet deeply strategic, this game will put your problem-solving abilities to the test. Can you climb to the top of the leader board and claim the title of the ultimate color-matching champion? Play now and find out if you are the King Clicker!

With intuitive controls and a simple premise, this game is easy to pick up but offers endless hours of strategic gameplay. Can you outwit your opponents and become the King Clicker?

Features:
* Colour Matching Puzzle - Match as many colors as you can to rack up points and reach the top of the leaderboards. But beware, if the crates reach the top of the screen, your game is over and your score is submitted. Experience a thrilling yet relaxing challenge now!
* Leaderboard - A central leaderboard stores the scores of all players; see if you can become the #1 King Clicker!

name: Teleport VR
detailed_description:
Introducing Teleport, the virtual reality application that allows you to transport to a wide selection of real world and fictional locations. With Teleport, you can explore ancient Egypt and Rome, medieval times, and even science fiction futuristic locations, all from the comfort of your own home.
Fully stereoscopic 360 VR images provide you with an immersive experience, giving you the feeling of being right there. The images are high resolution and have great depth, making you feel like you are truly a part of the scene. You can look around and explore every detail, taking in the sights and sounds of each location as if you were really there.
The Teleport library of images is constantly growing, so you will always have new and exciting locations to explore. Whether you are interested in history, fantasy, or science fiction, there is something for everyone in the Teleport library.
Experience the pyramids of Egypt and the Colosseum of Rome like never before. Take a walk through medieval times and explore the castles and towns of the past. Or transport yourself to a futuristic city and see the world of tomorrow. The possibilities are endless with Teleport.
Teleport is easy to use and compatible with most VR headsets, so you can start exploring right away. Just select a location from the library and let Teleport transport you there. It's like having a time machine in your own home.
Don't miss out on this opportunity to explore the world like never before. Try Teleport today and start your journey to ancient Egypt, medieval times, and beyond.

name: TSUNDERE MILFIN
detailed_description:
TSUNDERE MILFIN is a unique and entertaining match-3 puzzle game combined with a visual novel story. Players take on the role of a new employee at a corporate office, where the main objective is to make friends with a strict boss who is deeply religious. The gameplay involves solving challenging match-3 puzzles that help the player gain the trust and respect of the boss.

Throughout the game, players will encounter various characters who have different beliefs and personalities, making the journey to befriending the boss a humorous and thought-provoking experience. With each successful puzzle, the player will be presented with choices that impact the relationship with the boss and coworkers.

♥FEATURES♥:

  • Match-3 Puzzle gameplay: The game's match-3 puzzles provide a fun and engaging challenge, that appeals to a wide range of players.
  • Visual Novel Storytelling: The game's visual novel elements allow players to immerse themselves in the story and make choices that impact the outcome.
  • Humorous Office Situations: The game is set in a wacky office environment, with humor and unexpected situations that provide an escape from reality.
  • Character Development: The relationship between the player character and their strict boss is central to the story, and the player's choices impact the development of their relationship, providing a sense of agency.
  • Balancing Work and Beliefs: The game explores the idea of balancing work demands with personal beliefs and values, a theme that is both relatable and thought-provoking.
  • Live2d animations
  • Animated backgrounds
  • Excellent Lofi hip hop by the masterly mind-blowing G374, smth.nothing, Zephyr Deer, of4gatto_feelin, Meloxen ♥

TSUNDERE MILFIN offers a unique and entertaining experience that combines match-3 puzzle gameplay, visual novel storytelling, and office humor to create a one-of-a-kind game.
