name: Tormentis Demo
detailed_description:
Build a challenging dungeon, protect your treasure from attackers and try to plunder the treasury of your fellow players - in this multiplayer ARPG Tormentis.



In this multiplayer game, there are countless dungeons to discover and conquer. Play ready-made dungeons or try your hand at the individually designed dungeons of your fellow players. This unique dungeon crawler always offers you new and unique dungeons with almost infinite loot.

Build your own dungeon from rooms, traps, and enemies and put your tactical skills to the test. Will the attackers be able to reach your treasure before time runs out?



Tormentis offers a class-free hero system with dozens of skills, hundreds of weapons and items of equipment, special legendaries and valuable item sets.

Find the perfect equipment, adapt it with your skills, improve and enchant your equipment, trade it in the auction house with your fellow players and make your hero the strongest warrior of Tormentis.

name: Kurone's Feelings ~Apprentice Witch of Starfall Village~
detailed_description:
Recommended

Use blacksmith skills to create legendary equipment!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2007980/_/

Weird abnormal states of Ms. Ichinose

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2162810/_/


About the Game

Kurone's Feelings is an adv game developed by Bielograf, and published by OTAKU Plan



Kurone's Feelings ～Apprentice Witch of Starfall Village～
follows a girl who has lost her memories as she gradually develops
human "feelings" and stumbles through various mishaps while doing her best
to assist the witch of a small village in helping the locals.




-Cuteness prevails!
Kurone's various misadventures will never ruin her cheer.

-Lots of costumes!
Some requests will have Kurone change her outfit,
and the nice Kurone will never refuse a person in need.

-Go out and explore!
Explore the village and search for people in need.
As you help them, Kurone's fame will grow, earning her even more requests.

-Stats and feedback!
Kurone's progress is recorded in detail, and while she's sleeping,
you can take a peek into the villagers' thoughts about her.

name: 犹格索托斯的庭院-炼金旅社YOG-SOTHOTH’S YARD Demo
detailed_description:
In this land where dragons/elves/humans coexist, you inherit a long-deserted villa and owe a dark debt. You need to recruit employees including a Death, a Dragon, an Elf-Hunter, and a Bioroid Maid to provide hotel services for different species, or you can use slaughter and forced dreaming to gather money quickly. In addition, the employees are all pursuable. Choosing different people you pursue and the degree of evil to collect money will affect the end of the hotel's operation.
Yes, this game planned 11 endings, and this continues to increase with script writing and the system design ......

RECRUITING EMPLOYEES


Bioroid Maid


Implanted to obey all your commands, but you can choose not to force her.
Competent in housework, but lacking in taste.

Death from Tower


Powerful, but company slave.
A dedicated hotel front desk staff, but likes to slaughter.

Dragon Girl Alchemist


Master of alchemy and loves to make money.
As a manager, she uses alchemy for customer summoning.

Elf-Hunter(Chef)


Obviously has super high sword skills, but prefers to be a chef.
...... In any case, the knife work is very good.

Guess what character it is


There are other special NPCs of different species, shapes, and insides, and all the characters come with their storyline waiting for you to explore.

HOTEL CONSTRUCTION


Old house renovation, building upgrade, yard layout ......
Gothic, and not so gothic.
Unnameable, but only a little bit unnameable.

[Hotel itself]
This villa can be transformed into a luxury hotel with many rooms!
As the black-hearted boss to his customers, but a good employer to the employees, you customize rooms just for your core staffs!
Each room has its own theme!
...... Ah, don't ask why Death sleeps in the pit.



[Beautiful yard]
Facts aside, this yard has a nice view.
Please ignore the man-eating grass.
Please stay away from the bubble house that could explode.
If you see a giant cat full of eyes, please ask for a sick note at the front desk.



[Forest Development]
If you can survive the first half of the game, you will gain a free mountain forest where you can develop several tourism projects.
Here, you and your employees can enjoy various rides without waiting in line.
The mountain forest has a super efficient self-purification system, which means you don't have to deal with the remains of various accidents additionally.

name: G-MODEアーカイブス+ 探偵・癸生川凌介事件譚 Vol.6「対交錯事件」
detailed_description:
The sixth installment of "The Detective Kibukawa Ryosuke Case Tale" series!
A serial murder case and the disappearance of a female secretary.
Uncover the hidden truth from two intersecting perspectives.



【Game System】
This is a mystery adventure game in which the player solves a series of difficult cases that occur in a fictional town called Marihama City in K Prefecture.
The player controls the main character in the scenario and solves the mystery by selecting commands in the conversation and deduction parts, and by gathering information and evidence that will provide clues to solving the case.
The story progresses by command selection, so even beginners can easily play the game.

【Story】
This case is a series of murders that have been occurring in and around Marihama-dai.
The victims are not connected to each other, and Detective Otonari, who sees that the situation is grave and has no clue how to solve it, requests you to help him solve the case.
The story begins with the assistant detective, Izuna Sagishima, who is working with the police to investigate the case.

Meanwhile, a detective agency is forced to do a half-assed job on the detective's behalf.
Masao Ikurumi, a scenario writer, is asked by a company to search for a person.
The woman he was investigating, Yumiko Hamakawa, was a contract employee working in the secretarial department.
After a month of work, she suddenly disappeared...

Izuna and Ikurumi. They encounter two incidents. What is the truth that awaits them at the end of it all?

Izuna and Ikurumi. They encounter two incidents. What is the truth that awaits them at the end of it all?
short_description: Serial Murder x Disappearance of a female secretary Uncover the hidden truth from these two intersecting perspectives.

name: G-MODEアーカイブス+ 探偵・癸生川凌介事件譚 Vol.7「音成刑事の捜査メモ」
detailed_description:
The seventh installment in "The Detective Kibukawa Ryosuke Case Tale" series!
A lost chihuahua and a kind policeman in town.
With the image of the detective they longed for in their hearts, the uneven duo run through the city!



【Game System】
This is a mystery adventure game in which the player solves a series of difficult cases that occur in a fictional town called Marihama City in K Prefecture.
The player controls the main character in the scenario and solves the mystery by selecting commands in the conversation and deduction parts, and by gathering information and evidence that will provide clues to solving the case.
The story progresses by selecting commands, so even beginners can easily play the game.

【Story】
The case this time is at the Marihama-dai Station Police box, a small police box at the crossroads in front of the station.
The story begins when a stray puppy is left in the care of Officer Otonari, who was still working at the police box as a policeman at the time.
The breed was a Chihuahua. According to the collar attached to it, its name is Chappie.

Officer Otonari, who was assigned to search for Chappie's owner, asked around in front of the station and found a person he thought might be Chappie's owner.
After interviewing people in front of the station, he obtained eyewitness testimony that a person who appeared to be Chappie's owner had entered the Marihama Grand Hotel.
If he could locate the owner, he would be able to solve the case. Once again, one person and one animal began to investigate in the hotel lobby, but the owner of the dog, who had been staying at the hotel for some time, rushed into the hotel.
However, they are caught up in a further incident when a guest rushes in with a bloodthirsty look on his face...

Koichi Otonari, 26 years old, is always next door to you. He runs the town with his little partner to keep the peace in Marihama-dai!

name: Lösungsbuch - PDF - A Bavarian Tale - Totgeschwiegen
detailed_description:
You have set yourself the task and are on the search for the murderer in Wolpertshofen. But the village has its own rules. There is a curfew at night and anyone who doesn't duck gets one. The only thing that helps is Kathi's Rahmschwammerl.
In the solution book you will learn everything about game mechanics, buffs, skill leveling, item crafting and much more. On numerous maps you will discover useful items and important locations. Additional overviews will help you better understand the villagers. The walkthrough in the last chapter shows you the optimal criminal investigation path and strings together interviews and observations to form an irrefutable chain of evidence.
IMPORTANT: Only available in German! After the "installation" the book will be saved as a PDF in your Steam game folder.

name: G-MODEアーカイブス+ 探偵・癸生川凌介事件譚 Vol.8「仮面幻影殺人事件」
detailed_description:
The eighth installment of "The Detective Kibukawa Ryosuke Case Tale" series!
Embraced by an illusion, I put on a mask...
A mysterious series of murders intertwine in the virtual and real worlds.



【Game System】
This is a mystery adventure game in which the player solves a series of difficult cases that occur in a fictional town called Marihama City in K Prefecture.
The player controls the main character in the scenario and solves the mystery by selecting commands in the conversation and deduction parts, and by gathering information and evidence that provide clues to solving the case.
The story progresses by selecting commands, so even beginners can easily play the game.

【Story】
This case is eight months after the first in the series, "The Masked Illusion Case".
The story begins when Masao Ikurumi, a scenario writer, receives an invitation to participate in the beta test of a new network game, "Misty Online".

"Misty Online" is Japan's first MMOADV, a groundbreaking game in which players work together with their friends to solve crimes in a world that closely resembles a real town.

The player, Izuna Sagishima of the Kibukawa Detective Agency, participates in the beta test and takes on a fictional murder case, only to find that the player playing the role of the "corpse" who fell to his death from a great height does not respond at all...

Reality and illusion. The present and the past. The myriad threads that are intricately and mysteriously intertwined create illusions and envelop people's hearts and minds.

name: G-MODEアーカイブス+ 探偵・癸生川凌介事件譚 Vol.9「五月雨は鈍色の調べ」
detailed_description:
The ninth installment of "The Detective Kibukawa Ryosuke Case Tale" series!
In the pale dull sky, I follow his shadow....
The Kibukawa Detective Agency eight years ago, another great detective.



【Game System】
This is a mystery adventure game in which the player solves a series of difficult cases that occur in a fictional town called Marihama City in K Prefecture.
The player controls the main character in the scenario and solves the mystery by selecting commands in the conversation and deduction parts, and by gathering information and evidence that will serve as clues to solve the case.
The story progresses by selecting commands, so even beginners can easily play the game.

【Story】
The case is set in Marihama-dai during the rainy season, the first heavy rain in eight years, in a dull rain pattern that spreads as if to take away the color of the town.
The story begins with a client visiting the "Kibukawa Detective Agency.

This is the Kibukawa Detective Agency, isn't it?
I believe there is an assistant detective here named Sagishima-san.
No, no, not a girl like you...there was a young man named Sagishima, wasn't there? There was a young man named Sagishima..."

The client said he had come to fulfill a "promise made eight years ago" to a young man named Sagishima, who used to work at the detective agency.
As heavy rain pelted the window, Izuna Sagishima, the current assistant detective, began to listen to the client's story in order to take over the case.

He is told about a case he took on eight years ago, which the young man, who used to work at the detective agency side by side with Ryosuke Kibukawa, took on.

name: GHOST: AC-130 Close Air Support
detailed_description:
Understand first that this is as of now a simple, mindless shooter with two endless levels. The will be Campaign Mode implemented soon. Now, there is no story, no progression and no way to die (except shooting the friendlies). It's the kind of game you might want to play after a long day at work where you just want to just hunt people down and blow shit up. I want my players to know this going into it because if this doesn't sound like what you're looking for - please don't buy it. For me, satisfaction is paramount.

You are the gunner of the AC-130 Gunship. One of the most lethal war machines ever made. Use your skill with thermal optics and three of the biggest and most lethal guns ever produced to stop the enemy cold- and without warning. A Simulation in its presentation with arcade-like gameplay.

Three Types of Weapons on the AC-130 accurately recreated

Take control of the three guns mounted on the AC-130 variant: a 25mm cannon, a 40mm cannon and a 105mm Howitzer. Use the 25mm cannon that shoots 200 rounds per minute and each round has the equivalent blast of a hand grenade. This is your first go-to to ferret out hiding enemies under trees or in the cover of a structure. Take control of the 40mm cannon to give yourself a less accurate but more lethal blast - especially if there are 2 or 3 enemies close together. And the 105mm Howitzer is capable of leveling the largest of structures in the game.

White hot and black hot thermal imaging

You will have complete control over what you see and how you see it, and because these missions take place under the cover of darkness you will have to utilize the embedded thermal imaging cameras that can sense human bodies through heat. It is a strategy to learn when to use white hot and when to use black hot. GHOST gives you that strategic opportunity to explore and discover the possibilities using either mode.

Two Infinite Respawn Wave levels

The game in it's current state has two Infinite Respawn Wave levels where you are scored and the enemies continue to respawn. You will find that White Hot Thermal and Black Hot Thermal have their distinct uses based on the geography of both levels. This mode is a more arcade experience of the game.

Real audio of the crew of an AC-130 Gunship

I have not attempted to recreate what the crew exchanges are like back and forth on my own because I wanted to give the player authenticity. Audio barks are taken from actual live and dangerous missions that have been flown by the Air Force.

Addicting and seamless gameplay

GHOST- AC-130 has been designed for ease of use even in its simulation state. It provides a quick and easy way to conquer the controls immediately so that there is no learning curve to have fun.

name: Flock of Dogs: Flight to the Festival
detailed_description:
Flock of Dogs: Flight to the Festival is a 1-8 player, co-op, roguelike. Featuring flying dogs that live on a flying whale. Navigate the skies, battle monsters, pick up hitchhikers, and go shopping for goodies on your way to the Flying Festival at the end of the Air River. This DLC functions as an unlock from the main game. Players can access the Air River and fly to the Festival. In roguelike terms, each "flight to the festival" is another run, featuring procedurally generated islands in the sky, floating caves, gear to upgrade the Flock, a batch of characters to meet, and evolving Festival to party attend.

You can play solo, but Flock of Dogs was designed for drop-in/drop-out play. If you're worried about having to leave your friends behind, remember that Flight to the Festival always comes with one Friend Slot.


A Friend Slot allows one of your friends to join you in the Flight to the Festival DLC for free! It's not exactly 2-for-1, but in some ways, it's better.

  • One Friend Slot comes with the Flight to the Festival DLC
  • Invite any friend (and each time, it can be a different friend)
  • Buy additional Friend Slots
  • Friends who own the DLC do not take up a Friend Slot

name: The Moonflower
detailed_description:
The Moonflower is a cooperative horror-survival video game, containing Story Mode (Still in development) and Multiplayer Mode, the game is set in an abandoned forest island, where there is the demon well-known "Moonflower", named after its flower-like appearance, many rumors say it was resurrected after a long time in a sunflower field. Since the Moonflower can no longer be contained again, players have been tasked with either "blocking" it as much as possible or hunting it via an underground laboratory, each player having their own personal laboratory to customize and add new tools. and you are the hoster of a game everyone will see how advanced / customized your laboratory is, otherwise if you are the colleague or if you are looking for a game of another, at that point you will see YOU, all the progress of that laboratory. To advance your underground lab you'll need to scavenge for resources outside the haunted forest, but don't stay outside too long! Otherwise your panic level will rise and as a result the moonflower will smell your fear and turn you into meatballs. By playing you will earn adrenaline points depending on the risks you take. the more you risk a successful game you will receive more points, otherwise in the game time.
Cooperate, find, risk, explore, locate, communicate, plan and recontain the Moonflower to accomplish the mission!

name: Little Learning Machines Demo
detailed_description:
Train Little Learning Machines with Love – then watch them come to life!

Inspire, train and customize artificially intelligent machines and set them loose in a cute, cozy world full of endless possibilities! Smart, soothing, and totally adorable – Little Learning Machines lets you take the incredible power of Reinforcement Learning into your own hands!

• Through compelling and fun quests, learn how to train increasingly complex behaviours to your automatons with love ♡
• Watch your Little Machines develop their own unique personalities over time.
• Develop meaningful connections with your machine by helping, raising and nurturing them to thrive on the island.
• Feel inspired by the intelligence they can wield and watch the fun as it works hard to make the island flourish!



Key Features:

• Teach your Little Machine to do many things on the island through a unique reward system that can unlock more complex behaviours over time.
• Customize your machine with a variety of different cosmetics.
• Train them to use a multitude of different Items.
• Play at your own pace - watch them learn, grow, and develop bonds with each other and with you!
• Explore new islands by completing quests and learning about the whimsical stories of the creatures that live there.



Little Learning Machines is perfect for:

• Those who are looking to learn the basic principles of Reinforcement Learning in a clear and simple way.
• Parents and educators who are looking for a fun introduction to Machine Learning that kids will love and enjoy learning.
• Individuals who enjoy pet simulators, but you can actually teach your pet to do things!
• Players who are looking to explore a new kind of gameplay experience.
• People who love adorable and intelligent robots!

Add Little Learning Machines to your Steam Wishlist today! Also, join our Discord for all the latest news, updates, and be the first to play the beta! 🤖 ❤️

name: Frontline: Panzers & Generals Vol. I
detailed_description:
Experience an action-packed World War 2 strategy game that puts you in command of either the Allied forces or the German Wehrmacht in an epic battle for the domination of Europe. Lead your troops to victory and secure your place in history!

"Lead your forces through epic battles, from Normandy to Moscow, as you carefully aim your targets and counter-attack. Strategically coordinate your Squads and utilize special abilities to gain an advantage over your enemies. Study their tactics to ensure victory!"

"Frontline: Panzers & Generals" is an exciting hex-based strategy game set in World War 2, featuring real historical units, maps and locations. Take command of your army and lead them to victory by employing any strategy of your choice! Outwit and outmaneuver your opponents to claim objectives and ultimately emerge victorious.

Units become even more powerful and unlock new, invaluable abilities as they gain experience in battle; these new behaviors will be essential in ensuring victory: Camouflage, Sabotage, Over-watch, Smoke, AT grenades, Artillery barrage, Shell Shock, Transport, Special Panzers, APCR, Suppressed, Routed, M.I.A, K.I.A, Infantry Charge.

Take command of your military force and plan your strategy to achieve victory in this exciting world at war strategy game!

FEATURES:
✔Massive weapons arsenal: 350+ unique units
✔Axis & Allies Campaigns & scenarios
✔Level up & Active abilities
✔Realistic topography maps
✔Historical Battles
✔Reinforcements
✔Zoom controls
✔HD Graphics
✔Localization: En, De, Ru, It, Fr, Jp, SP, Por, zh-cn
✔PC only
✔All DLC's are free

The "Frontline Games Series" is an independent, solo development effort, and I am always grateful for your feedback and comments.
If you are a player of Turn-based Strategy & tactics Hex-grid WW2 Wargames, this game might be for you!

name: Better Me Tree - Meditation, Nature, Reflection
detailed_description:
Better Me Tree is an interactive self help application that includes simple objectives that are spoken aloud by the user to promote daily positive reflection, motivation, encouragement and edification. When all objectives are completed for each day, you will watch your seed of progress grow from a seed into a full tree. Each completed tree is added to the background scenery as you begin a new tree. Each session lasts from 5-12 minutes a day and each tree progression lasts a total of 14 days.

Daily Objectives Include:


1. Daily Gratitude and Appreciation
2. Daily Letting Go
3. Daily Overcoming
4. Daily Affirmation
5. Daily Commitments

Better Me Tree can Encourage, Motivate or Guide the User to:


✔️ Let go of negativity and negative thoughts
✔️ Overcome doubt and fear
✔️ Increase Positive Motivation
✔️ Increase Daily Encouragement
✔️ Increase Personal Reflection and Awareness
✔️ Increase Courage, Focus and Determination

…and much more.

*Better Me Tree is not a therapist nor is it created by licensed therapists. Better Me Tree is a "self help" application designed to help guide the user into their own personal reflection and self development.

Progress and results are based upon each individual. We make no claims or guarantees for any personal success or prevention of failure.

name: Darfall: Prologue
detailed_description:
WISHLIST THE FULL GAME !

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1961600/Darfall/


JOIN THE DISCORD - CHAT WITH THE DEVS!


About the Game

If you enjoy playing games that include strategy, wave survival, hero management, lots of loot, city building, exploration or crafting, then Darfall: Prologue is for you, as it's the mix of all.



Build up your settlement in a land covered with undead corruption. Gather resources from around the map, construct productions like Blacksmith or Carpenter to craft armour needed by your units. Place your defences to protect your settlement against invading undead.

But don’t forget to build up lights, as the night approaches, the land gets covered in darkness and undead rise from their graves.





Darfall: Prologue offers a full day & night cycle, where you explore during the day, but defend during the night. The exploration of your surroundings is an integral part to your survival. Roam freely during the daylight to discover orc encampments guarding their loot, or precious silver veins you can mine from. As the land is infested with undead corruption, you must destroy their hideouts so you can expand your settlement even further.





Darfall: Prologue gives you a full hero management gameplay. Loot weapons and armour to equip your hero and make him more powerful. Use the spell book to train new skills that unlock as your hero levels up. From scorching groups of enemies to healing your wounded allies in battle, use and control the abilities in a similar way as in MOBA games.
Your hero has a full inventory, which can be filled with materials and resources you gather and collect during your exploration. Bring them back to the keep and use them in your economy or craft new items.





Enemies you kill drop loot that range from basic resources like wood or iron, which are used in your economy, to various armour or weapons your hero can wear. Darfall: Prologue offers a loot system from action RPGs as you know it, where items of various rarities can drop, from epic to legendary, each giving your hero various stats increasing his power.
Hunt wild animals for food to prevent starvation of your units, or steal supplies from enemy camps to boost your economy.





As the night begins and darkness creeps into every corner of the map, undead rise and invade your settlement, increasing in intensity each day. Build your defences to protect your city, upgrade your walls, place spike traps or explosive barrels to slow down the invaders and survive the night.
Build an army to help protect your city, from mighty paladins wearing heavy armour, to healers that keep your units alive, you will need every advantage you can get to help you face the darkness of the night.





- Full day & night cycle. Place lights to see in dark and survive the night against the invasions
- Craft various items from your structures like armour or weapons to equip your units
- Collect the loot from your enemies, from food used to feed your units to epic items for your hero
- Level up and equip your hero, train new spells and control the battlefield
- Manage food and happiness of your workers, as they are the backbone of your economy
- Explore during the daylight to fight orcs guarding their loot or find rare resources to craft better items
- Place defences like traps, explosive barrels or walls to face the incoming waves

name: CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 Personality Pack Sweet, Affectionate, and Devoted Long-lost Friend
detailed_description:
An all new heroine type, the "Sweet, Affectionate, and Devoted Long-lost Friend" makes her appearance in Custom Order Maid 3D2!
You can now hire “Long-lost Friend” as a maid at the Empire Club, just like you can “Muku,” “Majime,” and “Rindere.”

The costumes included in this DLC are compatible with both the High Poly Body and Normal Body.
You can use them in both COM3D2 and COM3D2.5.

～Who is this Sweet, Affectionate, and Devoted Long-lost Friend?～
A polite and serious girl who loves her master and would do anything for him, no matter how arduous the task. She's a diligent worker, but she's also a romantic dreamer with a girly side who treasures her past with her master. Whether she'll be able to have the close, loving relationship she desires… is all up to her master.

• You can enjoy training, job communication, and scenes as a maid working in the Empire Club with Sweet, Affectionate, and Devoted Long-lost Friend!

"Long-lost Friend" is not compatible with the following DLC.
For compatibility with each of the listed DLC, please purchase the compatibility DLC packs separately.

CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 GP-01
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2＋ GP-02
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2＋ GP-01Fb

GP-01, GP02, and GP-01Fb for "Long-lost Friend" are currently in development.
Even in Japan, GP01, GP02, and GP01Fb are at different stages of development for each heroine type.
After development for a given heroine has finished in Japan, that content must be translated. We appreciate your understanding that this takes some time.
We are doing our best to complete development and release content quickly, so please be patient.

name: Spellshot
detailed_description:
Fend Off Hordes

Being sent off-world for munitions testing is never a great assignment. Even more so when your destination turns out to be the zombie-infested halls of Caleme Castle. Batten down the hatches or get out and use your legs, corporate doesn't care. As long as you survive long enough for them to collect enough data, they'll be happy (that is, if they even feel emotion).

Empower Your Bullets

While you are enjoying your limited stay at "Zombie Manor", you'll come across a great deal of gems. These empower your bullets, giving them all-around splendid effects such as:
  • Bone-chilling frostburn
  • Noxious gas
  • Piercing hot cinders
  • Immobilizing gunk
  • and much, much more!

Discover New Builds

There's a great deal of purchasing, selling, rerolling, and combining to get to. So what are you waiting on? Get to finding those rare item synergies and special gem combinations.

short_description: Survive against hordes of zombies using bullets enchanted with spells purchased from a rerolling shop. Spellshot is a fast-paced, rogue-lite fps in which you create unique builds by combining and upgrading spells, activating set bonuses, and collecting rare items.

name: Monster Hunter Rise - "Wild Arms" Hunter layered armor piece
detailed_description:
This additional content includes:

- "Wild Arms" Hunter layered armor piece

With these arm guards, you can wield the power of the untamed wilderness to repel anyone who dares to enter your territory!

Hunt in style with this special layered armor!

- Hunter Layered Armor can be used in the Layered Equipment Settings menu of the Item Box.
- This item can be equipped to your hunter’s arms.
- Layered armor is a "skin" which changes the appearance of the character without affecting their stats and abilities.

name: Monster Hunter Rise - "Rondine" Hunter layered armor set
detailed_description:
This additional content includes:

- "Rondine Face" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Rondine Body" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Rondine Arms" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Rondine Waist" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Rondine Legs" Hunter layered armor piece

Experience the romantic side of hunting life as Rondine the Trader!

Hunt in style with this special layered armor!

- Hunter Layered Armor can be used in the Layered Equipment Settings menu of the Item Box.
- This set can be used regardless of hunter type.
- This set changes your entire look and cannot be applied to individual body parts.
- Some elements of this set are different from the version worn by the in-game character. Hairstyle and voice not included.
- Layered armor is a "skin" which changes the appearance of the character without affecting their stats and abilities. Weapon not included.

name: Parcel Problems
detailed_description:
Your boss’s words were clear, “If we don’t have a package leaving this building every ten seconds, I’m going to have to make some changes around here“. This was quite a time crunch, but you can’t afford to lose your job.

You can do it… Right?

​​Parcel Problems​ is a fast paced warehouse parcel packing simulator. You must cram items into boxes with the clock breathing down your neck in the hopes that you’re making your 10 second quota. You could cut corners and forget items just to get that quota met, but every second that ticks is making packing tougher and you can feel your heart in your chest beating harder with every slip-up.



Fold, Pack, Tape, Label. Fold, Pack, Tape, Label.... How long can you last?

This game was initially created for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam with the theme: "Every 10 Seconds"

name: Relic Space Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The Original Soundtrack to Relic Space, composed by Peter Gagliardi.

Tracks 3 to 19 are listenable versions of Adaptive tracks. For each track, the different variations have been laid out in a sequential order for a smooth listening experience; in-game, they transition depending on aspects of the player's state. The overall themes and moods of the tracks are tied to factions in the game, adding to the uniqueness of the different areas that the player can explore.

name: RPG Maker - PiXel ScaLer
detailed_description:
Convert your map and character assets into RPG Maker Unite specs with “PiXel ScaLer”!

PiXel ScaLer is a powerful mini app that can enlarge and convert pixel arts into higher resolution illustrations! With this tool, users can now resize custom or previous RPG Maker assets and modify a little to quickly adapt it into RPG Maker Unite’s graphic standards!

*PiXel ScaLer is a product developed by karuta-san - who has kindly granted RPG Maker the rights to distribute it as an RPG Maker Unite official tool. **The previous PiXel ScaLer will continue to be available for download at the author’s sites after our release as an Official Tool. Users of the previous version of PiXel ScaLer can also continue to use it without concerns.


PiXel ScaLer can be used with some previous RPG Maker titles! Supports various resolutions!
This application is mainly intended for use with the upcoming release of RPG Maker Unite, but it can be used with RPG Maker MV, MZ, and other series as it supports a variety of resolutions!

In addition to the 98 x 146 (walking graphics) and 194 x 194 (SV Battler) resolutions, which are the same specifications as the default assets in RPG Maker Unite, the following resolutions are supported.
Walking graphics: 48 x 48, 64 x 64, 128 x 128, 256 x 256
SV Battler: 64 x 64, 320 x 320, 512 x 512

name: Battle Cry of Freedom - Blood & Gore
detailed_description:
Experience the brutal and gruesome reality of the 19th Century with the Blood & Gore DLC for Battle Cry of Freedom.



The DLC brings a new level of realism with improved death and wounded animations, including decapitations and dismemberments, as well as blood splatters and pools on the ground and walls. The DLC also includes new visual and audio effects, such as bloody or burned corpses, unique wounded animations and more.



Features:
• Option for turning on/off gore.
• Decapitation with various melee weapons such as swords & axes.
• Dismemberment with various melee weapons such as swords & axes.
• Dismemberment with artillery shells and explosions.
• Blood splats and pools on terrain as well as surrounding geometry.
• Blood on corpses.
• Burned corpses.
• Unique wounded animations with their own blood particle effects.
• Unique wounded sounds and effects.

name: Day Of Dead
detailed_description:
'Day Of Dead' is a casual game with the theme of terror. The game simulates a pinball machine. The player controls the left and right baffles to hit the marbles out, so as not to let the marbles fall into the middle hole.
[Game control]
Left: S
Right: L
Emission: spaces
[Game features]
This is a pinball machine simulation game. The playing method is the same as that of traditional pinball machines. It doesn't let the pinball fall into the middle hole. Once the marbles fall into the middle hole, the game fails.
The marbles will have different rebound effects when they touch different objects in the game, and will also increase different points.
The game is easy to operate and suitable for playing in leisure time.
[img{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/p1.jpg][/img]

name: LUS: Last Unit Standing
detailed_description:
Ready to jump into the greatest adventure ever?
"LUS: Last Unit Standing" is the platform game that will take you to a post-apocalyptic future. We are in the year 3000, for centuries the Earth has become an uninhabitable place due to a war by sentient man-made machines.
A group of people who have been insidious for some time in a spaceship decide to give life to the 'Last Unit Standing' project.
You will take on the role of Lus, whose job it will be to restore the Earth to its former glory. His fate depends only on you. Lus is a skilled fighter, with an arsenal of abilities that will help you defeat enemies and bosses on every continent. You can run, jump, glide, kick, and create a myriad of combos. By exploring the map, you can find collectible items that will provide you with information about Lus's life and waste collection and recycling. You can also upgrade Lus as you play, her robotic arm becoming stronger and more powerful. Become the best Lus player and save the world from imminent destruction! Who doesn't want to travel the world? Start an exciting journey through landscapes inspired by the Far East, Europe, and more! Thanks to the power of Unreal Engine 5, you can enjoy realistic and detailed scenarios like never before. What are you waiting for? Jump on Lus's spaceship and start your journey around the world!

name: It gets so lonely here
detailed_description:
You are running through a forest.

It is late at night and the sky is as black as pitch.

The trees which surround you, jutting out of the earth like eerie monuments to a foreign god, are blotting out most of the moonlight.

You do not know where you are going.

You have no map; no route; no plan.

You have no desire, as you run, save to escape.

You cannot let yourself be caught.

All you can do is run, on and on and on...

But, despite all of your hard work, your best efforts will, invariably, be in vain. It’s already too late for you. After all...

You’ll never be able to escape from me.




  • About 50k words of text (approx 2-3 hours of reading)
  • A branching story with several choices
  • 800x600 resolution for that old-timey aesthetic
  • Custom character artwork
  • A custom soundtrack which comes bundled with the VN
  • Three(?) pretty girls who will love you to death
  • Three exciting ways to die!!!
  • An archly amused narrator who berates you for your poor life decisions
  • Cannibalism ♥

name: Cat Search in Medieval Times
detailed_description:
Meow!

More than 100 cats are hiding in this medieval city! Can you find them all? Some cats are more hidden than others, some lurk in the castle, while others lurk in the trees. There are also some lost wanted cats! Find the hidden wanted posters. Each poster will give you 1 hint that you can use if you are stuck.

Relax with a drink, while you explore this short but sweet hidden object game!

KEY FEATURES
  • 120 Hidden cats
  • 6 Hidden wanted posters
  • 6 Hints
  • Hand-Drawn medieval city
  • A lot of meowing sound effect

CONTROLS
ZOOM - Scroll Wheel
MOVE IMAGE - Hold down left mouse button and drag
PAUSE - Escape or click top left


My cat "Melis" was a great moral support during the development of this game



Artist - Anna Pankevych
Ingame music - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QSMc6b5DDEs&ab_channel=PGNMusic

Check out my first game!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2153770/Coin_Flipper/

name: Head Soccer
detailed_description:
Head Soccer is a cartoon style leisure sports game. The player controls a football player to play a fierce game.
[Game control]
Move: Left, Right
Jump: Space
[Game features]
Players can choose one of more football players to participate in the game.
The rule of the game is to head the ball to the opponent's field. If the opponent does not receive the ball, you will win a point.
The game will be played within the specified time. The time is up. The winner is the one with the highest score.
The game atmosphere is relaxed and easy to operate. It is suitable for playing for a while at leisure.

name: Tree It
detailed_description:
Tree it is a low poly 3d tree generator for the creation of 3d tree modles for your own apps and games. Exports to .dbo .fbx (acsii) .obj .x with all model exports are your own creation and you can freely do as you wish with them.

The steam eddition of tree it is here, this version of tree it includes key thatch palm/banana plant tree pack.

Features

  • Very easy to create 3D trees models.
  • Create any tree, not limited to just one tree type.
  • Edit each joint as well as break joints to create stumps.
  • Render to image for leaf branch creation.
  • Poly reduction for LOD.
  • Texture files .dds .tga .png .bmp .jpg.
  • Exports to .dbo .fbx(ascii) .obj .x.
  • Sell your own tree models on 3rd party asset stores.

name: Kikstart: Off-Road Simulator (C64/C128)
detailed_description:
Originally released in 1984, this tricky stunt motorcycle game brought the fun and frustration of motocross to the home computer. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version.

Contains both the Commodore 64 version and the later expanded version originally released for the Commodore 128.

Up to 2 players can play simultaneously!

Gameplay

Race your motorcycle across a series of tricky courses. Jump over a wide range of obstacles, from water to trees to buses! Use wheelies and hops to navigate tough terrain.


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Support for most modern game controllers
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options

name: Jump, challenge 100 floors
detailed_description:
This Is a Simple, Casual, Relax and Fluency Game.
You can jump and challenge 100 floors to arrive the top floor in this game.
The postion of each floor is generated randomly, which will change for every game and make the difficulty different.
On each floor, there is a coin which can be collected as the score.
There is a save point on the 10th floor per 10 floors, which can save the player's postition and load it.
The length of floors will be changed per 10 floors for adding the difficulty.
The distance in height between floors will be reset for resetting the difficulty per 10 floors.
The game wiil restart if you get out of the edge.
This game supports joystick.

Keywords and Features:
  • Simple
  • Casual
  • Relax
  • Random
  • Fluency

Control (keyboard):
  • LEFT/RIGHT button: control the angle
  • SPACE button: control jump
  • L button: load the player's position at the save point

name: Shadow Saboteur
detailed_description:
Shadow Saboteur is an exciting 2D side-scrolling adventure game where players take on the role of Robin Hood, robbing from the rich and giving to the poor. Players must avoid the sight of enemy soldiers and steal money, then secretly distribute it to the poor. The game features many levels, including money stealing and money giving levels, where players mustnot be detected in order to succeed.

In Shadow Saboteur, players must complete a variety of challenging levels. These levels include sneaking into towns and castles to find vaults, stealing gems and jewelry, ambushing guards and staying stealthy, and many other exciting tasks. Each level is designed very cleverly, and players must use their skills and resources to successfully complete the tasks.

The game's visual effects are excellent, with a beautiful pixel art style and vivid colors that make the game enjoyable to play. The background music and sound effects are also great, immersing players in the medieval atmosphere and further enhancing the game's overall experience.

As a stealth game, Shadow Saboteur is filled with tense and exciting moments. Players must act when the guards are not paying attention, steal treasures, and take them to the designated location. At the same time, players must also be aware of obstacles and traps to avoid detection and failure.

The game's controls are very simple, with players only needing to use the arrow keys and spacebar to move and jump. This easy-to-learn control scheme allows even beginners to quickly get into the game and enjoy the fun.

In summary, Shadow Saboteur is an excellent 2D side-scrolling adventure game. Its beautiful visual effects, exciting gameplay, and easy-to-learn controls make it a game that is definitely worth experiencing.

name: Pixels N Pistols
detailed_description:
Pixels N Pistols is all about gaining a positional advantage over your cute, little, (surprisingly violent) pixel enemies and sending them to the void with an arsenal of over 25 weapons. Quick thinking and keen awareness are required to take out the highly trained semi-intelligent soldiers you will be facing in battle.

Over 25 Weapons
Equip Rocket Launchers, Submachine Guns, Assault Rifles, IEDs, Knives, Sawed-Off Shotty's, Light Machine Guns, Grenades, and Pistols (duh) as your primary and secondary weapons. Send lead beams of self-righteousness and cleansing fire straight through your opposition who are probably the bad guys.

Environments
Fight your way through a variety of maps and lighting conditions. Play in the dark for an added challenge or to RP that you are at a rave. Equip Night Vision goggles or use your flashlight to see where that ******* Frank is hiding.


Semi-Intelligent AI
The AI will engage you in intense firefights that may leave you with lifelong(ingame time) trauma or no life at all. Enemies will take cover, camp at vantage points, tactically retreat, and rush you head on. Keep your head on a swivel to avoid being turned into pixel soup by snipers, radicalized 9-5ers, and ninjas.


Bullet Penetration
Bullets can sometimes penetrate furniture, riot shields, doors, and various objects in your environment depending on the weapon you choose. Don't get too comfortable hiding behind that flipped table.


Outsmart your N-emies
Every encounter with an enemy is like a small, rapidly evolving puzzle. Use your wits to take up an advantageous position to snipe or rush an enemy while they are most vulnerable.


Zombonies
They're vicious. They're stupid. They have ridiculous names. And they're coming for you. Use half your wits to dispatch a horde of hungry yeller N green fellers from feasting on your sweet cheeks.


Tailor Your Experience
Change the settings to increase difficulty, dim the lighting, enable survival mode, change the amount of soldiers, available air support, score limit, player/soldier loadouts, change team uniform colors, make a really boring 1v1 on a large map, start a FFA squad battle, face zombies, or any combination of settings you're into. Whether it's sniping from a rooftop, gunning down your enemies head on, or coercing your loved ones to buy this game, Play Your Way.

name: Vampire Syndicate: Gangs of MoonFall Demo
detailed_description:
Vampire Syndicate: Gangs of MoonFall is an old-school cRPG set amidst the vampire-dominated gangs of a cyberpunk city. As a Familiar of one of the ancient vampire lineages, you have been tasked by your undead masters to expand their criminal empire.

If you play your cards right, that criminal empire may one day be yours; along with eternal youth and power beyond the imagining of mere humans.

Demo Content


This is an early Alpha demo consisting of two parts: a basic combat tutorial and a sex scene. Expect placeholders, bugs, absent features and general lack of polish. The purpose of this demo is to gather feedback as development continues.

name: Reincarnation
detailed_description:
Reincarnation offers a rich, deep, and immersive medieval and fantasy-themed deck-builder game experience for players who enjoy the strategy and excitement of turn-based RPG card games.



Players have the ability to build their own unique decks with hundreds of cards, each with a wide variety of abilities and strengths. As they progress through the game; they can choose from range of classes, level up their characters, equip them with powerful weapons and armors that best suits their play style.



Players will travel across the map that is filled with danger and adventure. Each time they embark on a journey, they will face different enemies, choose different cards, discover different items (relics, potions, gears), and even fight different bosses. This ever-changing gameplay and enriched story with side quests will ensure that every playthrough is unique and exciting, and keeps players engaged for hours on end.



Features

  • A constantly evolving deck-building experience
  • Acquire powerful relics and potions that can turn the tide of battle
  • Progress through different scenarios of three different acts
  • Choose from four unique characters, each with their own set of cards
  • Hundreds of cards to play with a wide variety of options
  • Hundreds of different items for players to find and utilize throughout the journey
  • Dozens of combat encounters with unique enemies and bosses

name: uCaptain2: World of Fishing
detailed_description:
Boats. Crabs. Fishing. Ocean. Customizations. Free. It goes on and on. Stop reading, just download now!

uCaptain gives you what you want in a fishing game:

Complete control over how you build, setup, and sail your boat, 60+ different species of wildlife to catch, tons of challenges to complete, and an open-world so you can explore the vast ocean how you want.


BUILD YOUR BOAT

You build your boat the way you want. You have total control over the gear you carry- shrimp nets, scallop dredges, crab pots, lobster traps, long lines... you name it- it's included!


HUNT LEGENDARY FISH

Featuring the most realistic fishing game simulation put on a mobile device, customize every aspect of your gear setup- from setting the drag of your casting reel, to changing your lures to target the fish you want to catch. You can fish various species like largemouth bass, smallmouth bass, pike, musky, walleye, blue fin tuna, mahi mahi, marlin, swordfish, sailfish! Can you catch all 60 different fish species?


SEEK THE DEADLIEST CATCH

Gear up, fuel up, and steam ahead to the dangerous waters of the Bering Sea! Plot your route, set your traps, and catch the most prized crabs and fish in the world. Survive and thrive...and your vast fortune is yours to claim!


EXPLORE AN OPEN OCEAN

With the largest map ever put in a mobile game (250+ sq miles) you can sail your ship across the world's most famous fishing ports- from the warm waters of Venice, Louisiana to the icy seas of Dutch Harbor, Alaska.


Go on an adventure - make a fortune!

uCaptain is a fishing game designed for those who like fishing adventures, action games, simulation games, competition and outdoors! This is the ultimate fishing game, don’t miss out!

*Plus It’s got a ship-shipping ship, shipping shipping ships

name: Active and Operational
detailed_description:
A group of friends traveling through some unexplored star systems find an abandoned space ship. Inside, they encounter a disabled Artificial Intelligence. They decide to activate it to ask him about the ship history.

Now you have to use anything you can to survive and escape. He has waken up simpler "intelligences" to get you.

Fix the corrupt ship systems, disable the enemies... HIDE. Shhh... hide... Get to your ship. HIDE... An explosion! Gotta take another pa... RUN!

They are searching for you... Do not make any sound. Do not breath...

Oh. They know what humans fear...

Features:


  • Up to 4 players crossplay online.
  • Coop.
  • Varied enemies with unique qualities and behaviours.
  • Very intelligent enemy AI.
  • Etremely scary.
  • Immersive atmosphere.
  • Many characters with many customizable options.
  • Tons of surprises.

name: Unfortunate Tales of Violet
detailed_description:
Dive into the world of magic


Deep in the forest lives a young witch, Violet. As the curious young girl she is, her favorite thing to do is to experiment. One faithful day, or you may call it an unfortunate day, violet attempted to cast a spell way beyond her level and failed miserably. Her mistake cursed the land of magic and brought chaos to the realm. Everybody is furious and the only thing she can do now is to fix her mistake no matter the cost.

Master the art of spell-casting


Violet uses runes to orchestrate her magic, therefore has the draw the correct symbol for each and every spell she casts. She must master her abilities and acquire new ones along her journey to stand a chance against the dangers she'll face.

Explore spellbinding environments


The vast world of Unfortunate Tales of Violet is filled with places to explore. Immerse yourself in the entrancingly beautiful scenery and find out what secrets lie beneath the soil.

Vanquish foes


The curse she put on the realm brought many treacharous creatures with it. Ready your spellbook, muster up your courage and dive into combat.

Meet new friends


Violet's path will cross many other's. After all, she is not the only person who dwells in this strange land. Be sure to befriend all of them, you never know who will be of your use when.

name: AdrenaLyn
detailed_description:
AdrenaLyn is a fast-paced, indie, superhero sandbox game! Fight crime and upgrade your heroes, each with different powers in order to defeat bosses around the infinite, randomly generated city, VeloCity. Run, fly, or swing around the city and build up Adrenaline in order to go faster, fight harder, and improve your powers! Enjoy practicing and honing your skills as you upgrade your character with new abilities and modules.

Mechanics of this game include, but are not limited to:

  • Movement - The game strives to make you feel like you are really a superhero as you zoom around the city with your chosen hero!
  • Combat - Take on countless enemies with unique and fun powers that are different for each character!
  • Exploration - Explore the infinite city of VeloCity, stopping crime, buying upgrades, and finding secrets!
  • Bosses - Fight new and intriguing bosses across the land, each with different strengths and weaknesses. Might certain heroes specialise against them?
  • Adrenaline - Adrenaline is unique and powerful ability shared by all heroes. Be rewarded for your daring actions as you fill up your Adrenaline bar, and enjoy increases in your stats as you soar, sprint, and zoom across VeloCity!

name: Cordelia
detailed_description:
Cordelia is a princess with a heart too big to fit inside her body. She must follow her heart to defeat the Ice Queen and her cold creature creations.

Traverse the ever changing lands and go on an platforming adventure with many different obstacles to overcome and secrets to find.

Gain mysterious items to aid you in your quest to find if true love really exist in a cold world.

Simple fun

Directional input + Two button controls for easy learning and old school feel.

Retro fantasy adventure

NES and Amiga inspired graphics, aesthetics and gameplay.

Powerful items and loot

The world is filled with loot that you must work cleverly to obtain.

Remixed layout

Handcrafted levels gets scrambled with a new level layout to make each run unique.

Mysterious lands

Visit lands that are vastly different from each other.

name: Little World
detailed_description:
In the game, you will play as the owner of a small universe that has escaped the "cosmic restart",
Players need to find available props through prompts in the scene, explore the small universe step by step through puzzle solving, and gradually understand the story of each small universe through dialogue with characters or objects, and explore their history and secrets
Little Universe 612 also has a manager - Chuncao
She may know more secrets about this little universe
In the game, you will look for energy, maintain the normal operation of the small world, find the key to explore the space you can't enter, find and discover by exploring, and learn the story before the universe restarts, maybe that will give you some inspiration
In the full version, there will also be features such as combat and space exploration, so stay tuned!
————————————————————————————————————————————————————
What? Low-profile Starfield?
Yun Tianming gives Cheng Xin a star and a small universe. I don't have a star, but I also want to give you a small universe!
After the restart of the universe, a few small universes escaped the collapse, 612 small universe is one of them, unfortunately, you are the only one left in the small universe.
What is the world like there? Are there other microuniverses? Am I the only one given to this little world?
I watched the sunset 44 times that day, and I think the same is true of other small universes?
————————————————————————————————————————————————
The author has gone to the postgraduate entrance examination, and the next update should be the next one!!!
Hope you enjoy our game!!!

name: JACKPOT
detailed_description:
JACKPOT is a casual game. After starting the game, it has five wheels to turn. When the wheel stops, the icon stopped at the winning line matches the winning pattern, and the player will get the winning amount indicated by the winning pattern.
[Game operation]
Click to operate.
[Rules of the game]
- Select number of lines and lines bet
- Press the Spin button to start game
- You can also use Max Bet button to auto bet
- Pres Auto button to turn Auto Spin game mode
[Game features]
The money used in the game is game currency, not gambling. Players will receive certain game coins every day when they enter the game.

name: STARLITE: Defender of Justice Ultimate HD Edition Demo
detailed_description:
STARLITE: Defender of Justice Ultimate HD Edition DEMO

In the year 2170 an alien threat known as the CYRONS invaded the planet Earth with intent of hostile takeover. Using Alien spores launched from their home world, the Cyrons have managed to break through Earth's defense force and have infected the human race with a deadly virus that has killed nearly one third of human life on the planet.

Those who survived took shelter underground or anywhere they could while many others managed to flee the planet, making the great journey to the nearest exoplanet; Wolf Alpha 1061.

Those who didn't die from the virus were turned into mindless Zombies attacking anyone that was left, further helping spread the virus.

On top of that the alien spores contained a bacteria that was bio engineered with advanced technology to infect all technological systems causing world wide disasters and often turning security droids against the very humans they were supposed to protect.

The cops and the military were quick to fall... So the world's Governments formed an alliance.

Sharing all of their resources they decide to create a new organization called STARLITE.

These would be the best of the best soldiers fighting back with advanced technology and new enhanced GENETIC ALTERNATIONS that made them stronger, faster and more adaptable for a battle of this magnitude.

Humanity will not give up without a fight… and the fight has just begun...

We are . . . THE STARLITE AGENTS: Defenders of Justice!!


- Top Down hack & slash action game
- Free flow combo system featuring Psi-weapons
- Play as AGENT 69 - one of STARLITE'S tops agents
- Collect POWER-UPS to unleash devastating blows on the UN-dead
- Collect points to access new Costumes

NEW ULTIMATE HD EDITION:

- NEW UPDATE HD graphics
- NEW Updated Combat SYSTEM +
- NEW Costumes
- NEW COMBOS
- NEW Attacks
- NEW enhanced targeting system
- NEW Updated HD LIGHTING (REAL TIME) +
- NEW ENEMY VARIATION +++
about_the_game:
STARLITE: Defender of Justice Ultimate HD Edition DEMO

In the year 2170 an alien threat known as the CYRONS invaded the planet Earth with intent of hostile takeover. Using Alien spores launched from their home world, the Cyrons have managed to break through Earth's defense force and have infected the human race with a deadly virus that has killed nearly one third of human life on the planet.

Those who survived took shelter underground or anywhere they could while many others managed to flee the planet, making the great journey to the nearest exoplanet; Wolf Alpha 1061.

Those who didn't die from the virus were turned into mindless Zombies attacking anyone that was left, further helping spread the virus.

On top of that the alien spores contained a bacteria that was bio engineered with advanced technology to infect all technological systems causing world wide disasters and often turning security droids against the very humans they were supposed to protect.

The cops and the military were quick to fall... So the world's Governments formed an alliance.

Sharing all of their resources they decide to create a new organization called STARLITE.

These would be the best of the best soldiers fighting back with advanced technology and new enhanced GENETIC ALTERNATIONS that made them stronger, faster and more adaptable for a battle of this magnitude.

Humanity will not give up without a fight… and the fight has just begun...

We are . . . THE STARLITE AGENTS: Defenders of Justice!!


- Top Down hack & slash action game
- Free flow combo system featuring Psi-weapons
- Play as AGENT 69 - one of STARLITE'S tops agents
- Collect POWER-UPS to unleash devastating blows on the UN-dead
- Collect points to access new Costumes

NEW ULTIMATE HD EDITION:

- NEW UPDATE HD graphics
- NEW Updated Combat SYSTEM +
- NEW Costumes
- NEW COMBOS
- NEW Attacks
- NEW enhanced targeting system
- NEW Updated HD LIGHTING (REAL TIME) +
- NEW ENEMY VARIATION +++

name: RoboDunk Prologue
detailed_description:
WISHLIST THE FULL GAME

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1557720


About the Game

ROBODUNK is Nba Jam meets Rogue Legacy, with robots.
A combat dunkball game with sky-high dunks, satisfying tackles and explosive weapons.
JUST...ONE...MORE...DUNK!

█▓▒░ ROBOT MASTERS CHALLENGE ░▒▓█
Instead of the roguelite campaign of the full game, this prologue has an exclusive mode in which you challenge the Robot Masters. Choose the order in which you face them. If you win, you steal their skills. But be careful: the others get stronger after your every victory! Can you beat them all?

● EVERY MATCH IS DIFFERENT: Choose your path among randomized matches with unique rewards, rules, traps and opponents.
● TONS TO UNLOCK: Massive skill tree, robots to discover with their own upgrade tree.
● GROW YOUR TEAM: Your bots level up, gain new skills and stat boosts after every victory.
● COLLECT THE LORE: Piece together info on the Gods and why DUNK is the meaning of life.
● SINGLE PLAYER & FULL COOP: A friend can drop in/out whenever you want.

█▓▒░ SATISFYING ROBOSPORT ░▒▓█
● MASSIVE DUNKS: Charge a max power jump, leap from mid-field and press just at the right time to explode the hoop.
● POWERFUL WEAPONS: Ram the enemy or shoot them with unique weapons, from classic lasers to falling pans and shock rings.
● NEW MODS EACH ROUND: Choose temporary skills and upgrades that change the game at every round: double jumps, shocking passes, ammo multipliers and more.
● STAGE HAZARDS: Avoid or exploit stage dangers like spiky rollers, tornados, jump pads and meteors.
● LOCAL MULTIPLAYER for 1-4 people.

name: X-Dead Detective
detailed_description:
News:

Game Features

  • A variety of traditional FPS guns : shotgun, pistol, rifle, machine gun ect..
  • Explore a space station labyrinth with drones, story and interactive technology.
  • Original voice acting, music score and sound design.
A single player, first person shooter, adventure game featuring voice acting and sound design. Explore space stations and future city environments, collect items to further your investigation. A somewhat gritty, storydriven, cyberpunk-ish, drone shooting, FPS game.

Story Synopsis :
In a post World War 4 underworld society, where new technologies have been integrated into both human society and human biology, new sets of problems arise for the common citizen. In the space city of Fortuna Minor, new crimes are placed in the X-Dead Department, “X-Dead” referring to dead androids having the ability to be brought back to life with the help of technology, but case files are stacking up and assistance is needed.

A string of hackers, saboteurs and viciously intelligent secret agents have corrupted every facet of society, from cops to politicians. Top influencers seek power, new influencers seek recognition and both will do anything they can to get it. It’s a strange and ambiguous reality for many in the world of advanced technologies and new social movements like “Religious Rights for Robots”. The extremely rich and powerful hacker lord, “Yellow Queen”, strikes swift and undefeated, while the
highly influential "Stiffer" corporation looks the other way.

name: アパシー学校であった怖い話1995特別編
detailed_description:
怖すぎるにも ほどがある。

1995年6月。
新聞部は、夏休み前の学校新聞で「学校の七不思議」を特集することになった。七人の学生を集めて、彼らから怖い話を聞き、それを特集としてまとめるのだ。新聞部三年生の日野から命を受け、新入部員の坂上修一はその集会の聞き役を担当することになった。
集会当日、放課後の新聞部部室に日野によって集められた七人の語り部と聞き役の坂上修一は初めて顔を合わせる。
しかし、七人集められたはずの語り部は、何故か六人しかいなかった。
七人目が姿を見せぬまま始まる七不思議の集会。
七人目は、現れるのか。
そして、この集会の終わりに待っているのは……。

選択肢で無数に広がる物語
プレイヤーは、新聞部部員の坂上修一として、七不思議の集会に集まった語り部達から、怖い話を聞く形でゲームは進行します。語り部達の会話の途中に出現する選択肢を選ぶことによって、その後の展開が変わり、物語は無数の広がりを見せます。

限界ギリギリの衝撃のグラフィック！
本作品には衝撃的なグラフィックの数々が目白押し！　目を覆いたくなるようなものから、じわじわと精神を蝕んで いくようなイラストまで、様々な恐怖の形をご堪能下さい……。


本商品は「アパシー学校であった怖い話1995特別編」に加え、追加コンテンツである「追加ディスク」が予め入っております。
シナリオは『学校であった怖い話～VNV～新装版』がベースにしています。
語り部の話す順番はプレイヤーが選べ、誰を何番目に選んだか、誰の後に選んだか、どの話を聞いたか等、どの条件をクリアしてるかによっても選べる選択肢が複雑に変化していきます。
選択肢によっては、シナリオが全く別の話になっていくのはお馴染みの展開通り。

テキスト総量は100万文字を超え、何周でも遊べます。
283種類のエンディングと199種類の一枚絵CGをぜひコンプリートしてください。

name: Coralina: a Memory Tale Demo
detailed_description:
In an unexpected adventure, Coralina found herself thrown into a ludic and confusing world after a mysterious event. This is the second chapter of the oneiric plot of the girl who was taken to Limbo, previously accompanied by a crow with a top hat who claimed to be a spirit of Death. Now, Coralina finds herself next to an even more curious figure, a woman with purple hair who goes by "Cometa", and carries with her the burden of being an alchemist. Together, they will explore the lands of Purgatory, Limbo and also Hell itself, in a new journey with a single objective: to defeat Flamel, the creator of this fantastic world. Amidst the chaos of the unknown, Coralina and Cometa will find each other, better understanding their own internal issues and learning to live in this fantasy setting as they try to return home.

"Coralina: a Memory Tale" is a game about mystery, affection and oneirism, with a diverse range of beautiful visual arts and a relentless soundtrack, which build a plot with personality and love. By purchasing the game, you will enjoy an adventure in the retro RPG style, with a cinematic touch, accompanied by an artistic visual and sound harmony.

In an unexpected adventure, Coralina found herself thrown into a ludic and confusing world after a mysterious event. This is the second chapter of the oneiric plot of the girl who was taken to Limbo, previously accompanied by a crow with a top hat who claimed to be a spirit of Death. Now, Coralina finds herself next to an even more curious figure, a woman with purple hair who goes by "Cometa", and carries with her the burden of being an alchemist. Together, they will explore the lands of Purgatory, Limbo and also Hell itself, in a new journey with a single objective: to defeat Flamel, the creator of this fantastic world. Amidst the chaos of the unknown, Coralina and Cometa will find each other, better understanding their own internal issues and learning to live in this fantasy setting as they try to return home.

"Coralina: a Memory Tale" is a game about mystery, affection and oneirism, with a diverse range of beautiful visual arts and a relentless soundtrack, which build a plot with personality and love. By purchasing the game, you will enjoy an adventure in the retro RPG style, with a cinematic touch, accompanied by an artistic visual and sound harmony.
short_description: A oneiric plot about two girls unraveling the mysteries of Limbo, a land of alchemists, and its other layers: Hell and Purgatory. The second chapter of "Coralina", an indie and retro game, with a charming and original look.

name: Tulgey Wood
detailed_description:
Tulgey Wood is a magical adventure game inspired by the classic tale of Alice in Wonderland. Players will take on the role of Alice as they embark on a thrilling journey through the enchanting and unpredictable world of Wonderland, solving puzzles and unlocking secrets along the way. The objective of the game is to help Alice find all the keys hidden within each level, which will grant her access to the next stage of her journey.

Set within the whimsical and mysterious Tulgey Wood, players will encounter a variety of well-known characters from the original story, such as the Cheshire Cat, the White Rabbit, and the Mad Hatter. These characters will offer helpful advice and occasionally pose challenges, adding depth and excitement to the gameplay.

Throughout the game, players will need to utilize their creativity and critical thinking skills to overcome a range of obstacles, from riddles to complex puzzles. The game features vibrant and imaginative visuals, creating a captivating atmosphere that immerses players in the fantastical world of Wonderland.

Tulgey Wood is designed for players of all ages, with easy-to-understand controls and a user-friendly interface. The game offers a perfect balance of fun and challenge, with an engaging storyline that will keep players entertained for hours on end.

Embark on this incredible journey through the surreal and mesmerizing Tulgey Wood, where you'll navigate treacherous paths, solve mind-bending puzzles, and help Alice unlock the secrets of this enchanted realm. Are you ready to venture into the depths of Wonderland and discover what lies beyond the looking glass?

name: Bad Times at the Silver Lake
detailed_description:
1980, you play as a journalist who, by chance, ended up at the police station, where she wanted to interview the local sheriff. But in place of this, she is greeted by creepy footage...

The virus quickly mutates and transforms the environment into a complete nightmare. Together with your dog Shibu, you have to survive in a new world and try to uncover the cause of the infection.

You will only have a shotgun and a knife in your arsenal to protect yourself. Be careful, ammo is extremely limited, and there are many more zombies. Manage your resources wisely and save your beloved city of Salt Lake.

Step into a surreal, gruesome, yet beautiful world.Step into a surreal, gruesome, yet beautiful world.

Solve puzzles, find clues and uncover story.

Explore an atmospheric and detailed environment, carefully crafted in the style of PS1 horror titles.

name: Grim Tales: Dual Disposition Collector's Edition
detailed_description:
Elephant Games returns with the latest mysterious case of the Grim Tales series!

When a strange souvenir shop is broken into and ransacked, Anna Gray is called to take on the case. But upon arrival, you’re shocked to find yourself as the prime suspect! Your double is out to disrupt the flow of magic, taking your abilities in the process. It’ll take all your skills and expertise to travel to new realities and uncover Lady A’s devilish plans. Can you work with old friends to save the sources of magic and clear your name in time? Find out in this exhilarating Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

The Collector’s Edition includes:

• Continue your adventures with the Keeper in the Bonus Game!
• Use the Archives to revisit HOPs and mini-games!
• Explore nooks and crannies to find puzzle pieces and collectible cryptids!
• Enjoy exclusive music, wallpapers, and more!
• Never get lost with the strategy guide!

name: Virgin Knight is my Onahole Tonight
detailed_description:
You're the #2 Knight in the Royal Army, not by any particular merit or outstanding feat, but simply because you were born into the Royal Family. Your commander, however, is the opposite. She trained hard to get where she is and her skill with the sword and rippling muscles are testament to that fact.

While out on a mission you take the blame for a lower ranked knight's mistake saving her from being executed! Don't get it twisted, this wasn't out of the goodness of your heart or anything like that. The lower ranked knight who you are covering for just so happens to be Commander Hilda's girlfriend!

The deal is simple, Hilda becomes your on-call sex-toy for the next two months and you're even. Show her what she has been missing out on by plunging her into the rapturous depths of masochistic ecstasy. Have her kneel before you and beg for your cock and she'll be hooked on your cream long before the proposed two-month time limit is up! And so, the games begin.

name: Patchwork Beast
detailed_description:
Help Ramis cure an enchanted forest of a mysterious affliction and save Mossglen, in this magical, healing quest.



  • A narrative-driven, single-player adventure game with a charming cast of characters and a touching story of self-discovery
  • An enchanted forest teeming with spirits and secrets
  • Decision-based difficulty, where your decisions have a direct impact on the difficulty of the game
  • Over 2 hours of original music with beautiful orchestrated piano and catchy beats
  • Capybaras

The story is simple - healing a corroding forest - but the true reasons behind the Corrosion and what lies ahead may not be so straight-forward. You and your magic staff may be the key to stopping this evil before it turns the land barren.

Can you stop the Corrosion before it's too late?

name: The Seven Realms: Realm 2 - Official Walkthrough
detailed_description:
The Seven Realms - Realm 2: Official Walkthrough will help you get the most out of your playthrough.

Just like with the Realm 1 Walkthrough, we have kept it concise and detailed. The impacts of every single choice in Realm 2 are covered.

Using this walkthrough will assist you with the following:

  • To understand the direct impact of every choice you make in the game.

  • To see how your choices impact relationships with each character.

  • To see which choices may close off branching paths or open new ones.

  • Understand other background stats that will have impacts during Realm 1 and in later Realms.

  • Show you how to unlock every lewd scene.

  • Show you how to unlock every achievement/trophy.

  • Offer some insight into the character creations of various characters.

The walkthrough will be available in a PDF format that you can use alongside the game while playing. To open the document, click the button showing "WT" in the bottom left corner of the title screen.

name: VTube Studio - VNet Multiplayer Collab
detailed_description:
VTube Studio now supports online multiplayer collabs with your Steam friends, directly within the app!! Supports up to 4 people per collab. This DLC removes the 10 minute time limit and lets you run collabs for as long as you want (limit is 24 hours per collab).

With this, you can run collabs without the hassle of setting up greenscreens or laggy Discord screenshares.

It works like this:

  • All models and items are automatically encrypted and synced between collab participants in the background when you load them!
  • You can even use Live2D items (as long as they aren't too complex).
  • Movement data is sent smoothly, securely and at high FPS thanks to the Steam Data Relay network.
  • There are of course limits!! If you load multiple massively complex models, your may get some lag. You can try out VNet for free for short 10-minute collab sessions, so please do that before purchasing!!

For more info, please refer to the VTube Studio VNet wiki page with all the details.

name: Space Fighter 2
detailed_description:
[Game Introduction]
"Space Fighter 2" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.

[Game Control]
Players can control the game through keyboard, keyboard+mouse or joystick.

[Game Features]
Players can get diamonds by destroying enemy planes, and diamonds can be used to upgrade the protagonist's fighter planes in the supply station. The types that can be upgraded include the number of bullets, the power of bullets, cannons, shields, large-scale attack weapons and so on.
When the player hits the enemy plane, he can gain energy. After the energy is full, the main gun and auxiliary gun of the fighter will be upgraded. After the level reaches the maximum, the protagonist fighter will enter the state of blood.
After the player defeats a specific enemy, he will get an escort fighter. Different escort fighters have different attack methods, and you can carry up to two escort fighters. Can be set in supply depots.
Players can upgrade element technology, open element cannon and element skills. When the elemental energy is full, the elemental skills can be released. When the energy of various elements is full, different elemental skills and combined elemental skills can be released.

After the player defeats a specific enemy, he will get an escort fighter. Different escort fighters have different attack methods, and you can carry up to two escort fighters. Can be set in supply depots.
Players can upgrade element technology, open element cannon and element skills. When the elemental energy is full, the elemental skills can be released. When the energy of various elements is full, different elemental skills and combined elemental skills can be released.
short_description: "Space Fighter 2" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.

name: Midline '85
detailed_description:
Midline ‘85 is an interactive psychological thriller about working as an emergency call-taker in the small town of Midline. You will get over a dozen varied calls from the victims, as well as calls from your colleagues, friends, and even rivals. You will accompany Elena through six months of her work, from the very first day to the story end. What it will be like is completely up to you.

HELLO, MISS HAYWORD

After her long education in the Academy, Elena Hayword returned to her hometown. Now her duty is to save lives on the other side of the wire. How will she perform her duties? Will she listen to her mentor? The choice is yours, but remember: suffering and deaths of the people will leave their trace. Take care of Elena.

CHOICE IS YOUR DUTY

Arson and robbery, assault and murder, greed and folly. Your weapon against evil are the correct words. Find the right approach to every caller, gather information, and use it. The path to saving people is never straight, and not every obvious choice would be the right one. Act fast but never careless.

THE TOWN TALKS TO YOU

The noise of its streets, the gunshots, the human whisper. You never see the other end of the wire, but it is well enough to listen carefully… Every line is professionally voiced, every call is filled with the slightest detail. Use it.

AS THOUGH A STRETCHING THREAD…

A year ago something weird happened in Midline. The kind that makes even your colleagues hesitate to discuss it. Perhaps, it is Elena who will follow the sparse clues and solve the year-old crime. Be vigilant.
