name: Paranormal Mission
detailed_description:
Welcome to Paranormal Mission, the thrilling spot-the-difference game that will put your powers of observation to the ultimate test! With three different maps to explore - Apartment Building, Hospital, and Japanese Gym - you'll embark on a hauntingly fun adventure through a world of spooky sights and sounds.

In Paranormal Mission, you'll start out in Normal mode, where you'll need to spot the differences between two seemingly identical images before time runs out. But beware - there are anomalies lurking in the shadows, waiting to trip you up! You'll need to keep your wits about you and your eyes sharp, because if there are more than four undetected anomalies, it's game over.

But fear not, brave adventurer - if you can beat Normal mode, you'll unlock the even more challenging Endless mode. Here, you'll play until there are more than four undetected anomalies, and the stakes are even higher. Think you have what it takes to make it to the top of the leaderboard? Prove your skills and earn in-game currency as you go!

So what are you waiting for? Embark on your Paranormal Mission today, and see if you have what it takes to spot the differences and conquer the anomalies!

name: Bottle
detailed_description:
Bottle is a very short game in which you play as an alcoholic man of solitude. It is about the mood of melancholy in winter nature. As you walk through the path, you see the visions of a woman and hear the poems she leaves to you.

This mystical, atmospheric, and relaxing game takes only 15 minutes to finish, therefore there is no save system. And there are flamey-looking temporary speed boosts scattered around the world.

Bottle is the re-creation of the game called "Bottle" which was released back in 2016. Its content has been made from scratch except the charming music is the same.

Instead of action and/or interaction, this game is for those who mostly seek to slowly experience the mood: That's the combination of winter nature, melancholic poems, warm piano music, emotional voice acting... "atmosphere".

name: Get Out Joey !
detailed_description:
- I'm great, I have a big bag and a magic spear.
But I'm stuck here, and I have to get out. Fast !

How arrogant. Too bad ! You will still have to help Joey get out of this cave.
It was rather simple for him to shoot down and loot this treasure. But without thinking about the return, it will be much more difficult for him to go back up.




Through different biomes, the dangers will put your agility and your determination to the test. But watch out for the fall! Don't be too hasty, each step forward increases the danger and risks setting you back farther than you think...



With a system for handling your spear, you will be able to cling onto certain parts of the scenery and swing in order to progress in your adventure. This technique will often be essential for crossing the chasms that separate you from the surface. The closer you get to the exit, the harder it will be to make progress.



A dash system will allow you to reach even more distant platforms!



Be prepared for some surprises! Boosts, unforeseen dangers... You are not prepared !

name: ShudderStep
detailed_description:
Step into the world of "ShudderStep," a first-person horror game that will chill you to the bone. You play as a survivor who must navigate through a dark and foreboding world, filled with unspeakable horrors lurking in every shadow. With only your wits and a handful of tools at your disposal, you'll need to fight your way through hordes of monsters, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets that lie hidden within.

As you progress through the game, you'll discover a world that is as mysterious as it is terrifying. You'll uncover clues that hint at a dark and sinister plot, and you'll learn to master the unique mechanics of the game that will help you to survive. With atmospheric sound design, spine-tingling visuals, and a haunting soundtrack, "Shudder Step" will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end.

Do you have what it takes to survive the horrors that lie ahead? Will you uncover the secrets that are hidden within? The fate of the world rests on your shoulders. Play "ShudderStep" today and find out.

detailed_description:
Welcome, Vault Hunter, to a pinball game of looting and jackpot shooting! Armed with your trusty silver balls, face down fearsome psychos, skags, and bosses as you fight your way across Pandora!

- Level up, minion! Shoot the spinning target and earn points to increase your pinball prowess!
- Catch-a-Riiiiiiideee! Shoot the spindisk and goooooooo!
- Poking a Skag never hurt anyone! Play right and he'll reward you.
- Congratulations, you've found the Vault! Now all you have to do is survive the Boss and the loot is yours. Try not to die!
- Oh, you did die. No problem! Save your ball with precise shots and you'll be a whole New-U!

name: Pinball FX - Brothers in Arms®: Win the War Pinball
detailed_description:
Stick close to your brothers as you complete missions and liberate towns within the Netherlands – now armed with a silver ball and your skills. Help SSgt Matthew Baker and the 101st Airborne in day and nighttime missions and claim your place on the leaderboards.

Features:
- Command your squad in exciting day and nighttime missions
- Shoot only lit lanes to move your squad in stealth in Infiltration mode
- Spell RECON and complete the Hurry-Up to score more points in the main modes
- Destroy Flak 88 cannons and repair the bridge with successful shots
- Liberate 4 cities to reach Win the War Wizard mode, and get millions of points in a 5-ball multiball

name: When God Left Us Demo
detailed_description:
When God Left Us is a first-person horror game set in a corrupted world, a world that God abandoned before creating ours. Legend has it that speaking the name of that forsaken place will open a portal to its grounds. Despite the warnings, you dare to try this yourself.

Environment

Explore a medieval-gothic church like setting. twisted and corrupted, shrouded in an
unnatural darkness that fell upon the world when God abandoned it. The environment is partly hand tailored and partially randomly generated, and it changes whenever the player dies, so you'll never know what to expect.

Story

When God Left Us is a nightmarish tale of a world abandoned by its creator, where the Church has split into two factions and the people can no longer die. The Church of Hate's obsession with power and immortality leads to a ritual of severing tongues to prevent them from conjuring portals to escape.


The Tears Of God

When God abandoned the world, an eternal darkness engulfed everything, a shroud that only the Tears of God could pierce. These crystallized tears are the sole light source of this desolate and forsaken world. You'll be able to collect these light sources and carry them with you to illuminate the darkness. You can use them to mark your path and avoid getting lost. You will also be able to throw them around causing them to release a series of flashes and loud shrieks, illuminating their surroundings and allowing you to determine what lies ahead. Beware though, as you will likely attract unwanted attention.


Death

Permanent death is not part of the world since God abandoned it. When you die in the game, your body will eventually heal itself, and you'll awaken somewhere else, where your assailant left you. However, don't be fooled into thinking that you'll come out of each death unscathed. Each time you die, there will be consequences that will impact your ability to navigate the environment and avoid danger. You may suffer from a limp or other physical condition that will make it more difficult to survive the horrors that lurk in the darkness.

name: Pixel Madness
detailed_description:
- About the game -

Pixel Madness - is simple 2D clicker game but with cool key elements that will help you achieve your goals and make your gameplay more fun.

- You can -

CRAFTING

- use your workbench to craft different materials from different resources.

TRANSMUTATIONS

- use your "Magic knowledge" to splice essences into something very cool.

DIFFERENT WORLDS

- visit different locations to obtain better resources with more XP.

BOSS FIGHTING

- fight different bosses to earn XP and maybe you can even get a good reward after beating the boss.

ACHIEVEMENTS

- complete goals and unlock cool looking pixel images called achievements.

- More... -


Our biggest goal is to make a really good community that is really interested in what we are doing and also wants to be a part of the game development!

We are going to make a lot of updates in the future with new mechanics/bosses/locations and more, so don't forget to join our official discord server to know about all our announcements & updates!

name: Brave Eduardo Demo
detailed_description:
Living World


Our approach to Brave Eduardo’s world is character focused. While the environment is important, this Victorian Era-inspired world is heavily driven by ambitious businessmen, dutiful Knights, a contentious monarchy system, and beings beyond people’s (Bear’s) comprehension. There is an anxious class struggle between Spidz and Bears, manipulated by well-connected individuals from both sides.

For Fans of Hollow Knight and Breath of the Wild


During the very beginning phases of Brave Eduardo, we were absolutely entranced by the flawless combat system of Hollow Knight. We also loved the freedom that we felt while playing Breath of the Wild. As a result, we spent a lot of time in making the combat feel good, while trying to make the game feel as open and free as possible. We put in mechanics like cooking, weather, and dungeon crawling inspired heavily by Legend of Zelda, Breath of the Wild.

The earliest inspiration for this game comes from a popular legend on the internet: it's about teddy bears forgotten under children's beds, secretly protecting them while they sleep, and fighting against the evil forces that seek to destroy their childhood innocence. Based on this impression from their own childhood, the developers have created a vast and captivating world.

Brave Eduardo Was Originally Designed As A Horror Game


There is something that people like about seeing an adorable and cute thing sitting next to a body horror-inspired monster. While we scaled back tried to scale back the horror as much as possible, the audience of many conventions URGED us to return the horror aspect to the game. We’ve decided to keep the scary part in the game but do so subtly.

A Card Game within the RPG


We think what makes a good RPG (i.e. Knights of the Old Republic, Witcher, Skyrim…etc) is always the world. What the citizens do for entertainment is a big part of it. With this excuse in mind, John embarked on a journey to draw 100 cards and he completed his trek on the very last day of 2019. (P.S. there is a physical version of this game as well!)

An Amazing Composer


As you can probably tell from the music in the trailer, our composer is amazing. He is working hard on making a great theme and sound effects for the game. We even hired an orchestra to play his music live! One thing we can always be sure of is an amazing OST (just look at our other games)! It is all cause of our amazing composer.

short_description: Play as a teddy bear trying to find his place in a vast 2D Open World set in the Victorian era. Explore bustling towns and magical biomes while befriending a diverse cast of bears on your journey. Just BEAR in mind: everyone isn't as they seem.

name: MEATGUN
detailed_description:
The top-down roguelike shooter where your ammunition is edible.

>> Live, Die, Repeat

This game is a roguelike dungeon crawler, meaning each time you die, you're sent back to the beginning of the game, and each time you're sent back to the beginning, the game changes. The rooms, the enemies, and the items you get are all randomly chosen each time you play, which makes each run a unique experience.

>> A Gun That Shoots Meat

As the name of the game suggests, the player is armed with guns that shoot meat. There are 4 guns to choose from, ranging from a pistol that shoots chicken nuggets to a sniper rifle that shoots sausages. However, the ammo serves a different purpose; because the ammo is meat, you can also eat it to recover health. To succeed, you must use your ammo wisely for both damage and healing.

>> Rally The Troops

Not only are there multiple guns to choose from, but multiple playable characters as well. There are 4 Military Extraction Troopers to choose from, ranging from the Assault Trooper, who can dash quickly to avoid bullets, to the Demolitionist, who can lay down proximity mines. Combine different troopers with different guns to get a new experience on every run.

>> GMO Gone Wrong

As the result of an experiment gone wrong, giant, sentient, radioactive vegetables have taken over The Facility. Your job as a Military Extraction Trooper is to venture into the research facility and wipe out the menace inside. You will fight enemies like broccoli, pea-pods, brussel sprouts and tomatoes, all armed with varying types of guns and weaponry.

>> Upgrade Your Arsenal

Of course, your Meatgun will not be the only weapon you have. Inside the Facility, you will find an item in each room, each one an experimental weapon designed by the Facility's scientists. There are over 30 unique items with differing effects, from hot sauce that burns your enemies to takeout boxes that increase your ammo capacity. Many items' effects combine together in surprising ways. You can even get multiple stacks of each item for a more powerful effect.

name: Mystic Blast
detailed_description:
(Mystic Blast) is an exciting puzzle defense game that will test your skills and strategic thinking. In this game, you need to connect two or more matching tiles to clear them from the board and defend against waves of attacking enemies.

Players will enter a magical world full of mysterious creatures, where they will encounter various obstacles and challenges. To succeed in this game, players must use their wits and tactical abilities to connect matching tiles, defend against enemies, and unlock powerful new abilities.

The game uses unique tower defense elements, players can summon a powerful wizard to fire magic bullets at enemies. By tapping on the wizard character, the player can initiate magical attacks, destroying enemies and clearing any obstacles on the board.

(Mystic Blast), players will encounter various challenges and obstacles, including tricky tile layouts, waves of enemies. To succeed in this game, players need to use their strategic thinking and problem-solving skills to overcome these challenges and win.

The difficulty of the game increases over time, ensuring that players of all skill levels can enjoy the fun and excitement of Mystic Blast. The game features beautiful graphics, exciting gameplay and challenging puzzles that will provide hours of entertainment and fun for players of all ages.

So, what are you waiting for? Jump into the magical world of (Mystic Blast) today and see if you have what it takes to fend off the invading enemies from the forces of darkness!

name: NeverHome - Hall of Apathy
detailed_description:
Look who's finally decided to wake up.



In NeverHome, a young girl named Granger suddenly awakens in a world that's not her own. Brave through a hostile world using only your wits and the help of new friends you make along the way to return to your reality.

Explore liminal and abstract series of rooms as you solve puzzles and search for the truth of these never-ending halls. You might even encounter interesting secrets along the way. But be aware: these halls are not empty– they never were.



NeverHome - Hall of Apathy is the first chapter in a larger anthology-style game, inspired by RPG Maker horror games from the early 2010's. Expect it to take at least an hour to complete.



A minor warning: This game is a horror game. As such, it contains minor amounts of blood and other unsettling imagery.

name: Penguin Noir
detailed_description:
Penguin Noir takes inspiration from classic pinball games coupled with an intriguing and humorous mystery to uncover.

Play as Giuseppe Squawks, a disgraced detective seeking to uncover the shocking truth behind his girlfriend’s disappearance. Slide your way through a world full of icy twists and turns and rack up points in a combo while on your way to find out what the Seal Club Mafia did to Adelaide Anchovie!

Our game takes the classic gameplay of pinball and adapts it into fast-paced maze exploration. Throughout each level, the player is tasked with collecting three pearls and keeping up a combo of actions that influence their movement. For example, the player can fire a gun that boosts them through the air with its recoil!

short_description: One fateful night, while Penguin P.I. Giuseppe Squawks is out to dinner with his dearest girlfriend, a seemingly random explosion takes his loved one from him. Now, aided by an octopus named Tony the Tickler, he must hunt down the Mafioso who orchestrated the accident and bring him to justice.

name: Ultranova
detailed_description:
Ultranova is a 2.5D sci-fi platformer game that follows the story of Nova, a high-tech cyborg who has crash-landed on the hostile planet of Neoterra. Equipped with a powerful blaster rifle and a suite of advanced technological abilities, Nova must explore the treacherous planet, fight off dangerous enemies, and uncover the secrets of Neoterra to find a way back home.

As players progress through the game, they will unlock new abilities and upgrade their existing ones to overcome increasingly difficult challenges. The game features ten levels set on the rugged terrain of Neoterra and in orbit above the planet, each with unique hazards, enemies, and environments to explore.



In addition to the storyline, destroying enemies drop scrap that you gather to your inventory. At the end of levels, you can trade in the scrap for augmentations to level up your abilities. You can also perform side-quests at the end of the levels where you go back to complete certain tasks with higher difficulty and altered enemies for additional rewards. This is not required to complete the game, but it will provide additional playable content and unlock achievements.

Ultranova boasts stylized low poly 3D graphics and immersive sound effects that bring the world of Neoterra to life. With its engaging storyline, challenging gameplay, and sci-fi setting, Ultranova is sure to provide hours of entertainment for players of all ages and skill levels.

Nova

Nova is the main protagonist of Ultranova, a sci-fi platformer game. She is a highly advanced robotic entity designed for exploration and combat. Nova has a dark gray metal body with RGB trimmings that pulsate, giving her a sleek and futuristic appearance. Her suite is equipped with various technological abilities, including a powerful blaster rifle, a jetpack for aerial mobility, and an energy shield for protection. As players progress through the game, they unlock and upgrade Nova's abilities, enabling her to overcome increasingly challenging enemies and hazards on her journey to escape the planet Neoterra. Despite being a machine, Nova possesses a strong will and determination, which drives her to complete her mission and overcome any obstacle in her path.



Nova's suite provides her with a range of abilities that allow her to navigate the levels, defeat enemies, and solve puzzles. These abilities include a jetpack for vertical movement, a shield for protection, a scanner for finding hidden objects and enemies, and a blaster rifle for combat.

Game Mechanics

As the player progresses through the levels, they can collect and upgrade their abilities and weapons to make Nova more powerful. The levels themselves are designed to be challenging but fair, with a mix of platforming, combat, and puzzle-solving elements.

In addition to the main levels, there are also optional side objectives and hidden collectibles to discover, which encourage exploration and reward the player with additional upgrades and abilities.

Overall, the gameplay mechanics of Ultranova aim to provide a fun and engaging platformer experience that rewards skill and experimentation, while also providing a sense of progression and player agency through upgrades and abilities.

name: Coffee Dates
detailed_description: Coffee Dates is a passionately crafted visual novel about getting to know your oddball co-workers at a humble little coffee shop. Each one of them has their own unique ambitions that you'll get roped into, which only escalate in scale and weirdness as you progress. Enjoy our hand-crafted art style and expressive character animations. Play some mini-games between those long sessions of dialog reading. Ultimately, Coffee Dates is a lighthearted game designed to give you some good laughs and some wholesome feels.
about_the_game: Coffee Dates is a passionately crafted visual novel about getting to know your oddball co-workers at a humble little coffee shop. Each one of them has their own unique ambitions that you'll get roped into, which only escalate in scale and weirdness as you progress. Enjoy our hand-crafted art style and expressive character animations. Play some mini-games between those long sessions of dialog reading. Ultimately, Coffee Dates is a lighthearted game designed to give you some good laughs and some wholesome feels.
short_description: Coffee Dates is a fun and lighthearted visual novel about hanging out with your crazy co-workers and the comedic shenanigans that unfold. There's even a few bits of game play that aren't just reading. Isn't that cool!

name: Game Master Module
detailed_description:
The game Master RPG module is for expanding your online rpg-sessions experience.
It allows you to set up a custom tabletop board with miniatures and play with your friends. Just like in your living room or basement ;)

Experience your favorite RPG system with simulated tabletop miniatures.

Features:
-Custom map size
-Hex Map mode, with rotation and movement snaping
-Square Map mode, with rotation and movement snaping
-No snapping mode for full movement and rotation freedom

-FBX, OBJ, STL file loader for custom miniatures.
-Unique miniature notepad and grid info. for keeping stat notes etc.
-JPG, PNG files loader for custom backgrounds
-2D mode with spite loading system.

name: Blood Pivot
detailed_description:
Blood Pivot is an electrifying pixel top-down indie game. Immerse yourself in a harrowing tale, beginning as a child selected as a sacrifice by your own parents, both devout members of the sinister cult known as "The Children of The Breathing Cross". As you struggle to escape their clutches, you are forced to defend yourself and inadvertently take the life of your own father. But that's only the beginning.



As you search the labyrinthine depths of your home, you uncover a foreboding and insidious underground world that will test your sanity and challenge your very existence. Your religious paranoia will drive you to the brink of madness as you embark on a treacherous journey to save the lives of all those who have been sacrificed.

✞ GAMEPLAY ✞

As a young child, you'll explore a dark and eerie world filled with unsettling environments and disturbing creatures. Armed with only your wits and a small arsenal of weapons, you must navigate through the game's top-down levels and fight against the members of a sinister cult that seeks to control you. Along the way, you'll encounter challenging puzzles and obstacles that will test your problem-solving skills and courage. The game's haunting soundtrack and minimalist visuals will immerse you in a world of psychological horror, leaving you on edge until the very end.

✞ EXPERIENCE TRUE HORROR ✞

Blood Pivot will thrill and terrify you with a multitude of enigmas, obstacles, along with constant battles against the fanatical members of the cult, determined to keep their twisted secrets buried forever. The game is infused with an eerie, suspenseful, and amazingly captivating storyline that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

✞ RELIGIOUS PARANOIA ✞

If you're ready for a challenging and spine-tingling gaming experience, then Blood Pivot is the perfect choice for you. And the best part? This heart-stopping game is available now on Steam. So, brace yourself and enter the world of Blood Pivot, if you dare.

name: CloneZWars
detailed_description:
In the early phase of a zombie apocalypse a mad scientists was able to develop an effective way to clone himself. As a clone you will be tasked to go out there and try to save as many people possible, secure for them safe shelters and try to restore a functional society.
To secure buildings you will need to clear them from zombies, barricade every single ground floor entrance and add a staircase connecting the second floor to the ground that will be used by the survivors to get in and out. Every single survivor you save can be recruited in your community if you have a safe place for them to live in. Remember that they also need food and water to stay alive so you will need to scavenge for those precious supplies from highly infested malls and farms. But for long term you will be forced to find tools, crafting blueprints and seeds to start farming in order to have a sustainable way to get food. While for water you will need to build water towers that will be able to collect rain water and filter it into safe water to drink.

short_description: Almost all humanity was wiped out by a zombie virus in a few days. But there is still hope thanks to a scientist breakthrough in cloning. Use those clones and their supernatural abilities to save survivors, secure buildings for them and restore the modern society.

name: Disney Speedstorm - Standard Founder’s Pack
detailed_description:
Welcome to Disney Speedstorm's Early Access!
Start your engines and hit the track with the Standard Founder's Pack, which grants early access to the game and contains exclusive items!



This Founder's Pack contains:
  • Early Access to Disney Speedstorm
  • Racers unlocked: Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck
  • Additional Racer unlock of your choice*
  • 4,000 Tokens** (in-game currency)
  • 2 Golden Pass Credits***
  • Exclusive Founding Member Racing Suit for Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck and the chosen Racer
  • Exclusive Founding Member Kart livery for Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck and the chosen Racer
  • Exclusive Founder’s Motto and Avatar
*Players will be able to immediately unlock one of the following Racers: Baloo, Belle, the Beast, Elizabeth Swann, Shang, or Mowgli.

**Tokens are an in-game currency in Disney Speedstorm that can be earned for free by achieving goals in the game or by being purchased using real-world money. They are not season-based and can be accumulated. They can also be used to obtain items in the shop, buy the Golden Pass, skip Golden Pass tiers, and much more.

***Golden Pass Credits grant access to a premium tier of seasonal rewards, like liveries, Suits, currencies, Racers, and much more.

Disney Speedstorm is the ultimate hero-based combat racing game, set on high-speed circuits inspired by Disney and Pixar worlds. It’s a thrilling arcade racing experience where players will need to master each character’s unique skills on the racetrack and claim victory.

name: Queen of Dark
detailed_description:
WORLD
-Explore the realm of Arzamor and the challenges offered by the lands without a king, where enemies can be found around every corner, and territories are disputed daily by different foes.
-Travel the world freely, discover its secrets and history.
-Forge your weapons with materials found along the way, and use them wisely depending on the enemy you face.
-Take advantage of the environment, set traps, and prepare each battle with intelligence and cunning.
-The day/night cycle and various weather changes will influence the world around you.

COMBAT
-Enjoy melee combat where the precision of each strike, reflexes, and choice of equipment will make a difference.
-Long-range combat with weapons like bows, crossbows, or magic projectiles allows you to attack from a distance.
-Traps provide the combat with a strategic component.
-Area attacks will be very useful for taking out large groups of enemies at once.

AI
-Each enemy has the same advantages/disadvantages as the player, humanoid enemies can also use items and set traps.
-The difficulty of each enemy is linked to their level and 5 parameters that configure their character, so regardless of their level, we can encounter enemies with low levels but great combat skills, and on the other hand, high-level enemies with low AI parameters that make the enemy not dodge blows, not maintain their guard, or not attack with the same frequency, giving each combat a unique challenge.

PROGRESSION
-The initial version of Early Access consists of 100 levels of progression.
-Runes allow us to improve player statistics such as health.
-The 5 classes provide unique attributes that can be combined with each other and are the basis for creating oriented builds.

MISSIONS
-The mission system will always provide objectives for those who do not wish to explore and prefer to focus on combat and progression.
-World events provide players with the opportunity to experience unique battles and obtain random loot.
-Combat arenas provide quick challenges and a controlled environment.

-Area attacks will be very useful for taking out large groups of enemies at once.

AI
-Each enemy has the same advantages/disadvantages as the player, humanoid enemies can also use items and set traps.
-The difficulty of each enemy is linked to their level and 5 parameters that configure their character, so regardless of their level, we can encounter enemies with low levels but great combat skills, and on the other hand, high-level enemies with low AI parameters that make the enemy not dodge blows, not maintain their guard, or not attack with the same frequency, giving each combat a unique challenge.

PROGRESSION
-The initial version of Early Access consists of 100 levels of progression.
-Runes allow us to improve player statistics such as health.
-The 5 classes provide unique attributes that can be combined with each other and are the basis for creating oriented builds.

MISSIONS
-The mission system will always provide objectives for those who do not wish to explore and prefer to focus on combat and progression.
-World events provide players with the opportunity to experience unique battles and obtain random loot.
-Combat arenas provide quick challenges and a controlled environment.
short_description: QoD is an open-world, third-person game where you can freely explore the lands of Arzamor and face its enemies.

name: Fursona Festival
detailed_description:
Ever wonder what animal your personality matches best? This game let's you answer an extensive list of questions in the form of a point-and-click adventure/visual novel. The game will analyze you over 200+ personality questions, determining what Jungian archetype best suits you, and the related animal based on historical symbolism.

A great game for streamers to connect with their audience by answering a bunch of quirky or insightful questions about what drives them. It's also a wonderful experience for anyone curious about anthropomorphization or the furry fandom: find out what animal you're most like, risk free! Plus, you're guided along on your journey by a 9ft tall dragon lady! Pretty neat!

name: Caveman Ransom
detailed_description:
Story:
Ooga is a friendly bearded caveman living his peaceful life until his beloved grandfather Booga is abducted for ransom by a gang of bandits.
Ooga sets out for the primordial lands of Sandellha, where he will face all kinds of hurdles along his journey to reach and dismantle the den of bandit cavemen and finally free his beloved grandfather!

Gameplay:
Crush your enemies and get new thrown weapons from bosses to become even stronger.
Collect coins to spend in the shop and level up your game.
Jump, dodge traps, and climb ladders – this is the pure platforming action of your childhood!

Features:
  • 16-bit style platformer that is just carefree as in the 1990s!
  • 50 levels full of dinosaurs, wild monsters, and deadly traps!
  • 5 BOSS bandits that are ready to fight to the last breath!
  • 4 deadly thrown weapons to collect along the way!
  • A shop with many useful things to buy!
  • The perfect vintage style of pixel art and chiptunes!
  • Unlock all of the achievements!

About the Game

A hidden object game where you must find all the bees to complete each level.

Key features:

🖼️ 15 Unique artworks

❓ 1500+ Hidden objects total
🐁 750+ Mice
🧀 750+ Cheese.
💡 ∞ Unlimited hints if you get stuck
♻️ Restore a small number of hidden objects to a painting so you can find them again!
🎵 Music and ambiance for each artwork
⌨️ Use your keyboard to move/zoom in if you have no scroll wheel
💾 3x save slots
🗑️ Reset progress entirely and play again
🕒 Timer included to show how long you took to complete each level

Context:

The brief was simple. I commissioned artists to create a fantasy world, and hide as many mice and cheese as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, and 1500+ hidden objects you will have a lot of searching to do.

Controls:

Use your mouse to move around the image and zoom in / out. When you find a hidden object, click it and it will disappear. You can also use WASD to move and the arrow keys to zoom.

Difficulty:

A full range of difficulty is included, but all levels start unlocked, your progress is saved as you play, and you can use hints if you get stuck.

Get immersed:

Each painting has its own music and ambiance to help you connect with the world, as you search for everything.

Replayable

You can restore a small number of hidden objects back into a painting so you can find them again! It’s much harder when there are only a few hidden objects left (especially randomly). You can also use up to 3 save slots so you can replay without progress loss. Alternatively, you can reset your progress for the entire game if you’d like to start over.

name: Graveyard Sprint
detailed_description:
Graveyard Sprint is a 3D parkour game that combines gothic style with exciting gameplay. In the game, you will play as a human trying to escape a graveyard while avoiding chasing zombies. You must perform various difficult jumping and rolling actions to safely escape. The game is easy to control, and players only need to use the up, down, left and right arrow keys to control the character to jump and roll, avoiding obstacles and the pursuit of zombies.

The game features captivating gothic style design that creates a sinister and terrifying cemetery world, providing players with a sense of urgency and fear. In addition, the game is quite challenging, requiring players to practice and improve their skills to complete higher level challenges.

Graveyard Sprint is an exciting and challenging parkour game that not only provides players with intense gameplay but also a unique gothic style experience. Come and take on the challenge!

name: Octodad (Student Edition)
detailed_description:
(This is the original free student project. The fully complete Octodad: Dadliest Catch can be purchased here.)

https://store.steampowered.com/app/224480/Octodad_Dadliest_Catch/?beta=0

Octodad is a third person adventure game about destruction, deception, and fatherhood. The player controls Octodad, a dapper octopus masquerading as a human, as he goes about a day of his life. His existence is a constant struggle, as he must master mundane tasks with his unwieldy boneless tentacles while simultaneously keeping his cephalopodan nature a secret from his human family.

The player controls Octodad like a marionette, dragging his arms and legs around while his body flops along. The player’s goals are often simple household chores made difficult and interesting by the flailing, tenuous control they have over Octodad’s body.

Being an octopus also has its strengths. Octodad can slip through tight spaces, grab objects with his suckers, and knock things around with tremendous strength. But if the player does things too out-of-the-ordinary, Octodad’s family will grow suspicious and realize what he really is. If they do, it’s game over for Octodad!

FEATURES:

  • 6 levels full of comedic failure!
  • 3 family members to deceive!
  • Roughly 35-45 minutes of gameplay!
  • One very non-canonical ending!

WHY DID WE MAKE THIS?


Octodad: Student Edition is part of Young Horses: Free Range, where we collect our smaller side projects and release them for free!

This is the game that started it all! Octodad was made before the founding of Young Horses by a group of students at DePaul University. Our goal was to enter the Independent Games Festival in 2010 (we did enter, but we didn't win). Octodad made a big enough splash that we decided to take our chances and start a company to develop a commercial sequel!

So give it a try! It's free, so there's only so disappointed you can be!

name: Fate of New Albans
detailed_description:
Settlers from the Old Powers settled the colony of New Albans in the New World in search of treasure and prestige. 6 months on, neither are found. Instead the townsfolk are beset with issues that hinder all progress, most notably are the rising tensions with the native tribes: Karok and Saponi.

Brought in to initially help the Governor. It will be up to you to decide the fate of the colony of New Albans, how will you handle the current threats?

YOUR CHOICES AND CONSEQUENCES

Soon after arriving, you may shape the future of these lands by choosing who to side with. Assist the inhabitants of both New Albans and the tribal natives to increase your reputation with each faction by completing tasks and puzzles. Determine the outcome of an emerging conflict and forge your own experience.

A NEW WORLD

Explore the lands in and around New Albans. Meet and interact with dozens of NPCs who will require your help. Engage in dialogue to learn more about each faction and individual which will help make your choices.


FEATURES
  • Choices have consequences: Make choices based on your experiences with the townsfolk of New Albans and the natives of Karok and Saponi. What faction will you support?
  • Tasks and puzzles: Be of service to the Governor and tribe Chiefs by taking on quests and tackling puzzles.
  • Every decision you make is final: Many quests and events can lead to a choice at the end which will impact your standing with that faction. The autosave feature does not allow loading of previous saves. You must make choices carefully.
  • How will you determine the Fate of New Albans?: Ultimately, it is down to you to determine the fate of these lands, your actions can result in one of 3 diiferent major endings.

name: Shroom Siege
detailed_description: Shroom Siege is a fast-paced, strategic multiplayer experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat! In this 4 vs 4 couch game, you play as a shroom, mounting other characters in a race to be the first to claim victory. Inspired by the classic arcade hit, Killer Queen, Shroom Siege offers three unique ways to win - Military Victory by killing the Queen three times, Economic Victory by spreading your spore across the map, and Slug Victory by moving your slug into your own goal. The twist? You can't perform any actions without first mounting the Queen, a worker, or a warrior. So get ready to strategize, coordinate with your teammates, and mount your way to victory in Shroom Siege! The game works best with a controller, so grab your friends and let the fun begin!

name: Emplacement Demo
detailed_description:
Emplacement is an innovative and strategic turn-based game that combines elements of tile-laying and combat. The game is played on an isometric board, with each player taking turns to place tiles in an attempt to gain the upper hand over their opponent. The game is similar to chess in that players must think ahead and anticipate their opponent's moves in order to succeed.



As the game progresses, players can use their units to engage in combat with the other player's units. The main objective of the game is to defeat the other player by killing their king. The king is a special unit that is placed on the board at the start of the game, and should be protected by other units. The game is won by the player who successfully kills the other player's king.



Emplacement is a challenging and entertaining game that requires players to think creatively and strategically. The game's isometric perspective and turn-based gameplay add depth and excitement to the experience, making it a must-play for fans of strategy games. The game's simple yet engaging mechanics make it accessible to players of all ages and skill levels, making it an excellent choice for both casual and hardcore gamers alike.

name: Molten Horn
detailed_description:
A legendary beast has awoken: For centuries, the Molten Horn has been nothing more than a myth, a legend passed down through the ages. But now, the beast has awoken, and its fury threatens to destroy everything in its path. As a warrior on a quest to defeat the beast, you're driven not only by a desire to protect your people but also by a hunger for the power that the Molten Horn promises. But as you delve deeper into its lair, you realize that the price of that power may be too high.

The game is a turn-based strategy rogue-like with tactical elements, set in a randomly generated environment. Each playthrough provides a unique challenge, as the layout of the levels and the enemies you face will be different every time.

You must use your wits and combat skills to succeed in your quest. You can push enemies into traps to dispatch them or use the environment to your advantage in other ways. You'll also have the option to upgrade your character's abilities or assemble a team of adventurers to aid you on your journey.

But be warned - death is permanent in Molten Horn. If you fall in battle, you'll have to start over from the beginning. Can you survive the challenges of the Molten Horn and emerge victorious? Only the most skilled and strategic players will triumph in this thrilling turn-based adventure.

Featuring:
  • Randomly Generated Environments: Each game run will feature a new environment with different layouts and traps to keep things fresh.
  • Tactical Combat: Players must use their wits and strategy to defeat the Molten Horn and its minions. Push enemies into traps, use the environment to your advantage, or upgrade your abilities to gain an edge.
  • Permadeath: Death is permanent in Molten Horn, meaning each run is a high-stakes challenge. Only the most skilled players can survive the dangers of the Molten Horn's lair.
  • Character Progression: As players progress through the game, they can upgrade their character's abilities and even assemble a team of adventurers to aid them on their quest.
  • Rogue-Like Elements: The game features traditional rogue-like elements such as randomly generated environments, permadeath, and a focus on strategy and planning.

You play as Grandpa, you come home after a long day out drinking with the lads, and there is nobody there so you call out for your wife (Grandma) and she doesn't answer. name: 都广丹青录 Demo
detailed_description: Inkighter Demo, the first game developed by Joytoart Technology, has a story that is based on traditional Chinese mythology. The art is in ink and wash style, and the game has 2.5D perspective. With core movements and mechanics of a fighting game, combined with an imaginative world view and special mini-games, the game introduces a unique experience compared to similar titles. The player is going to play the role of the descendants of Duguang in the legends to go on an adventure in the Eight Wastelands. This Demo version only provides some trial content, please wait for the full release for more content.

name: Puzzle Party VR
detailed_description:
How would you like to spend time in good company in virtual reality? Maybe talk about something or put together a couple of puzzles?

So why not put on your VR headset and start solving puzzles with your friends today? It's a fun and engaging way to spend your time, and who knows, you might even learn something new along the way!

In this game, you can choose one of two types of full-body avatars and go to collect a large number of different puzzles with beautiful pictures. The difficulty of the puzzles gradually increases, but you can always call your friends for help. At the same time, the level of interactivity is on top. Communicate with voice and gestures, pass puzzle pieces to each other, correct friends' mistakes and don't hesitate to ask them for help.
The game has an unobtrusive minimalist design that helps you concentrate on completing the puzzle. If you have any difficulties, you can always use the hint on your wristwatch.
Great way to have a good time.

name: REThink Life
detailed_description:
Welcome to REThink Life, the groundbreaking therapeutic game designed to help youths discover and strengthen their emotional superpowers! Using psychological science and engaging gameplay, REThink offers an accessible, entertaining, and effective approach to preventing emotional disorders in young people.

In REThink, players embark on an adventure alongside RETMAN, a superhero who practices Rational Emotive and Behavioral Therapy (REBT). Together, they work to save the minds of Earth's inhabitants from the powers of the nefarious Irrationalizer. With each level, players gain valuable emotional skills and learn to master their thoughts and emotions, all while having fun.

Key Features:

  • Therapeutic Gameplay: REThink combines the expertise of psychologists with engaging game design, providing a scientifically-backed and enjoyable experience for young players.

  • Emotional Skills Development: Players build essential emotional skills that are crucial for leading a happy and successful life, including understanding emotions, mindfulness, and changing negative thoughts.

  • Challenging Levels: Each level is designed to teach players a unique skill to help them overcome the Irrationalizer's influence and restore the bright mind on Earth.

  • REBT-Based Superhero: RETMAN, the game's protagonist, practices Rational Emotive and Behavioral Therapy to guide players through their emotional journey.

  • Mobile Compatibility: Initially developed for iOS, REThink has been refined and extended to work on all mobile devices, making it accessible to a wider audience. The current version can be played on PC and VR.

  • Scientifically Proven: The efficacy of REThink has been tested in a randomized clinical trial, demonstrating significant improvements in participants' depressive moods, emotion-regulation abilities, and cognitions.

  • Supported by Grants: REThink is backed by the REThinkWELL grant (PN-III-P2-2.1-PED-2019-3837) and the REThink Emotions grant (PCE 136⁄2021-2023), ensuring its development is rooted in scientific research and innovation.


Join the adventure and help save the minds of Earth's inhabitants with REThink, the therapeutic game that empowers young people to become emotional superheroes!

Mouse abilities


Eating a purple apple will give you a 1-time click-teleport. Click anywhere on the map to teleport there.


Eating a ghostly apple will fill your ghost-meter. Hold right-click to go-ghost and phase through any obstacle.


Normal Mode:
Eat all apples and reach the goal before time runs out to advance to the next level.
But proceed with caution, running out of lives is Game-over and there are no continues!

Classic Mode:
Classic snake gameplay. Grow your body as long as you can.

name: Jolly Roger
detailed_description:
Doctor Ian Smith, a lieutenant in the HMS Justice, has the bad luck of meeting a pirate ship on his last journey before leaving the Royal Navy. When he learns the name of his captor, a certain Captain "Bloody Henry" Plank, his luck takes a turn for the worse... or maybe not.

Jolly Roger is a BL romance in a pirate setting, around 5k words long. Rating: SFW.

-Character art: Aielia Poot

-Backgrounds: Minikle

-Project managing, Writing, and Spanish translation: Ertal

name: Munchy Mammals
detailed_description:
Munchy Mammals is a simple and relaxing puzzle game about resizing and positioning mammals for players of all ages and skill levels.

In this game, you'll be tasked with resizing and positioning various mammals to help them eat, grow and reach their goals. Each mammal has unique traits and behaviors, so you'll need to use your problem-solving skills to figure out the best way to manipulate them.

Some mammals are strict herbivores, while others are carnivorous and can devour meat, including other mammals!

So get ready to bite, move, eat, teleport, resurrect, poop and become a parent in 50+ short puzzles!

Features

  • Moving and eating
  • Different areas with unique art
  • Many unique mechanics
  • 50+ levels!
  • Move tracker & medals; for those who want to find the perfect solution

name: Runic Defenders: Trials of Ascension
detailed_description:
Runic Defenders: Trials of Ascension is an action game where you can strengthen your characters by collecting XP materials. In this game, you have four different characters, each with their own unique abilities and weapons, fighting against enemies from all sides. You inflict damage on the enemies by using your characters' skills and earn XP materials by killing them. You can use these materials to upgrade your characters and make them more powerful.

With your team of characters, including a mage, a long-range fighter, and two close-range fighters, try to survive against enemies with different abilities, and strive for personal achievement. Use your unique skills, tactical moves, and strategic thinking to defeat other teams.

name: RPG Maker MZ - Emotions of Battle - Retro BGM
detailed_description:
Emotions of Battle – Retro BGM is an official music pack containing retro-style battle themes inspired by old-school JRPGs to bring out all sorts of emotions in battle!

■ Retro style battle themes!
The battle themes are composed in a manner that they’re named after! Their meanings are often states that occur during the heat of combat.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
【Specifications】
・.OGG format
・.M4A format
・Looping supported

【6 Battle Themes】

・Endurance
・Excitement
・Grace
・Rage
・Sorrow
・Valour

name: RPG Maker MZ - Food Icon Set
detailed_description:
Food Icon Set is an RPG Maker official collection of icons made in pixel art.
With "Food Icon Set", you have access to 50 high-quality pixel art food sprites inspired by dishes from all over the world. They are most suitable as icons for menus, but can be used as item drops or whatever you desire to use them for.

■Highly detailed and vibrant food sprites hand-drawn in pixel art from the size of 16x16px then upscaled pixel-perfect to 32x32px to give the feel of classic pixel art video games.

■Includes an assortment of sandwiches, meats, fruits, pastas, ramen, sushi, pastries, desserts, and others!

■Use as icons for menus, item drops from enemies, props for scenes, or whatever you can think of!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------


【Icon Set (1 Sheet)】

Includes:
1.) food-icons.png
2.) IconSet.png
3.) “individual-sprites” folder containing the 50 food icons in their individual images.

【TileSet (1 sheet)】
item-drop-food_E.png

detailed_description:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1965860/Lets_Play_Jigsaw_Puzzles/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2341780/I_Love_Finding_Furbabies/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2244050/Paint_By_Pixel/


About the Game

Nature Escapes is back! Enjoy and learn about beautiful plants and flowers from all over the world. Have fun playing a brand new set of beautiful hidden object scenes while listening to relaxing music.

Features

  • 24 chapters of nature fun!
  • Over 70 total HO Scenes and Minigames!
  • Fun facts about fun plants!
  • Explore gorgeous, handcrafted nature scenes!
  • Decorate your very own garden!

The Collector's Edition includes

  • 6 extra locations
  • 12 minigames
  • Downloadable wallpapers
  • Music player
  • Additional plants and flowers
  • Explore the developer's own plant children



Enjoy all the various mini-games and complete your own beautiful garden scene!
